description.hltext_display: ATCOM Business Telecom Solutions Installs New VoIP System for Capital Pediatrics & Adolescent Center
description.author: ATCOM Business Telecom Solutions
description.content: --(PR.com)-- David Finch, president and CEO of ATCOM Business Telecom Solutions (http://www.atcombts.com), a communications solutions provider, has announced that the company has installed a Voice over Internet Protocol (VoIP) communications system for Capitol Pediatrics & Adolescents, PLLC, a practice that is committed to providing the highest quality medical care for their patients, with locations in Raleigh, Wakefield and Knightdale, N.C. By providing the latest VoIP platform, ATCOM networked the practices three locations together, allowing employees at any location to log into any of the queues which handle patient requests, such as appointments, billing, and Ask-a-Nurse, to improve productivity and call-handling efficiency. The networking allows as well for extension dialing between offices, busy light notification of when other users at any location are on the phone or unavailable, and the ability to share work load across all of their offices.Quotes:Our transition to ATCOM was very smooth, said Karen Evans, office manager for Capital Pediatrics & Adolescents. The professionalism and ease that was provided by everyone at ATCOM was phenomenal.Because Capitol Pediatrics is continually expanding as a leader in pediatric and adolescent care, it is important that they have updated technology, said Finch. The new VoIP system allows for seamless communication between their three locations, which contributes to their mission to provide the highest quality care for their patients.Details:- Capitol Pediatrics & Adolescents Center, PLLC is recognized as the premier Leader in Pediatric and Adolescent Care. For more information, visit http://www.capitolpediatrics.com.About ATCOM Business Telecom Solutions:ATCOM Business Telecom Solutions, a communication solutions provider founded in 1979, is an industry leader in business telecommunications with an expertise in Voice over Internet Protocol (VoIP), a technology that enables businesses to upgrade their existing systems while embracing Internet technologies such as the web, e-mail, instant messaging, presence and video conferencing. With a client base comprising more than 5,000 businesses, ATCOM offers deployment of business telephone systems, unified messaging systems, wireless solutions, LAN/WAN infrastructure/services, video conferencing, carrier network services for local and long distance, and structured cabling solutions for voice and data. The privately-held firm is headquartered in Research Triangle Park, North Carolina, with regional offices in Charlotte and the Triad. ATCOM was ranked as one of North Carolinas top small businesses in 2008 and 2009, and has twice received award recognition as one of North Carolinas Top 50 Technology Companies. For more information, please call (800) 849-8266 or visit the website at http://www.atcombts.com.Jill MastrangeloMMI Public Relations(919) 233-6600jill@mmipublicrelations.comhttp://www.twitter.com/MMIPRhttp://www.mmipublicrelations.com###Communications Solutions Provider Partners with Healthcare Provider.

event_or_fact.property: Because Capitol Pediatrics is continually expanding as a leader in pediatric and adolescent care, it is important that they have updated technology

The networking allows as well for extension dialing between offices, busy light notification of when other users at any location are on the phone or unavailable, and the ability to share work load across all of their offices.Quotes:Our transition to ATCOM

description.hltext_display: Shoppers sets for last minute �2bn Christmas frenzy
description.content:
Ruki Sayid shopping Image 2 TOMORROW is set to be the UK's busiest ever shopping day as consumers embark on a �2billion Christmas spree.
Stores which missed out over the whiteout weekend are banking on Terrific Thursday to reverse their fortunes.
Brits are expected to fork out around �14,000 a second, with trade up 20 per cent on this time last year.
In both 2008 and 2009, December 23 was the busiest shopping day of the year.
And with Christmas Day set to fall on a Saturday, it is also expected to be the top day for high street shopping in 2010.
A study by credit card giants Visa reveals �1.2billion will be spent on their plastic alone.
And Mastercard and cash sales are expected to ring up another �1billion for stores.
Visa expect to process 26.5million transactions during opening hours, with four out of 10 shoppers splashing out more on gifts this year compared with 2009.
Late night opening and a bargains bonanza - with up to 75 per cent slashed off prices - are expected to take sales to almost �1million a minute at peak hours.
Visa Europe's Steve Perry said: "With VAT set to rise from 17.5 per cent to 20 per cent in January, consumers are bringing forward big ticket purchases this month, which has given a boost to spending levels."

event_or_fact.property: With VAT set to rise from 17.5 per cent to 20 per cent in January, consumers are bringing forward big ticket purchases this month, which has given a boost to spending levels.

description.hltext_display: Exige la CIDH aclarar crimen
description.author: UNIV
description.content: var addthis_config =} Compartir El asesinato de Marisela Escobedo ha desatado airadas protestas en varias partes del País.Fotografía: UNIV. MÉXICO (UNIV)._ La Comisión Interamericana de Derechos Humanos condenó el asesinato de Marisela Escobedo, en Chihuahua, y urgió al gobierno mexicano a que investigue el caso y lleve ante la justicia a los responsables. En un comunicado emitido este martes en Washington, la Comisión urge una vez más al Estado mexicano a adoptar las medidas legales, administrativas y de otra índole que fueran necesarias para evitar que hechos similares vuelvan a ocurrir en el futuro. El 16 de diciembre, Marisela Escobedo fue asesinada en la puerta del Palacio de Gobierno de Chihuahua, donde reclamaba justicia por el asesinato, en septiembre de 2008 de su hija de 16 años de edad, Rubí Marisol Frayre. La pareja de su hija, Sergio Rafael Barraza, confesó la autoría del crimen pero fue absuelto y puesto en libertad un mes después de que fuera condenado a 50 años de cárcel por un tribunal de segunda instancia. Barraza huyó y pese a las amenazas, Escobedo luchó para que el asesinato de su hija no quedara impune. La CIDH pidió al Gobierno de México que investigue el asesinato de Marisela Escobedo para llevar a la justicia y sancionar a los responsables materiales e intelectuales del crimen. La CIDH recordó que en su informe Acceso a la justicia para mujeres víctimas de violencia en las Américas, en 2007, señaló que la mayoría de los actos violentos contra las mujeres quedan en la impunidad, perpetuando su repetición y la aceptación social. La Comisión Permanente del Congreso pidió al gobernador de Chihuahua, César Duarte, y al Gobierno federal, garantizar la protección de activistas y sus familias, que se ven vulnerados por el asesinato de Escobedo. Los legisladores condenaron el homicidio y se solidarizaron con los deudos de Escobedo. Exigieron respuestas en la investigación que se abrió. Detendremos a los asesinos: Duarte César Duarte, Gobernador de Chihuahua, afirmó que detendrán a los asesinos de la activista Marisela Escobedo. "Vamos a detener a quien privó de la vida a su hija, que confesó, pero que unos jueces insensibles e irresponsables lo liberaron, por eso la justicia en Chihuahua, no sólo se aplica a quienes no tienen manera de defenderse, sino también a los jueces se les aplicará si es necesario". Manifestó que de igual manera se investiga y se sancionará al Ministerio Público, al Policía Investigadora, la Fiscalía y al juez. El fiscal Carlos Manuel Salas indicó que se realizaron dos intentos por detener a Sergio Rafael Barraza Bocanegra, asesino de Rubí, hija de la activista Marisela Escobedo, uno de éstos por parte de la PGR, sin que se tuviera éxito. Agregó que se diseña una estrategia integral en la que participarán elementos de las corporaciones policiacas de los tres niveles de gobierno y el Ejército para proteger no sólo a médicos o abogados, sino a la comunidad en general. MATAN A OTRO ACTIVISTA En Villahermosa, el activista Iturbide Villamil Arévalo fue asesinado en su casa, informaron ayer sus familiares. Villamil Arévalo se dedicó en los últimos 15 años, el activista a representar la lucha de diversos grupos por acceder a sus derechos a la vivienda, al comercio y a la expresión.

description.hltext_display: Concluyen las obras del centro de mayores de Pola de Allande
description.content:
Los operarios municipales están rematando las obras del centro social de mayores de Pola de Allande, que abrirá sus puertas en cuanto empiece el año 2011.
La inversión realizada en este equipamiento fue de 925.000 euros, informa P. R.

description.hltext_display: ‘Kallis was not drunk’
description.content:
By Tuesday, the gate of the Wynberg complex into which cricketer Jacques Kallis smashed was expected to be repaired.
The Proteas all-rounder is believed to have smashed his new R2 million Audi R8 into the front gate of the complex in the early hours of Tuesday.
Cricket bosses continue to deny speculation Kallis was under the influence of alcohol at the time of the accident.
This was just a few hours after Kallis was named man of the match in the first Test against India in Centurion, which was wrapped up on Monday morning.
Kallis made his first Test double century in the match.
He did not answer his cellphone on Tuesday.
On Tuesday afternoon a technician was harde at work repairing the gate at the Mont Clair Terrace complex on Herschel Walk. The man, who refused to identify himself, said the gate had not been badly damaged and that it would take a few hours to fix.
He said only the bracket supporting the motor had been damaged and that the wiring had to be repaired.
There were a number of scratches on the gate and on the walls surrounding the gate but it was not clear when those had been caused.
One scratch, about 7cm long, on the left side of the gate appeared to be new and shiny.
The man said he had been asked to fix the gate by a friend and had no information how the accident had happened.
He also refused to speculate on how the gate had been damaged and whether the car had driven into the gate.
A nearby neighbour said he would prefer not to comment and walked away.
Police spokesman November Filander confirmed Wynberg officers had been called to an accident scene about 2am on Tuesday. ?A 35-year-old man allegedly lost control of his Audi and drove into an iron gate at a residential address in the Constantia area.? Filander said police were not ?at liberty to implicate any person by name in this regard?. ?An accident report will be filed by the person. No injuries were reported and the issue of the damage will be dealt with privately by the relevant parties.? Filander said: ?There was no reason to suspect that the person was under the influence of alcohol.? Proteas manager Mohammed Moosagee said there had been no hint of alcohol intake by Kallis.
He said the Proteas had a relationship through the South African Cricket Players Association with the company, Good Fellas, who would arrange to pick up the players if they were intoxicated and unable to drive. ?Jacques is definitely not injured and is travelling with the team on December 23 to Durban for the Boxing Day Test on Sunday,? Moosagee said. His agent, David Rundle, also dismissed speculation of Kallis being under the influence. He had spoken to Kallis shortly after the incident who ?seemed to be fine?. ?The media are making this incident bigger than it is. It was a small accident which has been sorted. ?Things like this happen. We should just be grateful that he sustained no injuries and is fit to play the next Test match?. There was speculation on Tuesday that Kallis may have spent the evening at a popular nearby restaurant and bar often frequented by the Proteas.
A staff member at the restaurant said Kallis had not been there on Monday night. - Cape Times

event_or_fact.property: only the bracket supporting the motor had been damaged and that the wiring had to be repaired
there had been no hint of alcohol intake by Kallis

the Proteas had a relationship through the South African Cricket Players Association with the company, Good Fellas, who would arrange to pick up the players if they were intoxicated and unable to drive

description.hltext_display: サッカー独杯、内田が勝利に貢献 シャルケ、準々決勝へ
资本凶悍 艺术品迎来强庄时代
description.content:
艺术品迎来强庄时代
《中国 经济周刊》记者 孙冰
资本爱什么？稀缺的、保值增值的、可以带来超高投资收益率 的……如果又刚好被认为是道德的、高雅的、甚至是爱国的，那就更完美了。
正如2006、2007年的中国A股一样，中国艺术品市场在最近几年接连上演的暴富神话让无数人心潮澎湃，一年翻一倍、三年翻五倍、五年加个零……“亿元时代”的艺术品市场早已和过去不是同一级别的“游戏场”，参与者也不再单纯是艺术品“爱好者”和古董商人，资本的入侵正在改变着它的游戏规则。
对于艺术品，过去的老藏家们喜欢用“玩”来作为与之相搭配的动词，既显示了态度也表明目的；但今天，越来越多的买家更喜欢用“投资”，他们未必不爱或者不去体会艺术所带来的心灵愉悦，他们只是在用更为丰富的视角去看待艺术的“美”，并用货币来衡量。
贵不贵，资本说了算？
从2009年到2010年两年间，全球最贵中国艺术品的前十名几乎被全部刷新了一遍，只有原来的冠军、2005年以2.3亿元人民币成交的“鬼谷子下山”元青花瓷瓶还依然在榜。现在，排在前10名的艺术品价格全部过亿，最高的是11月份刚刚拍出的一件清乾隆粉彩镂空瓷瓶，成交价5.5亿元人民币。
中国艺术品市场“亿元时代”已经实至名归，千万级别已是常态，过亿拍品不胜枚举。但是，中国艺术品这样的价格究竟是价值回归还是存在泡沫，亿元的古画和瓷瓶到底贵不贵？值不值？
“现在不要再怀疑市场的价格，价格不存在问题，而应该考虑中国艺术品的价值在哪里？定价权 在哪里？”在12月5日举行的“芷兰雅集2010年度峰会”上，台湾著名收藏家、台北寒舍艺术中心董事长王定乾 告诉《中国经济周刊》。
“毫无疑问，经过了长期的等待，中国艺术品的定价权已经回到中国自己的手中。”王定乾说，“在全球最贵的10件中国艺术品中，除了元青花鬼谷子下山被国外藏家买走之外，其余全部是由中国藏家购得的。”
已经从事了20多年艺术品经营的北京荣宝拍卖有限公司总经理刘尚勇 对此也感受颇深，他告诉《中国经济周刊》：“定价权是市场里的核心权利，而在过去30年间，中国艺术品市场经历了定价权的三次转移：行政干预、消费干预和资本干预。”
据刘尚勇介绍，所谓行政干预，是指在解放初到“文革”时期，谁的画值钱是由行政领导说了算，比如一个画家出身好、思想积极，那么画就值钱，否则就不值钱。
“齐白石 是农民画家，李苦禅是车工，他们出身好画得也很好，所以价格就高。有些画家画得也很好，比如林风眠、刘海粟，但是出身不好、历史有问题、思想不进步，所以画就是‘糟粕’，不仅不值钱，有的甚至不能卖。”他说。
改革开放之后，艺术品定价权回归市场，就逐渐进入了消费干预阶段，喜欢的人多价格就高。
但刘尚勇预测，未来中国艺术品市场会逐渐进入资本干预时代，而且现在这一特征已经日渐明显。
“今后，谁的画值钱恐怕要由资本说了算。”刘尚勇表示，“前几年，外资打造的当代艺术板块 就是这样，现在国内的一些资本正在打造宫廷艺术或皇家收藏板块也是这样。这不是爱好者或普通藏家能够做到的，只有产业资本或金融资本才有这样的实力。”
刘尚勇认为，目前宋元明清板块、红色收藏板块、近现代大师板块也都已经初露端倪。“在资本推动下，会逐渐形成一些价值板块，随着这些价值板块越来越坚挺，也会越来越凸显其优势，会有更多的人跟随着进入，继续推高其价格和规模。反之，那些资本不喜欢的板块，则会越来越难以体现其价值。”他说。
“有人争就值得抢”
价格高就是价值高？对于这个问题，最能准确表达艺术家们态度的答案一定是“呸”。但是，“资本家们”可并不会那么感性。
刘益谦，中国艺术品市场最火热年代里最火热的名字，有人说他是“中国艺术品市场第一买家”，也有人说他是“除了乾隆皇帝之外最豪爽的买家”。据估算，他2009年投入艺术品市场的资金高达8亿元，今年可能超过10亿元。圈内风传买下王羲之草书《平安帖》的就是他。
被称为“法人股 大王”的刘益谦其实更多的是个资本高手，有“中国巴菲特”的名号。他的艺术品投资也带着浓厚资本市场风格。“我不大懂艺术的，对收藏也一窍不通。”刘益谦总是非常“谦虚”地说。但是，他对艺术价值的认识似乎是非常值得玩味的。
“艺术其实是没有价值的，只有得到资本的认同以后，艺术品才有价值。”刘益谦告诉《中国经济周刊》，“所以，你要清楚什么样的艺术品能被资本所认定，如果你的投资理念不能得到其他资本的认可，那是不会有收益的。”
“资本介入艺术品市场，会打破原有的规则和思路。你的投资想法能不能符合其他人的审美观、能不能得到别人的认可，这是艺术品今后能不能涨的关键。”刘益谦说。正是基于这样的理念，刘益谦形成了他“要买就买最好”、“有人争就值得抢”的投资风格。
“齐白石和张大千的画好，但是能卖千万以上的并不多。买100张齐白石普通的画，不如把这些钱加起来，买一张最好的。”刘益谦还常常说，他买什么往往不是只看这件东西怎么样，而主要是看和他争抢的人是谁、有多少、怎么样？
“现在进来的买家都跟饿狼似的，一进来就知道挑好的买，比我那时候聪明多了，我是交了好多学费才学到这个的。”刘益谦说，“如果艺术品没有其他多数资本的价值认同，收藏根本没有意义，更不会升值，这和股票一样，得不到价值的认同是没有意义的。”
“新庄家”登场
随着凶猛资本而来的新买家和新庄家们，正在从老藏家手中“抢东西”。由于资本的进入，中国艺术品市场正面临一个分水岭：传统收藏家和古董商人的主导地位正在被产业或金融资本大鳄所取代。
“收藏盛事就是一个新阶层的崛起以及新旧阶层的角力的过程，艺术品正在新资本和传统藏家之间进行交换，这轮交换也意味着艺术品市场确实已经进入资本时代。”著名艺术品市场评论人王春元说。
“1949年已经把中国人所有的老钱都清零了，唯一剩下的就是老古董。但是现在，1949年以前的老藏家几乎全部交枪了，因为现在拍卖公司像用篦子篦头发一样，把他们的好东西都掏出来了。”他说。
“买不起了”、“看不懂了”、“没法玩了”是过去的老藏家们今天的口头禅，他们虽然获得了相当丰厚的回报，因为今天放手把老东西卖掉绝对会是好价钱，但是你很难再买回来。
“今天几乎所有的顶级艺术品都是拥有雄厚资本的买家购得的，他们是不会买了两三年就拿出来卖的，相当长的一段时间内都不会。一如侯门深似海，市场上精品会越来越少。”一位著名藏家告诉《中国经济周刊》。

description.hltext_display: Rumatek stellt Schrankenanlage für Moeppis Skihütte in Winterberg fristgerecht fertig
description.content:
Steinbach / Frankfurt, 22. Dezember 2010 - Trotz widriger Wetter Umstände wurden die Schrankenanlagen für "Moeppis Skihütte" in Winterberg fristgerecht fertig gestellt. Bleibt es bei der Prognose für eine weiße Weihnacht, sind die Besucherparkplätze nun für den absehbaren Andrang von Ski-Freunden über Weihnachten und den Jahreswechsel bestens vorbereitet.
Insgesamt wurden 3 Schranken in Winterberg fristgemäß montiert und in Betrieb genommen: Zum einen eine Automatik Schranke Modell VS.650, welche an der Mitarbeiter-und Lieferanten Einfahrt montiert wurde. Die Bedienung der Schranke erfolgt über Funkhandsender, Schlüssel oder per Anruf durch ein GSM Modul. Zum anderen wurde eine Doppelschrankenanlage für die Ein-und Ausfahrt des Besucher Parkplatzes der Skiliftanlage montiert. Auch hierbei handelt es sich um Automatikschranken, kombiniert mit einem Bezahlsystem.
Die Funktion der Schrankenanlage am Besucher Parkplatz wurde in Absprache mit dem Kunden wie folgt festgelegt: Um einen Stau an der Einfahrt des Besucherparkplatzes zu vermeiden, können alle Fahrzeuge über eine Induktionsschleife die Einfahrtsschranke automatisch öffnen und einfahren. An der Ausfahrt öffnet sich die Schranke nach Einwurf der Parkgebühr in einen elektronischen Münzprüfer. Ein Differenzzählwerk überwacht die Anzahl der ein-und ausfahrenden Fahrzeuge. Bei Auslastung der Parkplatzkapazität schaltet das Differenzzählwerk die Ampel auf Rot, sperrt automatisch das Öffnen der Schranke und verhindert so ein weiteres Einfahren.
Weitere Informationen mit Fotos von der Montage:
http://www.rumatek.de/news-schranken-schrankenanlagen
Weitere Informationen zum Unternehmen Rumatek - Schranken, Poller, Absperrtechnik:
http://www.rumatek.de
Tag-It: Montage Schranken, Schrankenanlage, Winterberg, Schranke Parkplatz, Hersteller Schranken, Automatikschranken, Frankfurt, Schranke Rhein-Main, Moeppis Skihütte parken

description.hltext_display: 经济通：港股续反弹 借势收复23000点
description.content:
美股昨日（21日）上升，主要是企业并购消息及公司业绩支持股市向上，道指及标普500指数收市见两年新高，纳指更创3年收市高位。外围造好，港股开市高开45点，升上23000点水平，其后窄幅上落，未能进一步扩大升幅。午后内地股市倒跌，港股亦跟随一度倒跌，尾市回稳。恒指全日收报23045点，升51点或0﹒22％，主板成交缩减至542亿元。国指收报12611点，升3点或0﹒03％。
中国开口支持欧元应声反弹，避免欧元贬值打击
欧债危机至今仍未有落实具体解决方案，除了穆迪上周将爱尔兰评级狠降5级，另一评级机构标准普尔亦指，正在评核爱尔兰、葡萄牙及希腊的主权评级，加上上周闭幕的欧盟领袖峰会，未有就解决欧债危机达成任何共识，这亦成为投资者隐忧。不过，中国副总理王岐山开口表示，中国会采取实质行动去帮助欧盟处理债务问题，这就刺激欧元反弹重上1﹒32水平。其实，中国主要的外储是美元及欧元，美元贬值是难以避免，因此内地希望透过支持欧洲，避免欧元继续下跌。
港股正式收复两万三关，成交未配合视技术反弹
至于港股方面，港股昨日随内地A股反覆走高，更一度重上23000点关口。今日就借美股造好正式收复23000点，但需留意的是主板成交金额仍然偏低，乾升乾跌走势仍然持续。
其实，港股虽然连续两日出现反弹，惟成交未能同步配合，暂只可视作为技术反弹，并非全面转势，后市料续于20日线（23100）受阻。
A股回升注意A股基金，资源股亦可低吸博反弹
虽然如此，不过投资者可留意内地A股表现，因为有人行官员撰文表示，加息可能阻碍中国经济软着陆，加上发改委暗示本月通胀会回落，市场对紧缩政策忧虑暂时纾缓，A股或于年尾出现较好表现，因此可趁低买入部份A股基金，长短线亦可。而一些早前跌幅较大的资源股，如煤炭股及有色金属股亦可留意。

description.hltext_display: Viene Torneo Dinámica
description.author: Marisela González
description.content: var addthis_config =} Compartir .Fotografa: Noroeste. MAZATLÁN.- Con la finalidad de pasar un fin de año en actividad y practicando el deporte que más les gusta, del 27 al 30 de diciembre se llevará a cabo el Torneo de Tenis Dinámica 2010. La justa será organizada por el promotor y jugador Jesús Ordóñez, y la sede serán las canchas del Racquet Club Las Gaviotas. La invitación es para todos los jugadores de la categoría de Dobles "D" varonil, que gusten de esta disciplina. "Queremos culminar el año de buena forma y qué mejor que jugando tenis, la idea es convivir entre amigos y pasarte unos días agradables, además, claro está, que es el de jugar", dijo Ordóñez. El torneo se dividirá en dos grupos de 4 parejas cada uno, y el sistema de competencia será a round robin (todos contra todos). Los dos mejores de cada grupo jugarán la final. "La invitación está abierta, ya hay algunos jugadores interesados en participar, esperemos que se integren algunos más", comentó. Los horarios que se estarán manejando para los encuentros serán de 14:00 y 15:00 horas. Los jugadores que estén interesados en participar se pueden comunicar a los teléfonos 9 82 49 06 y 9 85 49 10, con Jesús Ordóñez. Los registros tienen un costo de 130 pesos por jugador. Las pelotas están incluidas en la inscripción. 16 jugadores se espera participen en la justa

description.hltext_display: Local Video Games Spending Down in 2010 - News
description.content:
A recent report has detailed the reduction of consumer spending on games in 2010 with not so positive results for one of the toughest years in the games industry to date.
The report, named the Total Consumer Spend 2010 and published by market research company focusing on the games industry, Newzoo, shows that £3.7bn was spent on games overall throughout the UK in 2010, a 3% reduction in spending compared to last year. The US experienced a 2% decline for the same period with $24.7bn in total sales (approximately £15.9bn).
It also highlighted a 25% in spending on console games which was offset by growth in other gaming markets, mainly in MMO titles which saw a 27% increase and social network-based titles experiencing growth of 66%.
The managing director of Newzoo, Peter Warman, said of the findings:
"There is no longer such a thing as a typical casual or core gamer, as on average, consumers play games on more than 3.5 platforms and more than 85% of all gamers spends time on casual game platforms."
Do you agree with the findings of the Total Consumer Spend 2010 report and Warman's comment? You can let SPOnG know what you think in the Comments section below.

event_or_fact.property: of the findings: "There is no longer such a thing as a typical casual or core gamer, as on average, consumers play games on more than 3.5 platforms and more than 85% of all gamers spends time on casual game platforms.

description.hltext_display: Fed’s Bullard Is Full of Self-Contradictions
description.author: Dian L. Chu
description.content:
James Bullard, President of the Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis was on CNBC Monday, December 20, 2010, mostly defending the Feds controversial $600 billion Treasury purchasing program (QE2) announced in Nov.
What struck me as totally self-contradictory were Bullards statements regarding the QE2, treasury yield, inflation expectations, and inflation, which I will outline and rebuff below. Bullard Higher Treasury Yield = QE2 Success
During the interview, aside from the usual Fed PR spin that QE2 has been 'modestly successful so far', he also states:People who see the rise in Treasury yields as a sign the Fed's purchases were not having their desired effect should look at other measures, especially the improvement in the economic outlook and the rise in inflation expectations in the market for Treasury Inflation-Protected Securities (TIPS). These are the ultimate goals of the Fed's policy.Bullard QE2 Unrelated to Rising Commodity Prices
But when Fred Smith, Chairman, President and CEO of FedEx (FDX) asked whether QE2 was related to the run-up in commodity prices-- fuel prices in particular, which has been up 15% in the last 90 days and acted as a tax on American consumers-- Bullard had this to say:Is there some independent effect coming from monetary policy other than supply and demand conditions globallyI havent seen very much evidence of that, but would like to keep an eye on that.So, basically Bullard touts QE2 as building up inflation expectations, driving up treasury yields (thus averting a potential deflationary cycle), which was the goal of the Fed QE2 initiative. Furthermore, Bullard contends that global demand and supply factors are behind the record high prices across almost all commodities, which he believes is unrelated to QE2.
Higher Treasury Yields Kills Housing et al
First of all, the ultimate goal of the Feds securities purchases (QE2), as outlined by Chairman Bernanke in his on Nov. 19, is to lower interest rates on securities of longer maturities to support household and business spending.
On that measure, QE2 has failed miserably. Interest rates, instead of declining, are rising rapidly driven by the bond markets and the bond vigilantes. The 10-year yield was at a low for the year of 2.4% in early October, and has shot up to a seven-month high of 3.56% the week of Dec. 12, before easing back to around 3.34% on Monday Dec. 20. (Fig. 1)
The yield on the U.S. Treasury is used as a benchmark to set interest rates on many kinds of loans including mortgages, and business borrowing rates in the capital market. So, the sharp rise in yields on Treasurys since the QE2 announcement in early November not only kills any flickering recovery sparks in the housing and other related sectors, but also raises the borrowing costs and interest payments of Uncle Sam.
Higher Borrowing Costs for Uncle Sam
The Congressional Budget Office (CBO) on Dec. 14 projects that under current law, debt held by the public will exceed $16 trillion by 2020, reaching nearly 70% of GDP. The CBO also projects the combination of rising debt and rising interest rates to cause net interest payments to balloon to nearly $800 billion, or 3.4% of GDP, by 2020 (Fig. 2).
Click to enlarge
U.S. Debt Downgrade - More Than a Warning
Now, the U.S. is at a stage where the downgrade of U.S. sovereign debt rating seems closer to reality than ever before. Although most have dismissed the Credit Agency back in July, CNBC reported that this time around the U.S. and other agencies in January, 2011 to make its case to prevent a downgrade from the current AAA status.CBOs debt and interest payment projection assumes that US borrowing costs will remain reasonable. However, a credit downgrade and/or further loose monetary policies, along with continued over-spending, will only prompt bond markets and bond vigilantes to demand even higher interest rates resulting in much higher interest payment than the current projections, reminiscent of the 80s when bond yields were in double-digits.
Expectation Drives Inflation
When it comes to inflation expectations, Im actually in agreement with Bullard that the Fed has been successful in driving it up, which is reflected in the TIPS yield as well as the steepening yield curve (Fig. 3). However, as :The state of inflation expectations greatly influences actual inflation and thus the central bank's ability to achieve price stability.Since the Fed hinted at QE2, commodity price inflation has surged at a record pace during the past six months (Fig. 4). The manifestation of inflation is a combination of many factors including but not limited to expectations, which drives behavior, as well as supply and demand factors.So, for Bullard to take credit for driving up inflation expectations, but ignore its inflationary effect on commodity prices, is illogical as well as self-contradictory.
QEs Not Flowing Where Its Needed MostThe bottom line is this: Unlike China, where its central government can mandate banks to actually lend to business and individuals, Feds two rounds of QE liquidity did not go where its intended; it is instead trapped on banks, and corporations balance sheets.U.S. banks have been holding about $1 trillion of excess reserves for the last two years, while American corporations are flush with $3 trillion in cash.
What do they use this money for? Banks and institutions with access to the Feds cheap money are pumping up commodities and stocks to make their quarters, while corporations, facing higher input costs in the form of runaway commodity prices, are busy engaging in M&As (which typically means job rationalization), and share buybacks to juice up earnings per share.
Meanwhile, stagnant wage and hiring trends failing to keep pace with skyrocketing food and energy costs for consumers, coupled with higher input costs-- such as fuel-- hitting companies' bottomline, will only further cut into growth prospects, and the purchasing power of consumers, and even their overall standard of living.
QEs = Wealth Redistribution
The concern of deflation is entirely overblown (thanks to Bullards research paper warning of a Japanese-style deflation in the U.S.) and the Fed jumped the gun. In a way, the Feds QEs are a form of wealth redistribution from taxpayers to banks, institutions and corporations.
The liquidity has created an artificial financial market where a disproportionate minority is benefitting through higher stock and commodity prices (without producing much output and benefit to the real economy); while the majority suffers higher input costs for essential items like food and energy.
Food and energy are some of the things that affect every consumer's daily life and pocket book, but are excluded from the core inflation calculation, a key measure on Fed's watch list. This bias would only further misrepresent true inflation pressures, misguiding Fed's future policies, and result in a net loss for the economy over the long haul.

description.hltext_display: موانئ دبي تبيع 75 '' من عمليات في أستراليا لخفض الديون
description.content:
دبي (رويترز) - تحركت موانئ دبي العالمية لخفض ديونها عن طريق بيع 75 بالمئة من عملياتها الاسترالية الى شركة الاستثمار المباشر "سيتي انفراستركتشر انفستورز" مقابل 1.5 مليار دولار.
وقالت موانئ دبي العالمية - التي تعتبر من الوحدات الاعلى ربحية لمجموعة دبي العالمية المثقلة بالديون - يوم الاربعاء انها ستحتفظ بنسبة 25 بالمئة من موانئ دبي العالمية أستراليا كما ستظل تحقق أرباحا عن طريقة مواصلة ادارة النشاط.
وقال محمد شرف الرئيس التنفيذي لموانئ دبي العالمية ان كل حصيلة البيع ستؤول الى الشركة التي ترغب بشدة في خفض صافي ديونها وانه لا يعتزم بيع أصول أخرى.
وقال في مؤتمر بالهاتف "لم يكن هذا لاننا نزلنا السوق نبحث عن شركاء .. هم فاتحونا.
"هذا جزء من استراتيجيتنا للنمو المتواصل في أسواق ناشئة دون زيادة الديون الاجمالية في نشاطنا."
وتقدر الصفقة قيمة موانئ دبي العالمية أستراليا بمبلغ 1.82 مليار دولار.
وارتفعت أسهم موانئ دبي العالمية 3.2 بالمئة في ناسداك دبي مسجلة أعلى مستوى في عامين.
وقال يوفراج نارايان المدير المالي لموانئ دبي العالمية ان الشركة درست اجراء طرح عام أولي للوحدة الاسترالية لكن اختارت مستثمرا استراتيجيا لان التقييمات كانت أفضل.
وقال عن الصفقة التي من المقرر اتمامها قرب نهاية الربع الاول من 2011 انها " ستزيد ربحية سهم موانئ دبي العالمية."
وقال "ما سنخسره في صافي الربح سنسترده في رسوم الإدارة وفي خفض صافي تكاليف الفائدة المستحقة علينا. نعتبرها صفقة جيدة."
وبحسب نشرة اصدار سندات حدثتها الشركة في نوفمبر تشرين الثاني بلغت ديون شركة ادارة الموانئ التي لم تشملها اعادة الهيكلة لديون ضخمة على شركتها الأم دبي العالمية 8.04 مليار دولار في نهاية يونيو حزيران 2010.
وتخطط الشركة لادراج في لندن أوائل العام القادم.
وقال شاهزاد جناب مدير الاستثمار في شركة ضمان "حقيقة أنها استطاعت بيع أصول في المناخ الحالي ينبغي أن تعتبر ايجابية.
"موانئ دبي العالمية شركة رابحة وهي مراهن على النمو الاقليمي والعالمي وأتوقع أن تظل بمعزل عن مبيعات أصول دبي الى أن تتحسن الاسعار وهو ما لا أتوقع حدوثه قريبا."
وتشغل موانئ دبي العالمية أستراليا محطات حاويات في برزبين وسيدني وملبورن وأديليد وفريمانتل بطاقة تبلغ نحو 3.5 مليون حاوية نمطية سنويا.
وانتهى الاحتكار الثنائي لموانئ دبي العالمية في أستراليا بعدما توسعت حكومتا كوينزلاند ونيو ساوث ويلز في موانيهما وسمحتا بدخول هتشيسون بورتس من هونج كونج كقوة ثالثة الى جانب موانئ دبي وأشيانو ليمتد.
وقدم دويتشه بنك وسيتي جروب جلوبال ماركتس المشورة الى موانئ دبي العالمية في الصفقة بينما حصلت سيتي انفراستركتشر انفستورز على مشورة بنكي اتش.اس.بي.سي ويو.بي.اس.
وقال جناب "تدرس الشركة عملية البيع تلك منذ فترة .. في ديسمبر 2008 فصلت أصولها الاسترالية عن الوحدة المحلية وضمتها مباشرة الى المجموعة الأم موانئ دبي العالمية مما أظهر أنها كانت تستعد لبيع تجاري أو طرح عام أولي."
(الدولار الامريكي يساوي 1.003 دولار استرالي)
من شاهين باشا
(شارك في التغطية ماثيو سميث)

description.hltext_display: Troppe puntate sulla X: la Figc apreun fascicolo su AlbinoLeffe-Piacenza
description.content:
un fascicolo su AlbinoLeffe-Piacenza
Albinoleffe-Piacenza . Nella foto Bombardini
La Federcalcio ha aperto un fascicolo sulla gara di serie B Albinoleffe-Piacenza, disputata lunedì e terminata 3-3. Sulla partita molti concessionari italiani di scommesse avevano registrato un volume di gioco particolarmente elevato.
Un volume che è stato indicato dagli esperti come sospetto proprio sul segno «X», un'anomalia rilevata anche su noti siti di bet exchange internazionali.
I concessionari italiani hanno sospeso le giocate e segnalato il movimento anomalo ai Monopoli di Stato, che hanno contattato a loro volta gli organismi competenti (Lega Calcio e Federazione). La partita alla fine è proprio terminata in parità.
© riproduzione riservata

description.hltext_display: サッカー＝W杯イヤーの2010年、買収疑惑など負の話題絶えず
Groom murders bride, best man and himself at Brazilian wedding
description.content:
A groom in Brazil shot his new wife, his best man and then himself after declaring to horrified guests that he had a 'surprise' for them. ccording to witnesses, 29-year-old sales manager Rogerio Damascena did not give any clues that something was wrong at his wedding reception, said police investigator Joao Brito.
He said the killings were believed to be planned because of the groom's announcement and because he had hidden a gun in his father's pickup truck.
Renata Alexandre Costa Coelho, the 25-year-old bride and best man Marcelo Guimaraes both died in the murder-suicide.
A brother of the bride was also treated at a hospital and released.
Globo.com quoted a sister of the bride who left before the shootings as saying she didn't believe it was a crime of passion.
"My sister was a wonderful person who loved and wanted to be loved," the Telegraph quoted Lucia Helena Coelho as saying.
"He was happy, she was happy, the party was beautiful. His family adored her and doesn't understand this.
"He revealed himself as a sociopath who fooled the entire family and killed his best friend, who was ... the best man," she added. (ANI)

event_or_fact.property: Groom murders bride, best man and himself at Brazilian wedding A groom in Brazil shot his new wife, his best man and then himself after declaring to horrified guests that he had a 'surprise' for them. ccording to witnesses, 29-year-old sales manager Roger
the killings were believed to be planned because of the groom's announcement and because he had hidden a gun in his father's pickup truck
My sister was a wonderful person who loved and wanted to be loved

description.hltext_display: 破烂王的账本里有房有车
description.content:
80后硕士专业回收废品 日开销从13元变为1300元
25岁的高亚洲已经有了自己的公司。
记者 未晓芳 实习生 杨昱
12月20日
高亚洲一天的生活开支
生活消费：早餐，1杯牛奶、1个鸡蛋、饼干若干共花4元；中饭，15元；晚饭，40元；饭后的奶茶、水果20元；买阅读刊物10元；通信费10元/天。
个人租贷：房贷100元/天；房租20元/天。
公司开支：工资开支950元、伙食开支250元、交通开支(两辆货车和一辆小汽车)50元、经营场地租金30元/天。
1389元——这是一位刚毕业硕士的日开销。他叫高亚洲，今年湖大行政管理研究生毕业。他不是富二代，更不是纨绔子弟，而是靠“破烂”为生的80后创业者。他的账本里有他的事业蓝图、有他的生活愿景、有他从学生到创业者的成长轨迹。
日开销从13元变为1300元
长沙愿景废旧物资回收有限责任公司的总经理、财务、业务员……25岁的高亚洲身兼数职，日开销1300元以上。而半年前，他还是名学生，每天忙着做调研、写论文，除了三餐，不用花任何钱，“一天13元足够了”。
如今，房贷、房租、车耗以及公司的各项开支都来了，而且都是刚性的。面对记者，高亚洲憨憨地说：“这种转变很自然，连自己都没想到。”
他的账单里还有10元的刊物消费，大学养成的阅读习惯，高亚洲一直坚持着，“去图书馆不方便，只能自己买。”
放下身段苦干，只赚不赔
与废品为伍，几乎没有大学生会愿意，但高亚洲却认为废品能发挥很大的“剩余价值”。
2009年5月起，他多次给企业老总和高校领导写信，如今已建立了稳定的“废品回收”合作联盟。高亚洲认为，创业者从事废品回收风险小、市场空间却很大。
他采用“传统销售+电子商务模式”，将能再使用的物品，如旧家具、旧家电、旧书等在网上挂牌销售。明年，他准备投资数十万元，提高再生资源回收行业的技术含量和增值空间。
买房买车写文章都不误
事业蒸蒸日上，高亚洲的生活也丝毫不落伍。毕业之前，高亚洲就买了小轿车。3个月前，他又首付25万元，买下了一栋复式楼，“一大家子都过来也住得下了”，他乐呵呵地说。
如今他父母、兄嫂来长沙帮他打理公司，他还有了温柔贤淑的女友，他说，长沙给他的幸福感很“粗壮”，这都是自己努力争取来的。
工作之余，高亚洲还坚持着他的写作梦想。如今，他已在《中国青年报》、《南方都市报》、《三湘都市报》等报纸发表过多篇评论文章。他说，“我的梦想我都要实现。”

description.hltext_display: Atacan con granadas sede policial
description.author: EL UNIVERSAL
description.content: var addthis_config =} Compartir MONTERREY , diciembre 21 (EL UNIVERSAL).- Varios hombres atacaron con granadas y rifles de asalto la sede de la corporación policiaca de General Terán, Nuevo León; según los primeros informes el atentado provocó daños a patrullas y a otros vehículos. El ataque a la sede se reportó al filo de las 22:30 horas del lunes. Se dio a conocer que fueron lanzadas al menos dos granadas que incendiaron dos vehículos estacionados frente a la corporación de Terán, municipio ubicado a más de 80 kilómetros al sur de la zona metropolitana. Durante el atentado, los policías que se encontraban de guardia se refugiaron en los baños y solicitaron apoyo del Ejército Mexicano. Posteriormente, arribaron efectivos del Ejército y la Marina, así como policías estatales, quienes realizaron un operativo para intentar capturar al convoy de los agresores pero hasta el momento no se reportan detenidos. El pasado viernes se realizó un atentado contra la corporación municipal de Zuazua, para lo cual se usó un coche bomba que provocó dos lesionados. Además, se han registrado atentados con granadas y armas largas contra corporaciones de los municipios rurales de Allende y Montemorelos, vecinos de Terán, que forman la región citrícola del estado. En otro evento relacionado con la delincuencia organizada, efectivos del ejército capturaron a cuatro hombres después de una persecución que ocurrió la madrugada de hoy en la zona de San Bernabé, al norte de la zona metropolitana de Monterrey. A los detenidos, quienes estrellaron el vehículo en el que intentaron escapar, se les decomisó un arma de grueso calibre y uniformes apócrifos de policías federales.

description.hltext_display: Los niños cangueses quieren cuidar sus ríos
description.content:
Tres alumnos del colegio Alejandro Casona, premiados en un concurso de microrrelatos organizado por pescadores de toda España
VOTE ESTA NOTICIA
Rosalía Freijanes, Daniel Martínez y Sara Megido, premiados en el concurso. pepe rodríguez
MULTIMEDIA
Fotos de la noticia
Cangas del Narcea,
Pepe RODRÍGUEZ
Tres alumnos del colegio público «Alejandro Casona», de Cangas del Narcea, han resultado premiados en el concurso de microrelatos «Ríos escolares», un certamen de ámbito nacional organizado por Unipesca, una agrupación de asociaciones de pescadores de toda España, y apadrinado por el Ministerio de Medio Ambiente y Medio Rural y Marino.
Más de 40 escolares del centro cangués tomaron parte en el concurso. Tan alta respuesta se debe al estímulo de la asociación de pescadores «Fuentes del Narcea», que involucró al colegio en la actividad. Uno de los objetivos de la sociedad es mostrar a los niños de la comarca el mundo de la pesca, concienciarles de la necesidad de mantener limpios los ríos e inculcarles el respeto por el medio ambiente.
El certamen de microrelatos de Unipesca establece tres categorías, diferenciadas por edades, y en cada una de ellas logró un premio un alumno del «Alejandro Casona».
Rosalía Freijanes ganó en la categoría A. Su cuento narra las peripecias de una nutria que pierde a su hija y que obtiene la ayuda de una trucha para encontrarla. En sus aventuras incluso es pescada por un pescador, pero, al ser atrapada en un coto sin muerte, es devuelta al río. Rosalía Freijanes explica que «quería mostrar lo importante que es cuidar los ríos, no tirar basura, hacer que la naturaleza esté limpia».
Sara Megido consiguió el segundo premio de la categoría B. En su historia, una trucha está desovando cuando se da cuenta de que todo está lleno de basura; ni corta ni perezosa, escribe una carta a los pescadores para que la ayuden a limpiar el río y estos le hacen caso y se ponen manos a la obra. Sara quiere «que los ríos estén todos limpios, porque me gusta mucho el agua».
Daniel Martínez, por su parte, fue galardonado con el tercer premio en la categoría C. Su relato muestra las aventuras de dos peces que están a punto de perecer en el mar y cuyos padres les salvan. Para Daniel Martínez, lo que cuenta es que «el río es un gran riqueza y no podemos dejar que se pierda».
Román Herrero, presidente de la asociación de pescadores, felicitó a todos los participantes.

description.hltext_display: Harmonix Founders Kick Off Court Case vs Viacom - News
description.content:
A group of former shareholders of Rock Band developer Harmonix have raised a U.S lawsuit against its parent company, Viacom, over alleged attempts by the media giant to avoid paying out performance-based bonuses.
The group includes founders of the developer, Alex Rigopulos and Eran Egozy together with early investors in the company based in Boston. The lawsuit arises from an acquisition deal back in 2006 when Viacom bought Harmonix for $175m and went on to cause major difficulties over the next four years.
The complaint centres around an earn-out formula in performance-related pay which equated to 3.5 times any of the gross profit made in 2007 in excess of $32m with no cap. In 2008 this would be under similar terms with any gross profit exceeding over $45m in that year.
The demands of the ex-shareholders have highlighted that they want to:
"...recover damages arising from Viacom's manipulation of these earn-out payments by diverting opportunities from Harmonix for its own benefit in breach of the implied covenant of good faith and fair dealing that inheres in Viacomís contract with Harmonix."
Further details provided show that Viacom has already provided its shareholders with $150m of earn-out payments in 2007 in anticipation of positive performance of Harmonix's rhythm-action titles. No such payments have yet been made in 2008. The media giant also added in financial statements beginning from earlier this year that "we believe that we are entitled to a refund of a substantial portion of amounts previously paid".
Viacom is in the process of trying to find a buyer for developer Harmonix as it tries to sell on the developer it once held in high regard.
Court cases are always complicated matters, can take years to resolve and not always in and amicable fashion. The case continues.

description.hltext_display: V Shongwe on South African Police Service operations at Lebombo Border Post
description.content:
Shongwe impressed with SAPS operation at Lebombo Border Post
Mpumalanga Safety, Security and Liaison MEC Vusi Shongwe has expressed excitement over SAPS operations at Lebombo Border Post saying the countryâ€™s border is safe and secure.
This follows his visit on Friday at the border where he found more than 20 stolen vehicles impounded by the border police meant to illegally cross the border. Most of the vehicles were stolen in Gauteng but were recovered by the Lebombo Border police.
â€œThe police are working very hard to detect all these. I am happy because even the border officials have vowed not to take leave during the festive season, this shows patriotism. I was told they did not take leave during the Easters, 2010 World Cup and now the festive season.
â€œWe are going to assist the police with unprompted road blocks, stop and search operations and the raids at the taverns in order to reduce traffic. This will take place long after the festive season,â€
He added that although the police were doing a great job, they still needed a device that would do the work much easier in searching especially the personal belongings.
He said he was impressed by the manner in which the border was manned following the renovations and the construction of additional facilities to allow thousands of people to cross to Mozambique.
The MEC was also briefed that a new facility called Kilometer 7 is now being used to process commercial freight such as trucks, busses and taxis. Once processed in South Africa, the people are escorted to Mozambican Customs and Immigrations Office. The border is operating 24hours until the second week of January.
The police officers complained to the MEC that they worked under severe heat as there was not adequate shelter following high temperature at Komatipoort.
â€œGovernment will look at these challenges because such uncomfortability might lead to the officers not doing their work efficiently thereby resorting to corruption. Corruption is generally rife at the borders because foreigners are allegedly paying bribes for faster service.
â€œI am generally impressed by the systems in place to provide maximum security. It is unfortunate that the concerns raised especially by the police officers are genuine, however they may not be fixed tomorrow because government operates according to plans and budget,â€
Enquiries:
Joseph Mabuza
Tel: 013 766 4055
Cell: 082 678 1450
Source: Mpumalanga Department of Safety, Security and Liaison
Issued by: Mpumalanga Community Safety, Security and Liaison

description.hltext_display: LTFRB chief to suspend protesting bus owners
description.content:
HARDHEADED bus operators who participated in the failed strike last month may face suspension of their franchises after the Land Transportation Franchising and Regulatory Board (LTFRB) finish hearing their cases. LTFRB Chairman Nelson Laluces said that some 36 cases among bus operators were deemed submitted for resolution.
“If any of these operators are found guilty of franchise violations, their franchises are to be suspended,” Laluces told newsmen in a press conference during their first media briefing with officials of the Department of Transportation and Communications.
Laluces refused to give the exact number of buses affected claiming that they are about to come out with a resolution by the middle of January and the second batch will be the following month.
He said that they are very careful in determining which of the buses intentionally joined the protest rally by not plying their regular routes, which affected thousands of commuters of Metro Manila. They started marathon hearings on November 25.
The 74 bus operators were given notices to explain and LTFRB had finished 65 cases. Of these cases, Laluces said, 36 are deemed submitted for resolution,
while 29 are still to file their position papers.
At the start of the year, Laluces disclosed that they would be concentrating on nine remaining cases until after they come out with their first resolution expected on middle of January.
Bus operators who have opted to file a position paper, the LTFRB chief said that they only have until December 21 to comply.
Failure to do so would mean that they have waived their right and their cases would be submitted for resolution based on the evidences gathered.
The bus operators and drivers allegedly made the protest on November 15 to oppose the Metropolitan Manila Development Authority’s (MMDA) number coding scheme on buses, which was approved by the Metro Manila Council, the governing body of the MMDA.
The move of MMDA is to decongest the major thoroughfares of Metro Manila and give bus operators a chance to check their units once every week to make it road worthy.

description.hltext_display: Cierran rol con derrota
description.author: Rafael Moreno
description.content: var addthis_config =} Compartir .Fotografa: Noroeste. ÁGUILAS PICUDOS 76 54 ANOTADORES Ganadores Perdedores I. Lugo 20 A. Cortez 15 C. Domínguez 20 I. Molina 10 MAZATLÁN._ Picudos del Tec de Mazatlán puso fin a su participación en el debut del Circuito de Baloncesto de Sinaloa (Cibasin) 2010, con una derrota en calidad de visitante 76-54 ante Águilas de la UAS. El partido se celebró en el Polideportivo de la Universidad Autónoma de Sinaloa, en la capital sinaloense. Con el revés, Picudos sumó marca de 4 ganados y 18 perdidos, en el quinto lugar de la posición de la zona sur del Cibasin, y décimo de la tabla general. Los del tecnológico se enfrascaron en un primer cuarto bastante disputado, no obstante a pesar de la férrea lucha cayeron 12-10. El segundo y tercer periodo tampoco les favoreció por 28-12 y 24-12. El último terminó 20-12 a favor de los porteños, aunque ya la reacción fue demasiado tarde. Iván Lugo finalizó como el mejor anotador de los emplumados culiacanenses con 20, Christian "Bubba" Domínguez aportó 20 y Carlos Regalado 16. Alan Cortez contribuyó con 15 e Iván Molina 10 por la causa mazatleca. Gigantes de Culiacán hizo valer su condición de anfitrión al vencer 90-66 a Fuerzas Básicas de los Pioneros de Los Mochis. Los mejores encestadores por Gigantes fueron Fausto Gil Jr. con 14, Fausto Gil y Jesús Tapia, con 13 cada uno. Rubén Rivera contestó por Pioneros con 16, José Estrada 14 y Ludvin López 8. description.hltext_display: 银行收费项目太多 如何做逃费达人
description.content:
小额账户管理费、密码挂失费、换折费、查询费、存折补办费、跨行取款费、打印明细账单费、ATM机跨行及异地取款费……面对银行各种收费，市民该怎样学做 “逃费达人”？
做好现金规划在ATM机上跨行取款一般要收手续费。不过，许多人往往因没有做好现金支出规划，经常不得不跨行取款。其实，只要提前计划，备好未来几天大致所需的现金量，就可免交跨行取款手续费。当然，现金量持有要适中，过量不仅会带来利息损失，也可能因保管不当带来风险。
选准办卡行目前各家银行针对跨行取款的收费政策不一，有的单笔费用高达4元，有的只需2元；有的则是每月前几笔免费，还有的则是全免。
对此，除了选择少数免收跨行取款费的银行外，持有在单位附近、居住地附近有网点的银行卡，或ATM机较多的银行卡，则是避免跨行取款的好办法。实在要跨行取款的，还得留心各家银行ATM机单笔取款的上限区别。因为，不同银行的取款机单笔取款上限不同，有的是3000元，有的是2000元，在上限高的银行跨行取款能节省一些手续费。
整合账户免管理费目前绝大多数银行对活期小额账户按季度收取3元左右的管理费，如果一季度的日均账户余额不足300元或500元，银行会按期从账户里扣小额账户管理费，一个账户一年12元是跑不掉的。
有些家庭开了不少存折或银行卡，少则三五张，多则十来张，但常用的不过两三张。消费者不妨将手中的账户做一次清理，趁早销掉那些不超过500元的活期储蓄账户，只保留常用账户，这样不但能规避不必要的收费，还能将家庭资产掌握得更清楚。一般而言，每个家庭只要保留一个活期存款账户，用于基本的汇兑、结算、存款、取款需要就可以。
升级“贵宾”省费用很多银行对贵宾客户免除多项费用，如银行卡年费、跨行取款费、账单打印费、汇款手续费等。当然，对于成为贵宾客户的门槛，各家银行要求不一，有的要求金融资产达20万元，有的是30万元。就此，很多人把资产分别存在不同银行，不如放到一家银行，享受贵宾待遇，办业务也不用排队。
多用网银可享优惠随着网上银行、电话银行等日渐为消费者接受，很多银行为进一步拓展这一新兴市场，经常开展优惠活动。如一些股份制银行常开展网银认购、申购、定投指定基金，手续费打折活动。由此，尽量通过网银和电话银行投资金融产品省时又省钱。
(丁玉宝)

description.hltext_display: サッカー＝エトー、「アフリカ史上最高選手」との評価に否定的
La escuela de música de Salas da un concierto solidario en Pravia
description.content:
Salas, L. VALDÉS
La escuela de música de Salas y la escuela de música Mancomunidad Cinco Villas ofrecerán hoy dos conciertos solidarios en el auditorio José Barrera de Pravia a las 18:15 horas y a las 20:00 horas. La entrada cuesta 2 euros y la recaudación se destinará a ASCIVITAS, la asociación que trabaja para la integración de personas con discapacidad intelectual en los concejos de Salas, Muros de Nalón, Soto del Barco, Pravia, Cudillero y Belmonte. Las entradas podrán sacarse en taquilla o en la escuela de música salense.

description.hltext_display: Supreme does rework chickens
description.content:
The company at the centre of the refrozen chicken controversy says it does ?rework? birds for human consumption, but that it has never supplied them to supermarket chains.
Supreme Poultry said yesterday that it was taking legal action against former employee Johan Matthee, the source of front page claims published in Rapport on Sunday.
According to the report, the company was allegedly thawing, washing, injecting, rebranding, then reselling the chickens with new expiry dates to outlets such as Pick n Pay and Shoprite Checkers. ?Supreme confirms that no reworked product has ever been supplied into the food service or retail sectors, which include Pick n Pay and Shoprite Checkers under their own brand names, as well as the Supreme brand,? said the company. ?Reworking at Supreme Poultry occurs on a limited scale, and is conducted in accordance with the protocols as dictated by the Department of Agriculture. The product may be used for specified purposes after reworking, including human consumption, animal consumption and rendering.? It said there were strict quality controls, including an initial bacterial inspection. Supreme?s marketing director John Neilson said reworked chickens fit for human consumption were sold only through Supreme?s factory shops, at its abattoirs in Botshabelo, Mafikeng and Tigane near Klerksdorp.
Neilson said one reason a chicken might be reworked was that its packaging had split, either at a Supreme plant or in a supermarket.
Supreme had in fact about four months ago begun implementing a new arrangement with Pick n Pay under which no chickens were returned, and the store itself disposed of them.
It said claims of illegal reworking had been the ?malicious? work of Matthee, whose services had been recently terminated on the grounds of alleged sexual harassment.
Legal action is being taken against him, not only for making false claims, but also for causing deliberate damage to the company names and brands with the Country Bird Holdings group, of which Supreme is a subsidiary. On Monday, Pick n Pay said it was satisfied that no chickens sold to it had or would ever be refrozen and remarked with new expiry dates.
Company representatives had paid a surprise visit to Supreme and found no evidence to back up the allegations. - Sapa

description.hltext_display: Wooden's grandson: Coach would have loved UConn
description.content:
HARTFORD, Conn. - John Wooden's grandson thinks the Hall of Fame coach would have been thrilled to see UCLA's 88-game winning streak surpassed by a women's basketball team.
Greg Wooden flew in from California to watch top-ranked Connecticut win a record 89 th consecutive game on Tuesday night, 93-62 over No. 22 Florida State.
"I kind of thought that somebody should come here from the family and show support," the 47-year-old Wooden said. "Certain players have said they're not really supportive of the streak, and I know my grandfather would have loved to have been here to see this."
John Wooden's UCLA teams won 88 straight games from 1971-74. Wooden died June 4 at age 99.
Greg Wooden said in the last decade of his life, coach Wooden thought the best basketball was being played at the collegiate level, "and it wasn't by the men."
He said his grandfather believed that women's teams, especially Connecticut, were playing his style of basketball, and liked the way they emphasized team above all else.
"He liked the way they passed the ball, the way they had quite a few stars who could have scored probably a lot more points on other teams, but were willing to sacrifice for the best of the team," Greg Wooden said.
Auriemma said he hopes that's the comparison people make between his team and Wooden's UCLA squad. He said the streak isn't about which team is better, but how each one played the game.
"That's all I've ever wanted
is for these kids to be appreciated for what they do and how they do it, not to be compared to how Bill Walton and Jamaal Wilkes did it," Auriemma said.
Greg Wooden said it was the first women's game he had attended.

description.hltext_display: Encuentran a decapitado
description.author: UNIV
description.content: var addthis_config =} Compartir TORREÓN (UNIV)._ El cuerpo decapitado de un hombre fue abandonado dentro de dos bolsas de plástico, cerca de las instalaciones de la Dirección de Seguridad Pública Municipal (DSPM). La cabeza se localizó sobre el Periférico Raúl López Sánchez, bajo el puente vehicular de la avenida Juárez. Se estima que el occiso tenía aproximadamente 30 años de edad, de complexión regular, tez morena y vestía una sudadera color azul con rayas blancas, pantalón azul marino y calcetines negros, sin zapatos. En la Fiscalía del Estado se dio a conocer que el hallazgo se realizó este martes por la madrugada. La cabeza se encontraba tirada en la parte baja del puente vehicular del Periférico, se presume que la arrojaron desde un vehículo en movimiento. Se indicó que ni al cuerpo ni a la cabeza se le apreciaron heridas causadas por proyectil de arma de fuego. Localizan cadáver putrefacto En Durango, En avanzado estado de putrefacción, fue localizado un cadáver del sexo masculino de aproximadamente 80 kilogramos de peso y 1.68 metros de estatura. La necropsia reveló que la causa de la muerte se debió a una herida producida por proyectil en el cráneo. De acuerdo a información de la Fiscalía General del estado, el occiso vestía una camisa blanca con rayas azules, pantalón de mezclilla azul marino, trusa color azul cielo y cinturón de color amarillo. El hallazgo lo hicieron labriegos que buscaban su ganado cerca del poblado Mesas de Urbina del municipio de Durango. Sin embargo, los perros que llevaban comenzaron a escarbar en dicho lugar y descubrieron una parte del cuerpo, por lo que de inmediato dieron aviso a las autoridades del lugar donde además se localizaron dos cascos percutidos calibre .223 y uno mas calibre 762 x 39. TABASCO Otro en motín VILLAHERMOSA (UNIV)._ Un muerto y dos heridos fue el saldo de un motín registrado en el Centro de Internamiento para Adolescentes (CIA), en la entidad, reportaron autoridades estatales. La Procuraduría General de Justicia del estado (PGJ) reportó que durante la riña en el centro de reclusión para menores infractores -ubicado a cinco kilómetros de esta ciudad- falleció Natanael Guarda Hernández, a causa de los golpes recibidos; en tanto que otros dos jóvenes, Juan Efraín Alejandro Romero, recluido por violación, y Melquisedet Pérez Caraveo, por robo de vehículo, fueron trasladados al hospital Juan Graham Casasús para su atención médica. Tres internos que según las primeras indagaciones iniciaron el conflicto, fueron trasladados al Centro de Readaptación Social del Estado de Tabasco (CRESET), al ser ya mayores de edad.

description.hltext_display: 和田玉价格一路飙升 理性投资疯狂的石头
description.content:
时值年根，收藏品市场开始风生水起，持续升温，而今年在和田玉、字画、钱币等热点投资领域翻滚的投资人，大多也赚得盆满钵满，连翡翠、和田玉这样高端收藏品市场也一改此前每年上涨5%~10%的“龟速”，这一两年竟然以至少2~3倍的幅度暴涨，极个别的高端品种甚至一年冲高上百倍，市场的骤变引发投资者的蜂拥而至，而“收藏品市场投资泡沫”一说也在坊间流传。
“疯狂的石头”价格一路飙升
玉石市场品种繁多，这当中被喻为“玉中之王”的和田玉更成了“疯狂的石头”，价格在短短几年间扶摇直上。作为一个“琢玉人”，入行已经20多年的苏帮大师李剑深有感触，“20多年来，和田玉从来没有跌过价，但是去年年底到今年的这一轮涨价是最厉害的。 ”
据业内人士介绍，“和田玉市场以往每年的上涨比例在5%~10%，但是从2005年开始，这种平稳的格局被打破，以每年高于40%的幅度大涨。 2009年、2010年，这股涨价的势头依然没有缓下来。2009年上半年一级白的可能十万二十万还能拿得到，今年三四十万都拿不到。 ”
上世纪80年代初期，一公斤一级和田玉籽料的价格是200多元；90年代末价格升至每公斤三四万元；如今，一级和田玉籽料的价格已飙升到每公斤五六十万元，特级籽料更是每克售价超过万元，是黄金价格的40多倍。和田玉的价格是扶摇直上，真正成了“疯狂的石头”，有专家还做出了具体的统计，和田玉市场24年来涨幅超过了1000倍，从来没有跌过。
不同投资程度可分阶段
作为有几千年玉文化沉淀的中国，和田玉的认知度和门槛大大提高，价格也大幅上涨，面对市面上涌现的大量和田玉产品，投资者要有独到的眼光才能“沙里淘金”。专家建议，可以从以下几点入手：
首先，要识玉。收藏级的和田玉，即正宗新疆和田产的玉料，就是通常人们所说的籽料，藏品级别必须要高，重量个头刚开始的时候不用很大，5~10克之间的籽料小挂件，但必须是优中选优，白度、细度一流，需选一“质子”(也就是你手中的参照物)作为标准，花2000或3000元，然后用500~1000元左右把关于和田玉的书收集一套，三个月内不要下手买东西，一边看书一边用质子比较，比到胸有成竹，下手买一件六七千元的挂件，既能佩戴把玩又能升值保值。
其次，很多有财力的投资人，遵循宁缺勿滥的原则，只盯着体积大的玉石，认为太小的玉件没有多大投资价值。殊不知，和田玉的价值与体积大小没有必然的关系，有时候几十公斤重的玉料价值还不及一块100多克的玉石。越是大的玉石，质地的不确定性越大，赌性也越大。多先进的工具，也不能保证您在大玉料没有完全切开之前了解其内部的全部情况，不要被眼见的表象所蒙骗。选择看得透、看得懂的玉石投资才稳妥。
另外，如果做和田玉投资，可以用时间换金钱，要有足够的耐心做好中长线投资的准备。长期来看可以获得数倍甚至几十倍的收益，但由于玉石价值评估和变现手段有一定的特殊性和局限性，短期内快进快出获利的可能性较小。
首席记者 阎华

description.hltext_display: Nintendo USA to Hold 3Ds Press Event in January - News
description.content:
Nintendo of America is preparing for the launch of the Nintendo 3DS by holding a press conference in New York on January 19th next year.
The president of Nintendo of America, Reggie Fils-Aime, will be there to give a presentation at the event.
Details remain unconfirmed as to whether an RRP or launch date for the new portable will be provided but with the US and European launches expected in March next year it would be highly surprising if Nintendo did not provide some firm details so near to the machine's launch.
Current estimates of the RRP of the 3DS put it at $250 (about £160) but from past experiences with console RRPs don't go expecting a direct conversion anytime soon.
Still excited about the 3DS coming out in early Spring next year? Any thoughts, feel free to post them in the Comments section down below.

description.hltext_display: Papá Noel se encuentra con los niños de Salas mediante videoconferencia
description.content:
Salas, L. VALDÉS
Desde Laponia y en tiempo real, Papá Noel atiende esta semana, a través de videoconferencia, las peticiones de los niños de Salas para la próxima Nochebuena. Las nuevas tecnologías han hecho posible que se produzca, por segundo año consecutivo, este esperado encuentro, a iniciativa de los telecentros del municipio.
Los primeros en comunicarse con Papá Noel han sido los escolares de La Espina, quienes, acompañados de sus padres, sorprendieron el lunes con su ingenio y con su larga lista de deseos. Papá Noel volvió a aparecer ayer en escena, vía Internet, para tomar buena nota los últimos encargos navideños en el telecentro rural de Malleza y para recibir el cariño de los más pequeños de la casa, que no ocultaron su emoción.
Mañana, víspera de Nochebuena, Papá Noel hará doblete y tendrá un encuentro a las doce de la mañana con los usuarios del telecentro de Cornellana y, a las cinco de la tarde, con los del Centro de Dinamización Tecnológica de Salas. Papá Noel terminará en la capital salense su tour virtual por el concejo para conocer de primera mano los deseos de los más pequeños y no olvidarse ningún regalo.

description.hltext_display: Prepara a jóvenes
description.author: Marisela González
description.content: var addthis_config =} Compartir .Fotografa: Noroeste. MAZATLÁN.- Con la esperanza de que se resuelva el adeudo que Mazatlán tiene ante la Asociación Estatal de Voleibol para que los equipos locales puedan participar en la Olimpiada Estatal, el entrenador olímpico Salvador González sigue entrenando a sus pupilos en las canchas de playa que se encuentran a un costado del Hotel Emporio. El porteño regresó hace unos días al puerto, luego de haber participado por algunos meses a lado de las seleccionadas nacionales, Mayra García y Bibiana Candelas, en el World Tour. González generalmente es el entrenador encargado de la delegación porteña de voleibol de playa en lo que respecta a la Olimpiada Estatal. Por tal razón, el entrenador está enfocado en desarrollar técnicamente a niños y jóvenes en dicha disciplina, de cara a la participación de Mazatlán en la etapa estatal que se efectuará en enero próximo. "Ahorita tenemos a 10 niños, en donde abarcamos las categorías de 91-92, 93-94 y 95-96, para prepararnos para lo que sea, independientemente si se asista o no a la justa estatal por los problemas que hay, nosotros estamos haciendo la escuela", dijo. "Vamos a seguirnos preparando, creyendo que vamos a participar y teniendo fe de que se arreglen los problemas, para buscar un boleto en el evento estatal y ganar una plaza para representar a Sinaloa en la Olimpiada", explicó. Estas declaraciones las expresó debido a que hace alrededor de un mes, Gerardo González y Juan Carlos Lozano, coordinador técnico de la Dirección Municipal del Deporte y presidente del Comité Municipal de Voleibol de Playa, respectivamente, dieron a conocer que Mazatlán tenía un adeudo de alrededor de 13 mil pesos ante la Asociación Estatal de Voleibol que preside Joel Rivera. Dicha deuda hace suponer que Mazatlán no podrá asistir a la etapa estatal si no se hace el pago correspondiente. "Yo como me he dedicado a entrenar no estoy muy enterado del adeudo, los entrenadores Rodolfo Ontiveros, José Wong y los que tienen algunos equipos me han comentado sobre la situación", dijo González. "Sí hay ese problema, pero espero que se resuelva, como comentamos los entrenadores, que las autoridades paguen lo de antes, y ya lo nuevo vemos como lo resolvemos nosotros". Espera entrega de cancha A su vez, Salvador González aseguró que está en la espera de que se entregue la cancha de voleibol de playa que se construye en la Unidad Deportiva Sahop, ya que será de gran ayuda para fomentar esta disciplina. "Creo que nos va a servir mucho ahora que nos entreguen la cancha en la Unidad Sahop, porque van a ser dos canchas en donde el tiempo de entrenamiento se va a agilizar", dijo. "No he tenido contacto con las autoridades, sólo con Fabiola Verde, que ella ha estado más al pendiente, a mí me importa mucho lo que es la cancha, la arena, que tenga una profundidad de un metro y que sea adecuada para jugar". La preocupación del entrenador es que faltaban los baños. "Tuve la oportunidad hace poco de ir a ver los trabajos y parece ser que cumple con todos los requisitos, aunque parece que faltan baños y eso me preocupa un poco, pero esperamos que esté en condiciones y que la entreguen pronto", expresó. 2 canchas de voleibol se espera se entreguen en Mazatlán.

description.hltext_display: RQD Features Locking Mechanism To Prevent Accidental
description.content:
FasTest has introduced new Refrigeration Quick Disconnect (RQD) for connections to refrigerant lines for charging or evacuating cooling appliances and applications under high pressure.
Accommodating industry's increasing refrigerant pressure operation requirements, the RQD is rated up to 750 psi. The RQD delivers safe and repeatable high-pressure connections to 1/4-inch and 3/8-inch male PCU, Hansen or similar style tips.
The unit features a locking mechanism to prevent accidental disconnect under pressure. Upon disconnect, the RQD vents residual pressure with minimal media loss-meeting even the most stringent state environmental regulations.
Manufactured with durable, black oxide steel construction, the RQD offers easy maintenance for extended connector service life-minimizing the need for costly replacements and production downtime.
FasTest, Inc.
1646 Terrace Dr.
Roseville , MN 55113-1317 USA

description.hltext_display: 浦发信用卡收年费认额不认次
description.content:
以为刷够6次能免年费 不料被扣360元
商报讯(记者 闫瑾 崔吕萍)“开卡的时候，银行都说刷满几次就不收年费，怎么到年底还是扣了年费？”日前，北京信用卡用户韩先生收到银行信用卡对账单，账单上赫然写着“扣年费360元”，这让原本为免年费一直努力刷卡的他感到非常诧异。不仅是他，年底很多信用卡年费的收取，都让使用者措手不及。
据韩先生介绍，他所使用的是浦发银行信用卡，开卡之初银行信用卡中心人士曾告诉过他，怎样就能免年费。在他看来，所有银行的信用卡应该都是刷够次数就免年费的，所以就努力每月多刷几次。但令他没想到的是，在刚刚收到的对账单中，银行还是扣了年费，而且一扣就是360元。这让他一时很难接受。
记者在查阅浦发银行相关规定后发现，该行信用卡是按照消费累计额度进行年费减免的，普遍执行普卡消费2000元、金卡消费5000元减免次年年费的标准。这一规定对有大宗商品购买需求的消费者以及用信用卡支付保险等业务的人来说并不难实现，但对于习惯了每次刷十几元、一个月刷很多次的普通消费者来说并不适用。
“没想到自己的信用卡是个例，看来刷信用卡也要仔细看银行条款，不能经验主义。”对此，韩先生表示。事实上，与韩先生有相同认知的消费者不在少数，这样的认知来自银行信用卡销售者的宣传。
“刷满6次就免年费。”昨日，在北三环某商业大厦门前，一位国有银行信用卡代销摊的工作人员这样告知记者。记者随后对14家银行(5家国有银行+9家股份制商业银行)的年费免收细则进行了调查，发现除中信银行初次开卡刷一次免收年费外，其余13家银行对于新开卡客户首年年费一律免除，中行、农行、工行、中信、兴业、华夏和北京银行刷满5次免次年年费，以此类推，普卡、金卡同样适用。建行、光大刷满3次即可免除，值得一提的是，建行发行的特种卡片如芭比美丽信用卡需刷满18次才免年费(汽车卡则固定按200元/年的费用收取，无减免)。
“信用卡在中国盛行了20多年，但很多条款和细节并没有一个业内的统一标准，这就需要消费者多多了解，认真比对。”对此，某股份制商业银行信用卡中心人士表示。而其所说的条款与细节，现在已经有一部分被消费者“误读”了。记者在采访中发现，很多消费者不知道自己的信用卡什么时候交年费，大多数人认为是年底扣。记者咨询多家银行却发现，信用卡年费一般在信用卡核准月份收取，而非每个自然年度，例如卡片正面有效期印为“10/12”表明卡片有效期为2012年10月，那么年费也一般在10月份收取，每次减免年费的时间也是从11月至次年10月。
另有人士认为，信用卡年费被扣除后，消费者就没有回旋余地了。事实也非如此。业内人士提醒持卡客户，如果拿到对账单时发现年费已被扣收，仍有补救余地，可以致电客服要求退回，如张先生收到华夏银行卡账单后发现已经扣收年费，随即致电华夏银行，询问能否退还年费。该行客服表示只要张先生在未来的25天内刷卡5次，同时至少归还当期账单的最低还款额，便可退还已经收取的年费。

description.hltext_display: THE PEOPLE SPEAK – President Obama should quit smoking
description.content:
Several months ago, I wrote a letter to Barack Obama, our U.S. President. In the letter to him, I challenged him to quit smoking.
Here is a man who is in a position to be the best role model to our young people (or any of us) when it comes to the use of tobacco products. A leader of USA who is the supreme authority needs to be an individual who abides by health and wellness that projects characteristics, not just for that individual, but for all of whom this individual is overseer.
Any of us have the right to express opinions and to urge others to promote wellness where it is needed, even if it is a U.S. President who might need a word of encouragement.
Tobacco smoke and nicotine can adversely affect an individual of any age, and no gender is exempt.

event_or_fact.property: a letter to Barack Obama, our U.S. President

description.hltext_display: UAE leaps forward
description.content:
Abu Dhabi -- It is difficult to understand why any employers would be disappointed in the new labour rules or feel insecure about it, asked a UAE daily.
"If they are good employers and fair in their dealings they will only inspire loyalty, increase their productivity and make more profit. That is the global standard of team spirit and running a good corporation. One cannot expect to seek the shelter of the government's dictates forever, especially when the government is making such splendid and carefully engineered attempts to create an equitable relationship. If the employer has flaws in the way he has held his staff captive and misused the refuge that has been on offer it is not correct now to conclude that employees are constantly seeking to ?escape' the organisation. By removing the fear of reprisal through the bans and threats the authorities are sending out a very mature message and any forward thinking employer would be delighted that he is now able to access the best at his doorstep, galvanise his company to greater heights and contribute to the commonweal", said Khaleej Times in its editorial while commenting on new labour rules.
In a nascent state certain protections were necessary to ensure that the Emirati was not put to inconvenience. The foreign workforce could come and be part of the maturing country but had to defer to certain rules to ensure that being numerically huge the expat contingent did not exploit the employer. Hence, the sponsorship system was maintained. Today, this is a robust, strong and internationally advanced nation, each emirate having its own special ambience but collectively creating a miracle in the desert. Time now to change to be in step with the rest of the world. Not to do so is to restrict growth in various sectors, lower morale across the board and spur a brain drain as well as up a reluctance for a new crop of talent to come and work in these parts, it added.
"The way the government is systematically setting about softening the laws while still ensuring there is no exploitative encouragement to the employee the take undue advantage of his employer deserves to be commended and supported in an unqualified fashion. There are two major reasons for this. The first is that it shows a certain confidence that the controls can be relaxed because this generation of Emiratis have the acumen and the talent to run their country and deliver. For another, it gives expatriates a sense of belonging and that sense of belonging like the traditional host to guest equation can only trigger a warmer bonding and a sense of common purpose. The UAE will flourish and those who have some doubts about their costs will be surprised that in the very short term their worries will be unfounded and they will actually save their overheads and increase their production levels", the paper concluded.
WAM/AM

description.hltext_display: Muere un joven por motín en penal en Villahermosa
description.author: UNIV
description.content: var addthis_config =} Compartir VILLAHERMOSA (UNIV)._ Un muerto y dos heridos fue el saldo de un motín registrado en el Centro de Internamiento para Adolescentes, CIA, en la entidad, reportaron autoridades estatales. La Procuraduría General de Justicia del estado reportó que durante la riña en el centro de reclusión para menores infractores, ubicado a 5 kilómetros de esta ciudad, falleció Natanael Guarda Hernández, a causa de los golpes recibidos; en tanto que otros dos jóvenes, Juan Efraín Alejandro Romero, recluido por violación, y Melquisedet Pérez Caraveo, por robo de vehículo, fueron trasladados al hospital Juan Graham Casasús para su atención médica. Tres internos que según las primeras indagaciones iniciaron el conflicto, fueron trasladados al Centro de Readaptación Social del Estado de Tabasco, al ser ya mayores de edad. Según la corporación, Natanael Guarda contaba con cuatro ingresos al CIA, derivados de su reincidencia, y purgaba una medida cautelar en régimen cerrado por dos años, cuatro meses y 14 días, desde el 6 de febrero de 2009. De acuerdo a las indagatorias, Guarda Hernández era trasladado al hospital Rovirosa tras los golpes recibidos, cuando falleció, por lo que se procedió a dar aviso a la agencia auxiliar de la Procuraduría, que realizó los trámites pertinentes y ordenó el traslado del cadáver al Semefo de la PGJ. Se informó además, que por la gravedad de las lesiones sufridas, Melquisedet Pérez Caraveo, quedó internado en el área de urgencias del citado nosocomio. Antes de esta riña entre internos de los edificios 5 y 6, se había registrado un amotinamiento en el área de Dormitorios 2-B, donde un grupo de jóvenes se inconformó por la alimentación que se les proporciona en el Centro, por lo que se tras

description.hltext_display: EA: Microsoft Can't Compete With PlayStation Brand - News
description.content:
Sony still has an "almost-impossible-to-supercede headstart."
Follow us on... Share on...
Tags
Electronic Arts, Sony, Microsoft
Electronic Arts has placed bets on the PlayStation 3 this generation, if its recent partnership at E3 was any indication. Comments from CEO John Riccitiello in a recent interview seems to support that, saying that Microsoft's Xbox 360 can't compete on a worldwide level with Sony's brand.
Microsoft has made plenty of advances in the US in recent months, and Riccitiello doesn't discount the "great work" the company has done or the "smart moves" it has made - "hitting pricing when they needed to, the right combination of hitting price points and disk drive sizes that allow them to hit price points that matter, and they’ve done a great job with Xbox Live.
"At the same time, the Xbox brand, the Microsoft brand, doesn’t carry anywhere near as much sway as the Sony and PlayStation brand do outside the United States, and so I think the reality is the international marketplace is just so important and it’s a natural advantage that no matter how good Microsoft is at growing their business, Sony has an almost-impossible-to-supersede head start."
The EA exec said that Sony has improved its marketing message and finally let go of PlayStation Home as the vision for the company's online future - both elements that have helped the PS3 close the gap in terms of global install base. "While I’m not sure that [Sony's online offering] would compare them in depth and breadth and features and support to what you have at Xbox Live, it’s good now," he notes.
"We have a similar share on both platforms. It’s not that I wouldn’t want to criticize one of the other; I’m not shy. I just think they’ve actually both done a pretty good job," Riccitiello said, adding that he felt Sony's Blu-ray drive gave the company a big disadvantage at the beginning while Microsoft has taken advantage of its rival's difficulty in hitting price points.
But "Sony has [leveraged] their limited amount of unique content really well," Riccitiello concluded. "They’ve done a nice job promoting the Blu-ray, their advertising and marketing campaigns have been stronger, and they’ve done a nice job of supporting some EA content to their own advantage."

event_or_fact.property: We have a similar share on both platforms. It?s not that I wouldn?t want to criticize one of the other; I?m not shy. I just think they?ve actually both done a pretty good job
While I?m not sure that [Sony's online offering]would compare them in depth and breadth and features and support to what you have at Xbox Live, it?s good now

description.hltext_display: 100万积分仅值2000元 信用卡积分成鸡肋
description.content:
每经记者 万敏 徐子莫 贺麒麟发自北京、上海
通胀压力下，信用卡积分也随之缩水。
《每日经济新闻》记者调查发现，多家银行先后调整了各自信用卡积分兑换商品的比例，即相同的商品现在需要付出更多的积分。对此，业内人士表示，这一现象是由于银行对信用卡业务利润要求的提高以及商户返佣比例下降等因素共同推动的，并非完全源于通胀。不过，不少消费者对此并不赞同，认为信用卡积分已成“鸡肋”，并质疑银行单方面调整积分规则的合理性。
针对消费者的质疑，来自法律界人士的意见认为，积分调整在信用卡条款中得以载明，据此看并不违规。
《每日经济新闻》记者通过对多家商业银行的调查发现，随着物价攀升和信用卡运营成本的增加，银行信用卡的积分越来越 “不值钱”了。在各大商业银行的信用卡积分兑换网站，1万分以下的兑换礼品近乎”绝迹”。
积分“购买力”缩水
工商银行信用卡网站推出的最新活动显示，2010年12月16日至2010年12月31日 (12月24日、25日除外)，该行信用卡持卡人使用1.8万信用卡积分，即可在北京、上海等12个城市的22家万达影院兑换 《让子弹飞》电影票一张。
这几年，电影票没怎么涨过价，但是积分的兑换能力却缩水了。2008年工商银行在深圳推出的信用卡积分活动中，9000到15000积分即可兑换一张电影票。
据来自浙江的消费者王先生介绍，“两三年前的兑换礼品确实比现在的好。”根据王先生回忆，2008年某银行信用卡兑换一个小号拉杆箱的积分是5000分，而2010年同款礼品的兑换积分提高到6500分，两年之内涨了30%，相当于该银行信用卡积分两年贬值了30%。“本来想多攒点积分，但是消费还没有积分涨得快。”
股份制行“高端”商品几近绝迹
《每日经济新闻》调查发现，并不是所有的银行都设置了高端商品 (价值在5000元以上)的选择。除了四大国有行及交行这五大银行之外，股份制商业银行几乎没有设置可兑换5000元以上的商品项目，上述五家大行一般会提供高于5000元的高档商品和低于1000元的中低档商品，不过高端商品可供选择的种类非常有限。国有五大行能够提供最高兑换400万积分之上的商品，而股份制商业银行一般只提供最高兑换100万～200万积分的商品。
大多数信用卡积分兑换的商品价值都集中在1000元以下，在种类上各家银行的差别不大，主要集中在家用电器、数码产品、家居用品、男士女士用品、车饰及户外用品、书籍杂志等。
在建设银行，同样是每消费人民币1元积1分，在该行的积分兑换礼品单中，最“便宜”的是22000分可以兑换2条博洋毛巾，149000分可以兑换一条博洋蚕丝夏被。中国银行信用卡每消费1元可累积1点积分，在该行信用卡官方网站中，热门兑换礼品排行榜前三均为航空公司里程兑换，约8000～9000分兑换500航空里程。而8000积分还可以兑换一个尺寸不大的多用化妆箱。
消费者不买账
除了招行信用卡普卡积分是20元积1分，其余银行都是1元积1分。同时，信用卡发卡行在美元积分上也有所不同，大部分银行都是实施1美元积8分的策略，而也有银行针对白金卡用户推出1美元积16分。
无一例外的是，所有银行推出的信用卡对房产、汽车、医院、批发和学校等领域的消费是不给予积分的。
“除非(用信用卡)去买辆车，不然还不如不换。”消费者杨小姐对《每日经济新闻》记者表示，因为信用卡积分兑换的礼品近年来越来越不符合消费者“胃口”，只有买车、装修等大额消费分期付款的积分才够攒足心仪的兑换礼品，因此杨小姐选择不兑换。
拿一款功率为1200w、市场价格在130元～180元的吹风机来说，民生银行需要54200的积分才能兑换，兴业银行则要44500的积分才能兑换到，招商银行虽然只需要7350分，但该行每刷卡20元或者2美元才积1分。
有关数据显示，刷卡消费1元值0.0020元礼品价值的标准在信用卡业内比较普遍。但是换算下来，1000元只能换2元的礼品，100万元才换2000元的礼品。
以持卡者平均每月刷卡2000元计，1年只能兑换价值48元的礼品，20年信用卡消费换来的礼品价值也不超过1000元。
“如果都像今年通胀这么厉害，48元的礼品和1年24000元的信用卡消费相比，没有太大的意义。”一位消费者表示。

description.hltext_display: Battery Compartment Enclosures House Types Of Small
description.content:
OKW has introduced ‘SHELL-TYPE' range of plastic enclosures, which offer a selection of sizes, styles and battery compartments.
These enclosures have been designed to house many different types of small electronic devices including test and measurement, medical and wellness, peripherals, interfaces and switching equipment etc.
The 'SHELL-TYPE' cases can be fitted with nickel plated steel spring battery contacts which conform to DIN EN 60601 and are designed to avoid short circuits if the batteries are inserted incorrectly.
All models are provided with internal screw bosses and guide grooves for fitting the PCBs and electronic components. The closed Type G models feature a recessed top molding for fitting a membrane keypad or product label, and will also accept a gasket for sealing up to IP65.
Other accessories include tilt feet, wall brackets and holders, pocket/belt clips, rubber non-slip feet and EMC contact strips.
OKW Enclosures, Inc
Abele Business Park, 3000 Old Pond Rd.
Bridgeville , PA 15017 USA

description.hltext_display: China urges EU to fix debt issues
description.content:
China has urged European policymakers to back their tough talk with action by showing they could contain the euro zone?s festering debt problems.
China, which has invested an undisclosed portion of its $2.65 trillion (R18 trillion) reserves in the euro, said yesterday that it backed efforts made so far by Europe to tackle the debt problems but made it clear it would like to see the measures having more effect. ?We are very concerned about whether the European debt crisis can be controlled,? Chinese Commerce Minister Chen Deming said during the EU-China High-Level Economic and Trade Dialogue forum in Beijing. ?We want to see if the EU is able to control sovereign debt risks and whether consensus can be translated into real action to enable Europe to emerge from the financial crisis soon and in a good shape.? Concerns that Europe?s debt problems could engulf bigger economies, such as Spain, have taken a toll on the euro.
The currency suffered yet another setback yesterday when credit agency Moody?s Investors Service warned it might cut Portugal?s rating by one or two notches due to its weak growth prospects and steep borrowing costs. China?s Vice-Premier Wang Qishan said at the opening of the dialogue that Beijing had played its part to ease Europe?s plight and held out hope that a turning point was near. But he said risks abounded, with global demand still tepid, and financial markets mired in choppy trade and excess cash.
For its part, Wang said, China would pursue monetary prudence and active fiscal policies to ensure it sustained its solid growth as the world?s second-largest economy.
In part to protect its euro investments, China has repeatedly expressed its support for the common currency this year and vowed to buy bonds from Greece, whose meltdown in May set off the debt rout.
Xu Biao, an analyst with China Merchants Bank, said on the one hand China was reluctant to see a struggling Europe propel commodity prices higher by unveiling a massive round of quantitative easing.
On the other hand, Xu said China was well aware that, as the owner of the world?s largest foreign reserves, it wielded power over the euro and the debt crisis had given it a new bargaining chip over other outstanding issues with the EU.
The annual trade talks between China and the EU highlighted a number of bilateral issues that need resolving, from trade and currency spats to intellectual property theft.
China is concerned by what it sees as growing European protectionism and trade tariffs.
The EU is worried, among other things, about Beijing?s indigenous innovation policies and possible disruptions to supplies of rare earth metals used in hi-tech products. ? Reuters
