description.hltext_display: Freeze keeps pressure on transport
description.content:
Transport operators are under severe pressure to get the Christmas getaway back on track after days of disruption caused by the snow.
Heathrow Airport's second runway reopened on Tuesday night, raising hopes for the thousands of stranded air passengers - many of whom have spent uncomfortable nights in the terminals.
It told passengers to check online a list of flights that airlines have said will operate, and not travel to the airport unless the departure was confirmed.
On the trains, Eurostar said it was operating a near-normal service. But the operator asked only people with tickets for travel today to turn up at the station.
Snow was falling across north Wales, the Midlands and parts of the North East this morning. Heavy snow warnings are in place for Wales, the North West, West and East Midlands, eastern England and the South West.
Prime Minister David Cameron expressed his "frustration" at the length of the disruption at Heathrow, while airlines accused BAA of failing to have enough de-icer to cope with the situation.
BAA chief executive Colin Matthews warned people not to expect normal services immediately and urged them to check before going to the airport. He also pledged to investigate how the situation was dealt with and why it took so long to clear snow from aircraft - but only after the "short-term" aim of getting passengers to where they needed to be had been achieved.
Rail travellers endured yet another miserable journey into work, with delays and cancellations on a number of lines. A broken-down train caused delays between London and Northampton and Rugby while a number of services in Wales and Scotland had to be axed.
There were also delays and cancellations on services run by the Northern Rail company, while First Great Western and First Capital Connect were among operators that introduced amended timetables.
Buses replaced trains between Ipswich and Felixstowe in Suffolk on lines run by the National Express East Anglia company, while west coast main line operator Virgin Trains had to bring in a reduced service on its London to Birmingham and Manchester routes.

event_or_fact.property: people not to expect normal services immediately and urged them to check before going to the airport

description.hltext_display: Relationship Question - How Can I Tell If My Ex Boyfriend Still Likes Me?
description.content:
You asked your friends countless of times, repeating the same questions over and over again. "How can I tell if my ex-boyfriend still likes me?" Your friends will tell you the signs, but unless you're willing to listen and view his approaches with an open mind, you might mistake everything he does for guilt.
It's always about how he treats you after the break-up. Instead of asking how can I tell if my ex-boyfriend still likes me, you should ask yourself what you will do to show him that you still like him, that will, by the way, provide you with clues you need to understand him. Does he call you often just to check up on you? If he does, will you do the same if it were you? If you do, then it's a promising sign. If he doesn't, he probably really felt that the relationship is indeed a dead end and should no longer be pursued.
If you miss him, you can expect he misses you in turn. Don't be suspicious about his reasons for saying it, since it is, and most likely, a 100% true. And if he says it plenty of times, we think you can answer your own question: how can I tell if my ex boyfriend still likes me.
Friendship has always been a major factor, and most of the time the starting point of the foundation to having a long-term relationship. So if he's hanging around, and giving all indications of wanting to be a part of your life, even as a friend, you can bet your favorite pair of shoes he's hoping for more. Forget about trying to imagine his hidden motives, because just being sympathetic or acting out of guilt is not a man's usual M.O. My advice, stop asking others if your ex-boyfriend still likes you and start asking yourself if you'd do the same to get him back!

description.hltext_display: RNB Retail and Brands AB: Kallelse
description.content:
Aktieägarna i RNB RETAIL AND BRANDS AB kallas härmed till årsstämma torsdagen
Stockholm.
Anmälan m.m.
Aktieägare, som önskar deltaga på årsstämman, ska
dels vara införd i den av Euroclear Sweden AB förda aktieboken senast fredagen
den 14 januari 2011,
dels anmäla sitt deltagande till bolaget senast måndagen den 17 januari 2011
under adress RNB RETAIL AND BRANDS AB, Box 161 42, 103 23 Stockholm, eller per
telefon 08-410 520 00 eller per telefax 08?410 522 90 eller via e-mail:
ann-charlotte.bjorkman@rnb.se. Vid anmälan ska uppges aktieinnehav,
namn, personnummer, adress, telefonnummer samt uppgift om eventuella biträden.
Förvaltarregistrerade aktier
För att äga rätt att deltaga på årsstämman måste aktieägare, som låtit
förvaltarregistrera sina aktier genom banks notariatavdelning eller enskild
fondhandlare, tillfälligt inregistrera sina aktier i eget namn hos Euroclear
Sweden AB. Aktieägare som önskar sådan omregistrering måste underrätta sin
förvaltare om detta i god tid före den 14 januari 2011 då sådan omregistrering
måste vara verkställd.
Antal aktier och röster
I bolaget finns totalt 165.425.251 aktier med en röst vardera.
Förslag till dagordning
1 Stämmans öppnande.
2 Val av ordförande vid stämman.
3 Upprättande och godkännande av röstlängd.
4 Godkännande av dagordningen.
5 Val av en eller två justeringspersoner att underteckna protokollet.
6 Prövning av om stämman blivit behörigen sammankallad.
7 Anförande av verkställande direktören.
8 Framläggande av årsredovisning och revisionsberättelse samt
koncernredovisning och koncernrevisionsberättelse för verksamhetsåret 1
september 2009 - 31 augusti 2010.
9 Beslut om fastställande av resultaträkningen och balansräkningen samt
koncernresultaträkningen och koncernbalansräkningen.
10 Beslut om dispositioner beträffande bolagets resultat enligt den
fastställda balansräkningen.
11 Beslut om ansvarsfrihet för styrelseledamöterna och verkställande
direktören.
12 Fastställande av antalet styrelseledamöter.
13 Fastställande av arvoden åt styrelsen och revisorerna.
14 Val av styrelseledamöter och styrelseordförande.
15 Förslag till beslut om ändring av bolagsordningen.
16 Beslut om principer för utseende av valberedning.
17 Förslag till beslut om riktlinjer för ersättning och andra
anställningsvillkor för bolagsledningen.
18 Stämmans avslutande.
Utdelning under punkten 10
Styrelsen föreslår att ingen utdelning ska utgå för räkenskapsåret 1 september
2009 - 31 augusti 2010, och att till årsstämmans förfogande stående vinstmedel
balanseras i ny räkning.
Förslag under punkterna 2, 12, 13 och 14
Årsstämman den 28 januari 2010 beslutade om principer för utseende av
valberedning m.m. Valberedningen har avgivit följande förslag vad gäller ärende
2, 12, 13 och 14. Valberedningens förslag, innefattande förslaget avseende
ärende 14, stöds av aktieägare representerande cirka 35 procent av kapital och
röster i bolaget.
* Styrelsens ordförande, Magnus Håkansson, väljs till ordförande vid
årsstämman 2011 (ärende 2).
* Antalet styrelseledamöter ska vara sju utan suppleanter (ärende 12).
* Arvode till styrelsen ska utgå med totalt 1 050 000 kr att fördelas med
300 000 kr till styrelsens ordförande och 137 500 kr till envar av övriga
styrelseledamöter som inte uppbär lön från bolaget. Särskilt arvode till
revisionskommitténs ordförande ska utgå med 62 500 kr. I övrigt föreslås att
inget arvode utgår för utskottsarbete (ärende 13).
* Omval av ordinarie styrelseledamöterna, Jan Carlzon, Lilian Fossum,
Magnus Håkansson, Torsten Jansson, Laszlo Kriss, Mikael Solberg och Nils
Vinberg. John Wallmark har avböjt att kandidera för omval. Magnus Håkansson
föreslås till styrelsens ordförande (ärende 14).
* Arvode till revisor enligt godkänd löpande räkning (ärende 13).
Det noteras att vid årsstämman 29 januari 2008 valdes Ernst & Young, med
huvudansvarig revisor Bertel Enlund, till bolagets revisor för tiden intill
slutet av årsstämman för verksamhetsåret 2010/2011.
Förslag till bolagsordningsändring under punkt 15
Styrelsen föreslår att § 8 i bolagsordningen ändras så att nuvarande lydelse
utgår och ersätts av följande lydelse.
"Kallelse till ordinarie bolagsstämma samt till extra bolagsstämma där fråga om
ändring av bolagsordningen kommer att behandlas ska utfärdas tidigast sex och
senast fyra veckor före stämman. Kallelse till annan extra bolagsstämma ska
utfärdas tidigast sex och senast tre veckor före stämman. Kallelse till
bolagsstämma ska ske genom annonsering i Post- och Inrikes Tidningar samt på
bolagets webbplats. Vid tidpunkten för kallelse ska information om att kallelse
skett annonseras i Svenska Dagbladet."
Styrelsen föreslår att § 10 i bolagsordningen ändras så att nuvarande lydelse
utgår och ersätts av följande lydelse.
"Styrelsen får samla in fullmakter enligt det förfarande som anges i ABL
7 kap. 4 § andra stycket."
Styrelsen föreslår att § 12 p. 8 och 10 i bolagsordningen ändras så att
nuvarande lydelser utgår och ersätts av följande lydelser.
"8. fastställande av antalet styrelseledamöter samt antalet revisorer och
revisorssuppleanter;"
"10. val av styrelseledamöter samt revisorer och revisorssuppleanter;"
Förslaget till ändringarna i bolagsordningen föranleds av ändringar i
aktiebolagslagen.
Förslag under punkten 16
Valberedningen föreslår att årsstämman fattar beslut om att en valberedning ska
utses enligt följande. Styrelsens ordförande ska årligen, och senast sex månader
före årsstämman, sammankalla de vid den tidpunkten fyra största aktieägarna i
bolaget. Dessa äger sedan utse en ledamot var, som inte bör vara
styrelseledamot, till valberedningen. Om någon av de fyra största aktieägarna
avstår sin rätt att utse ledamot till valberedningen ska nästa aktieägare i
storleksordning beredas tillfälle att utse ledamot till valberedningen. Om fler
än en aktieägare avstår sin rätt att utse ledamot till valberedningen, behöver
inte fler än de åtta största aktieägarna tillfrågas, om inte detta krävs för att
valberedningen ska bestå av fyra ledamöter. Därutöver ska styrelsens ordförande
adjungeras till valberedningen, dock ej som ordförande. Verkställande direktören
eller annan person från bolagsledningen ska inte vara ledamot av valberedningen.
Valberedningen ska bereda och till årsstämman lämna förslag till:
· antal styrelseledamöter, antal revisorer och revisorssuppleanter,
· val av styrelseordförande och övriga ledamöter till bolagets styrelse,
· styrelsearvode uppdelat mellan ordförande och övriga ledamöter samt
eventuell ersättning för utskottsarbete,
· val av och arvode till revisor och revisorssuppleant,
· beslut om principer för utseende av valberedningen, samt
· ordförande vid årsstämman.
Ovanstående principer för utseende av valberedning överensstämmer i huvudsak med
nu gällande principer.
Förslag under punkten 17
Styrelsen har formulerat förslag till nya principer för ersättning och andra
anställningsvillkor för bolagets ledande befattningshavare, vilka omfattar VD
och övrig koncernledning. Ersättningsmodellen för den rörliga ersättningen
föreslås i två program; ett ettårsprogram med kontantersättning samt ett
tvåårsprogram med kontantersättning bunden till investering i bolagets aktier.
Styrelsen föreslår att stämman beslutar i enlighet med nedanstående förslag
angående riktlinjer för ersättning och andra anställningsvillkor för
bolagsledningen. Principerna omfattar VD och övriga åtta medlemmar av
koncernledningen. Styrelsens förslag innebär en förändring jämfört med tidigare
års ersättningsprinciper. Beredningen av ersättningsfrågor hanteras av
ersättningsutskottet.
Bolaget ska erbjuda en marknadsmässig totalkompensation som möjliggör att
ledande befattningshavare kan rekryteras och behållas. Kompensationen till
bolagsledningen ska bestå av fast lön, rörlig lön, pension samt övriga
ersättningar. Tillsammans utgör dessa delar individens totalkompensation. Fast
lön och rörlig lön utgör tillsammans den anställdes lön. Den fasta lönen, kronor
per månad, ska beakta den enskildes ansvarsområden och erfarenhet. Den rörliga
lönen ska vara relaterad till utfallet av dotterbolagens rörelseresultat
och/eller koncernens resultat efter finansiella poster jämfört med fastställda
mål. Vidare ska rörlig lön kunna knytas till mål på såväl ett som två års sikt
och delvis kunna vara villkorad av bland annat att den anställde inte sagt upp
sig och att del av bonusen måste investeras i bolagets aktie.
Verkställande direktören ska som tidigare åtnjuta tjänstepension motsvarande en
premie på upp till maximalt 35 procent av aktuell årslön. Övriga medlemmar av
bolagsledningen ska ha rätt till pensioner enligt ITP-planen eller motsvarande.
Pensionsåldern är 65 år. Övriga ersättningar och förmåner ska vara
marknadsmässiga och bidraga till att underlätta befattningshavarens möjligheter
att fullgöra sina arbetsuppgifter.
Styrelsens bedömning är att ovan förslag vad gäller programmet i dess
sammansättning med ett personligt ägarengagemang kan förväntas stimulera till en
ökad delaktighet och motiverar till långsiktigt värdeskapande i verksamheten,
vilket är till fördel för RNB RETAIL AND BRANDS, dess aktieägare och
medarbetare.
Därutöver omfattas ett antal nyckelmedarbetare i organisationen sedan tidigare
av ett kontantbaserat bonusprogram. Avsikten är att även tvåårsprogrammet,
vilket inte är föremål för stämmobeslut, ska omfatta gruppen nyckelmedarbetare,
vilket bedöms ge goda förutsättningar för att rekrytera och behålla kompetenta
medarbetare samt stimulera nyckelpersoner till insatser som stärker bolaget
långsiktigt.
___________________________________________
Styrelsens fullständiga förslag enligt ärende 15, 16 och 17 samt
årsredovisningshandlingar enligt ärende 8 ovan, inklusive revisorns yttrande
enligt 8 kap 54 § aktiebolagslagen, hålls tillgängliga hos bolaget på adress
Regeringsgatan 29, Stockholm, samt på bolagets hemsida www.rnb.se från och med
den 6 januari 2011 samt sänds till de aktieägare som begär det och uppger sin
postadress. Information om samtliga ledamöter som föreslås till RNB:s styrelse
samt valberedningens motiverade yttrande beträffande förslaget till val av
styrelse finns tillgängligt på bolagets hemsida från och med den 22 december
2010.
Blankett för fullmakt finns att hämta på www.rnb.se.
RNB RETAIL AND BRANDS AB (publ)
Stockholm i december 2010

description.hltext_display: We appreciate our letters to the editor
description.content:
From the Current-Argus
Click photo to enlarge
Larry Hubner
On Dec. 1, reader Charles Parnell wrote a letter to the editor which began, "I feel compelled to comment on what appears to be an unfortunate new editorial policy of the Current-Argus. What has become of the Letters to the Editor column?"
First, thanks to Charles for taking the time to write, especially since it gives me an opportunity to address it.
Here's the short answer: Heavens, no! We love letters to the editor!
It was, in fact, the week prior to Charles' letter that I was discussing with the managing editor our dwindling number of letters to the editor.
Parnell is 100 percent correct when he wrote, "There are few things more pleasurable than enjoying a morning cup of coffee while reading the thoughts, observations and musing of my neighbors in the pages of your newspaper." Wonderful!
Personally, when I read our newspaper as a reader, after scanning the front page, I head immediately to see letters to the editor.
Maybe a lack of letters is partly our fault. Larger newspapers generally publish a local editorial daily. With our tiny staff, that is hard to accomplish. Those editorials are intended to be the first word, and a means of sparking debate within the community.
There's nothing like a little back and forth on a topic of interest to measure the political temperature of a community. I'm also with Parnell when he observes that "this feature of your publication performs a valuable service to the community."
Exactly, but let me go further.
Not only is it a valuable service to the community, but it is our obligation to the community. This is our duty.
And if the letters are critical of the Current-Argus, or politicians or the political system - and whether you agree or disagree - we always hope they inspire you to pick up a pen or go to your computer and fire out a response.
While we may not always agree with our readers, we always value their thoughts.
Thanks for participating in our democracy!
Favorite pastime
One of my favorite pastimes is sitting down with a good book and a cup of coffee on an early Saturday or Sunday morning.
I picked up a book by Daniel Okrent, "Last Call," a study about the prohibition era because a great uncle, Aaron S. Watkins, had run for president on the Prohibition ticket in 1920. Alas, Aaron, a Christian conservative of the first order, never made the book, presumably because the Prohibition Party had so little influence on American society.
Oddly, a great grandfather on my father's side, Theodore Hubner, who traveled with his father, Ferdinand, from Hamburg in the late 1870s, did land in a book - "The History of Brewing in Minnesota", because he owned a brewery in Fergus Falls, Minnesota, at the turn of the century.
Unfortunately, I have no political or beer-making skills. But I guess it's the convergence of these oddly diverse personalities that makes for a newspaperman.
But I still prefer coffee with that book!
Merry Christmas
On behalf of the Current-Argus staff, Merry Christmas to all.
We wish you prosperity in the coming year and only the best for you and your family.
Larry Hubner is publisher of the Current-Argus

description.hltext_display: Sacked IFP mayor escapes attack
description.content:
The sacked IFP mayor of Umtshezi, in Estcourt, Maliyakhe Shelembe, who survived an attack by gunmen on Monday night, has blamed ?internal conflicts? within the party for the attack. Shelembe escaped unharmed when gunmen opened fire on his car while he was driving home from a meeting held to discuss plans for a year-end function, to be addressed by IFP national chairwoman Zanele kaMagwaza-Msibi. ?I was about 600m away from my home. I heard bullets hitting my car. I vaguely saw figures running away,? Shelembe said. Police found six AK-47 and R5 rifle cartridges at the scene.
The IFP fired Shelembe from his position after accusing him of performing badly. But he says he was sacked because he was a close ally of kaMagwaza-Msibi and supported her bid to become the next IFP president. Shelembe had organised for kaMagwaza-Msibi to be a guest speaker at a function today. ?In the IFP if you are a supporter of kaMagwaza-Msibi, you are either expelled from the party or your life is at risk. The function that Zanele was to attend was a non-political function,? he said. kaMagwaza-Mbisi said: ?This is very sad. It?s disappointing and hurtful. I have spoken to members of the party and urged them to calm down and not to retaliate. ?We are now working with the police... but we are urging the party not to let this escalate.? Police spokesman Thulani Zwane said a case of attempted murder had been opened. - The Mercury

description.hltext_display: Fushi Copperweld's New Anti-Theft Product Hides In Plain Sight
description.content:
Fushi Copperweld Inc. (Nasdaq: FSIN) is pleased to announce the launch of Copperweld® HIDE™, a new product designed to combat the rising theft of copper wire in industrial applications.
Copperweld® HIDE™ is a copper-clad steel wire jacketed in a steel-grey colored PVC coating. It performs the same function as pure copper wire in electrical grounding, railroad signaling and many other applications highly exposed to theft, but it is primarily made of steel, and as such, of minimal scrap value to plunderers. Furthermore, the grey PVC makes it look from a distance like plain galvanized steel wire.
HIDE™ is Fushi Copperweld's first brand developed specifically for a jacketed product, and the company is getting enthusiastic feedback from customers. Many of them already know too well the damage and losses that come from copper theft, which is a burgeoning industrial crime in many parts of the world.
"HIDE™ is a quadruple-threat to copper thieves," says Joe Longever, CEO of Fushi Copperweld. "First, it looks like steel until you're very close to it. Second, it is made of genuine high-strength Copperweld® -- much harder to cut than copper wire -- which should be the first tip-off to would-be thieves that they are going after the wrong material. Third, if they do decide to cut, they will be sorely disappointed when the time comes to cash in, because the metal is of very little scrap value. Finally, Fushi Copperweld is even imprinting this message on the jacket itself, in both English and Spanish in the American market, to go one step further in letting copper thieves know to move on."
In the United States and Canada, HIDE™ will be sold by ACA Conductor Accessories, Fushi Copperweld's exclusive distributor for grounding products. Fushi Copperweld will market the product directly in the rest of the world. The company has begun shipments of the product, which was previewed at the IEEE's Transmission and Distribution Conference and Exposition in New Orleans in April.
Fushi Copperweld is the leading global manufacturer of copper-clad bimetallic wire used in a variety of telecommunication, utility, transportation and other electrical products.
For more information, please visit the Fushi Copperweld web site, at www.fushicopperweld.com .

description.hltext_display: Did Your Girlfriend Break Up With You? How Are You Coping With the Grief?
description.content:
Looking at your present state my first question to you is did your girlfriend breakup with you, and chances are high that you are going to say yes. My second question follows: how are you coping with it? This is because, not many men know how to handle their emotions, especially grief.
The first step in grief management is to understand why did your girlfriend breakup with you? Whatever the reasons are, you need to analyze them frankly and take responsibility of your role in the breakup. Once you have identified the areas where the need gaps have not been met, you need to rectify your areas first, before you put the blame on your ex. This auto-rectification mode can ultimately make you a better person.
Once you know for sure why your girlfriend broke up with you, you need to take active steps to come out of the grief and work constructively towards a better quality of mental health. Remember sorrow bogs you down, happiness uplifts and liberates you.
Talking out your problems can ease the mental pain to a large extent. While women usually find another shoulder to cry on pretty easily, men mostly find it difficult to express their inner feelings to another man. Why not play the guitar, compose a song or write poems about broken heart? You could even start a blog about love poems and later publish them! When did your girlfriend breakup with you? No matter whether the grief is fresh and raw or old, you can still write about them in a journal - you would be amazed at the therapeutic value such writings have.
Make a conscious effort to forget how, when and why did your girlfriend breakup with you. Allow the past to rest in peace and the future dawn tomorrow. What is important is how you deal with the present, the NOW of the moment. That is the only thing that is relevant. To help you with such selective amnesia, start off by discarding all the things that remind you of our ex. This includes cards, gifts, photos, even mails in your inbox. The less you see, the less you think about why did your girlfriend breakup with you. Another wonderful thing that can help you to weaken the memories of your ex is to catch up with friends who make you laugh and divert your mind in other activities. Make concerted effort to stop brooding about all that you have loved and lost. If it has gone, probably its time was up.
Once you have stopped pondering and brooding about why did your girlfriend breakup with you, start dating again. Love blooms with the right environment and with the right nourishment. You have one life, live it to the hilt.

description.hltext_display: 中国今年财政收入将超8万亿 税负过高引争议
description.author: www.hexun.com
description.content:
【《财经》记者 郑猛】2010年中国税收收入预计将达到7.7万亿元。加上非税收入，今年财政收入走入“8万亿”时代已成定局。
据财政部此前的统计，今年前11个月，全国非税收入已达8408.15亿元。即使这部分收入在12月份没有增加，连同税收收入7.7万亿在内，2010年全年的财政收入也将超过8万亿元。
不仅如此，今年全年的财政预算收入目标为73930亿元，已于11月份提前完成。1月-11月，全国财政收入达到76740.51亿元，超出全年目标2810.51亿元。
“十一五”期间，中国财政收入从“十五”末年的3万亿元起步，以年均1万亿元的幅度增长，年度增速数倍于同期GDP。
中国的税负是否过高？天则经济研究所理事长茅于轼对《财经》记者表示，纳税人缴税是用来购买政府公共服务的，这些年国家税收增加很快，但民众享受的公共服务并未增长那么多、那么快。
茅于轼说，税收是纳税人购买政府服务的价格，因此判断税收的高与低，要看所享受公共服务的质量和数量。质量好，服务多，纳税人就可以多缴税。从2000年开始，中国的税收收入增加了很多倍。与此同时，纳税人享受的公共服务确实也在增加，但好像并没有像税收增长那样，增加那么多、那么快。
两者之间的差额到哪里去了？茅于轼认为，一个重要因素是政府的行政开支太大，而针对这一痼疾，政府还总是“捂着盖着”。一个最近的例子就是，关于北京市公车的数量，有关部门表示“不便”回应。
此前，福布斯杂志推出了2009年全球税负痛苦指数排行榜，中国内地排名全球第二。对此茅于轼认为，在各个国家，政府提供服务的质量和数量不同，因此中国的税负与其他国家相比没有实际意义。不过，税收增长幅度总是大大高于同期GDP，倒是值得关注，尽管财税部门对其也作过一些解释，但都不大能令公众满意。
“税收应该依法征税，而不能总是依计划征税。”茅于轼说。
【免责声明】本文仅代表作者本人观点，与和讯网无关。和讯网站对文中陈述、观点判断保持中立，不对所包含内容的准确性、可靠性或完整性提供任何明示或暗示的保证。请读者仅作参考，并请自行承担全部责任。
更多信息请到《财经》杂志网站

description.hltext_display: Högskoleverket: Få doktorsexaminerade i näringslivet
description.content:
Få doktorsexaminerade i näringslivet
Två av tre personer med en doktorsexamen jobbar inom offentlig sektor,
framför allt på universitet och högskolor. Betydligt färre finns ute i
näringslivet. Det visar en ny rapport från Högskoleverket.
Högskoleverket har studerat gruppen doktorsexaminerade för att se hur
etableringen på arbetsmarknaden ser ut och inom vilka olika verksamheter
de finns.
Bland dem som tog en doktorsexamen under åren 2000 och 2002 hade 88
procent etablerat sig på arbetsmarknaden 2008. Bland dem som
examinerades 2005 var andelen lägre, 80 procent. Runt 95 procent hade
ett yrke som tillhör den högsta nivån när det gäller kvalifikationskrav.
Många blir kvar på lärosätena
Antalet forskarutbildade i landet har ökat med 35 procent under de
senaste tio åren. Den kraftiga utbyggnaden har bland annat motiverats av
att fler och fler forskarutbildade kommer att vara verksamma utanför
universitet och högskolor och av det kommande generationsskiftet med
stora pensionsavgångar. Det finns en stark tradition bland personer med
doktorsexamen att arbeta på universiteten och högskolorna. Uppföljningen
av dem som examinerades visar att omkring var tredje arbetar som
universitets- och högskolelärare. Totalt sett arbetar cirka 65 procent
inom stat, kommun eller landsting och bara runt 35 procent inom
näringslivet. Det kan jämföras med att av alla förvärvsarbetande på den
svenska arbetsmarknaden finns 66 procent inom näringslivet, vilket
alltså är nästan dubbelt så stor andel jämfört med de forskarutbildade.
Naturvetare, medicinare och tekniker lämnar högskolan
Bland personer med en doktorsexamen inom medicin har nästan tre
fjärdedelar lämnat universiteten, vilket inte är speciellt förvånande
med tanke på att landstinget är den största arbetsgivaren. Majoriteten
av naturvetarna och teknikerna etablerar sig också utanför
högskolesektorn. Det motsatta gäller för doktorsexaminerade inom
samhällsvetenskap och humaniora, där flertalet stannar inom högskolan.
Hela rapporten finns på www.hsv.se (http://www.hsv.se).
Anders Wiberg
tfn 08-563 088 36, anders.wiberg@hsv.se
Annika Pontén
tfn 08-563 087 57, annika.ponten@hsv.se
------------------------------------------------------------
Denna information skickades av Cision http://www.cisionwire.se

description.hltext_display: 온천욕 즐기는 원숭이들 “청산이~”
KAFFE, med rapport från Umeå Psykiatris svarta baksida...
description.author: Catharina Alperud
description.content:
...med versaler. Japp, så är det idag. Trött så in i norden men har precis som många andra endel att fixa inför dopparedagen.
Öppnade min mail i morse efter några dagars förträngande av att det inte bara är pappersbrev som behöver öppnas utan även elektronisk.
Det var bra att jag gjorde det. Hade fått ett brev från ytterligare en person där som haft med samma fantastiska enhet som mig att göra, där den oerhört effektiva, ambitiösa, närvarande avdelningsföreståndaren ytterligare en gång ignorerat mail och förfrågningar från oss patienter (JA, jag är ironisk). Precis som i mitt fall har en licensansökan skickats iväg, läkaren som har hand om ärendet (även min gamla) förflyttas och då försvinner helt plötsligt allt ansvar kring detta. Man får vänta helt enkelt....eller bråka så in i h****e. Det jag ställer mig frågande är varför vi ska behöva göra det när våra mänsliga rättigheter ständigt kränks genom detta förfarande.
Jag kan ta många förklaringar om varför situationen är som den är. Jag vet också varför men det rättfärdigar inte att en hel enhet går i stäv och inget görs åt de som drabbas. Tyvärr tror jag inget händer av att skriva till högsta hönset.....Ledsen.
DETTA ÄR RENT UTSAGT FÖR JÄVLIGT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Du som avdelningsföreståndare ska skämmas eller helt enkelt säga upp dig! Säg upp dig tycker jag är en bättre idé för skämmas verkar du inte kunna göra utan istället vara ironisk och le när man frågar om viktiga saker....Som om man får behålla sin läkare och du ler från dina höga hästar och lovar vitt och brett att h*n inte ska sluta för att en månad senare få veta av min KANS att h*n slutar och flyttar till en annan vårdinstans för att skaffa sig dubbelkompetens.
Det är jul nu. Alla ska vara glada. Även vi som sitter obehandlade, hängande i luften utan adekvat vård. Säkerligen får vi lite extra lugnande utskrivet....eller just ja! Det finns ingen läkare................ Hoppas du kan sitta med din familj och trycka i dig julmat denna afton tant avdelningsföreståndare. Säkert är det någon av oss som inte kommer att göra det, säkerligen är det någon som får en sängplats på akutintagsavdelningen.
Man kan fråga sig varför det brister så ofantligt................
Jag önskar dig INTE en God Jul, när ni brister på detta sätt gång på gång är tålamodet slut. I januari har det gåt 1 år sedan jag kom till din avdelning Tant Avdelningsföreståndare. TACK för ännu ett år borta från kartan av mitt så kallade liv. Säkerligen är det fler som tackar dig med versaler.

description.hltext_display: Orpheus Media Research Signs 10 Pilots for Myna™ Music -- a New and Highly Advanced Music-to-Music Search and Discovery Platform
description.content:
SITE SEARCHWEB SEARCH BY
| Information contained on this page is provided by companies via press release distributed through PR Newswire, an independent third-party content provider. PR Newswire, WorldNow and this Station make no warranties or representations in connection therewith.
SOURCE Orpheus Media Research
Myna to demo at MIDEM showcasing its "use music to find music" approach
NEW YORK, Dec. 21, 2010 /PRNewswire/ -- Orpheus Media Research (OMR), an advanced music research and development company that automates the search, analysis, and discovery of commercial-use music, announced today that it has established 10 pilots for its flagship product, Myna™ Music. Myna is the only pure music-to-music search and discovery platform that uses music to find music, producing higher quality matches and analyzing music faster than existing keyword search technology. OMR will be demoing Myna at MIDEM, January 22-26, 2011 at the American Association of Independent Music (A2IM) Pavilion.
Myna is primarily targeted to production libraries, music aggregators, and online music streaming services where high quality searches of large catalogs are critical. Myna's "use music to find music" approach is unique in that it references the music directly to deliver high quality matches for every genre. By focusing on key musical attributes of the "seed" music instead of descriptive meta tags, Myna's comprehensive search exposes matches across entire music libraries, no matter what their size. Myna analyzes and indexes new music 1000x faster than manual meta tagging. Additionally, the technology can detect duplicates and eliminate the bias introduced during the meta tagging process.
"These pilots validate the industry's need for Myna's drastically different approach to music search and discovery," said Bruce Margetich, Chief Executive Officer, Orpheus Media Research. "Once we've demonstrated the power of Myna's music-to-music search technology without keywords or meta tags, the speed and quality of the results will speak for themselves."
Myna's pilots include national and international production music catalogs, music aggregators, performing rights organizations, and online music streaming services, representing some of the top names in the industry.
About Orpheus Media Research
Orpheus Media Research is an advanced music research and development company that automates the search, analysis, and discovery of commercial-use music. Its flagship product, Myna™, is the only pure music-to-music search and discovery platform that uses music to find music, producing higher quality matches and analyzing music up to 1000x faster than existing keyword search technology. Myna combines deep musical expertise with adaptive technology to deliver highly accurate and relevant matches based on mood and emotion. Created by musicians, Myna is the first platform to look at musical context and grammar to understand/interpret musical mood. By referencing the music directly, matches are more accurate and large catalogs of music can be quickly analyzed with or without meta tags. For more information, visit www.mynamusic.com
©2010 PR Newswire. All Rights Reserved.

description.hltext_display: Forensic Fluids Laboratories Names Uproar Communications Agency of Record

description.content: --(PR.com)-- Forensic Fluids Laboratories, a saliva-based drug testing laboratory selected to the prestigious Inc. 500 list and located in Kalamazoo, Michigan, announced today that it has selected Uproar Communications as its agency of record. The announcement was made by Bridget Lorenz Lemberg, Lab Director for Forensic Fluids Laboratories. We wanted an agency with experience in our arena and a strong background in brand management I feel that we got both.The account will be handled out of Uproar Communications office in Ann Arbor Michigan and will include a brand audit, creative and media planning and media buying services. It is very exciting to have the opportunity to work with the Forensic Fluids Lab team. They are a young company with strong credentials, passionate attitude and a track record of success, commented Uproars President, Heather Wendt. We look forward to contributing to their achievements and successes.###About Forensic Fluids LabsStarted in 2005 by Bridget Lorenz Lemberg, Forensic Fluids Laboratories specializes in saliva drug testing. Bridget is a Forensic Toxicologist with 20+ years experience in toxicology. Since that time, she has testified in court concerning drug and alcohol levels in urine, blood, serum, saliva, and other matrices. Forensic Fluids Laboratories is a certified WBENC business.About Uproar CommunicationsUproar Communications, Ltd. serves a broad range of clients across the country with a variety of marketing techniques including both print and online marketing. Uproar Communications is certified by the Womens Business Enterprise National Council.Press Contacts:Uproar CommunicationsJonathan Wilson(p) 734-975-8888 (e) wilsonj@uproarcom.com

description.hltext_display: Öppna mig!
description.author: Gabriella Eker
description.content:
Det här med julklappar alltså.
Varför måste man vänta med att öppna dem när de bara ligger där under granen och ber om uppmärksamhet?
"Öppna mig öppna mig öppna mig"
Det är säkert jätte jobbigt att bara ligga där under inslagen i papper...
Lite har jag fuskat och tittat så jag vet att det finns i allafall ett paket till mig därunder granen, undrar vem som tror att jag har varit snäll nog för att få en klapp?
Mina klor är ju vässade dygnet runt och den där munkaveln som borde stoppa alla grodor från att flyga fritt saknas lite nu och då (ärlighet varar längst?)
2 Dagar till och sedan så kan ni ju försöka att stoppa mig från att slita av pappret.
Jag älskar paket!!

description.hltext_display: 725kg buffalo gets driven to bar for pint of ale
description.content:
A male bison weighing 725kg likes to take a ride in his owner's car and to also join him for a pint at a bar in Canada.
Bailey Jr is driven to a Spruce Grove bar, about 30km, west of Edmonton, in a convertible by farmer Jim Sautner, and a camera crew from Animal Planet filmed him chugging down a root beer and a bottle of beer.
According to the Edmonton Sun, every morning Jim and Linda Sautner would sit down for a family breakfast in their home with Bailey Jr.
"At breakfast we put a tub of oats at the table for him, and I eat oatmeal - I read the newspapers to him sometimes too," the Daily Telegraph quoted Jim as saying.
"He's part of the family. Like one of the kids," he stated.
Jim takes his companion - in his customised convertible car - to a local bar for a beer. Bailey Jr drinks the alcohol from a feeder they've mounted to the car's hood.
About three or four months ago Bailey Jr was used to shoot a Kohler Beer commercial that occasionally airs on the Wild TV network.
Jim said he wants to walk Bailey Jr down Hollywood Boulevard and score the buffalo more commercial contracts. (ANI)

description.hltext_display: 아들이야, 딸이야? 의사, “그 중간쯤?!”
description.content:
아들인줄 알고 키웠는데 “알고 보니 딸?” 황당
[ⓒ '글로벌 석간 종합일간지' 아시아투데이]
[아시아투데이=김수경 기자] 남아프리카 공화국의 한 부부는 1개월 전 태어난 자녀의 성별 때문에 큰 고민에 빠졌다.
영국 대중지 더선은 22일(현지시간) 보도를 통해 당혹스러운 사실을 알게 된 커플 마델레시아와 케네스의 소식을 전했다.
보도에 따르면 아들 케니 히스콕을 낳고 행복한 시간을 보내온 이들 부부는 최근 케니의 생식기에 문제가 생겨 병원에 갔다가 케니가 남자가 아니라는 얘기를 의사로부터 듣게 됐다.
의사의 설명에 따르면 케니는 호르몬 이상을 유발하는 효소의 결핍으로 인해 장기가 돌출됐는데 이것이 생식기로 오인됐다는 것이다.
케니의 부모는 이 사실을 알고는 케니의 이름을 ‘맥켄지’라고 새로 짓고 수술을 고려하고 있다.
마델레시아는 “의사가 말하길 맥켄지는 남자도 여자도 아닌 그 중간쯤이라고 한다”면서 “하지만 우리는 정말 예쁜 딸을 얻었고 그 사실이 자랑스럽다”고 말했다.
{ⓒ '글로벌 석간 종합일간지' 아시아투데이}

description.hltext_display: Matric marking finally over
description.content:
Spare a thought for the thousands of teachers who not only have to pass matric each year, but are only now putting their pens down after marking 2010?s more than four million final exam papers.
Most of the 600 000 candidates have already hit party hotspots but teachers, who could find themselves thrown out of marking centres if they don?t make the grade, are only now putting up their feet.
Anne Oberholzer, head of the Independent Examinations Board (IEB), who met at Umalusi on Tuesday to finalise the independent examining body?s matric papers, said teachers were expected to complete the exam papers they mark. ?Teachers not fully aware of the content and possible variations in the answers of papers are asked to leave the marking centre and are replaced by another marker. ?All markers are expected to write the paper they are marking to ensure they are able to participate actively in the marking standardisation discussion which precedes marking,? she said. To date, no IEB teacher has had to be replaced.
More than 600 000 pupils wrote their finals in the government system in 2010; Oberholzer said 8300 candidates had written the IEB exam and the 100 000 scripts had been marked by 1600 teachers. ?It?s difficult to predict the pass rate but the results look fine with no surprises.? The IEB results will be released to schools on January 3 for final checking and available to pupils on January 4. The Department of Education results will be released on January 6. - Pretoria News

event_or_fact.property: teachers were expected to complete the exam papers they mark

description.hltext_display: "크리스마스 트리와 결혼할래"
description.content:
크리스마스 트리와 사랑에 빠져
[ⓒ '글로벌 석간 종합일간지' 아시아투데이]
[아시아투데이=정희영 기자] 영국에서 최근 크리스마스 트리와 사랑에 빠진 한 남성이 화제가 되고 있다.
더 선이 21일(현지시간) 보도한 바에 따르면 영국 잉그랜드 윌트셔의 멜크샘에 거주하는 앰디 팍이라는 남성은 지난 17년간 매일을 크리스마스 이벤트를 벌이고 있다.
주위 사람들은 그가 크리스마스에 중독됐다며 ‘미스터 크리스마스’라는 별명도 붙여줬다.
앤디는 최근 크리스마스 트리와 결혼하는 계획까지 세우고 있는 것으로 알려졌다. 이 트리는 지난 2년 동안 집안에 설치해 놓은 플라스틱 모조 트리인 것으로 알려졌다.
그는 “세상 그 무엇보다도 크리스마스 트리를 사랑하기 때문에 결혼을 결심했다”고 말했다.
앤디는 “이미 결혼반지도 준비했다”면서 “다만 아직 어느 가지에 걸어줄 지를 정하지 못했다”고 덧붙였다.
{ⓒ '글로벌 석간 종합일간지' 아시아투데이}

description.hltext_display: Betsson AB: Betsson öppnar shoppen på nytt
description.content:
Betsson öppnar shoppen på nytt
I dag kl 15:00 öppnar Betsson sin shop på Götgatan 37 – för tredje
gången.
Efter att Regeringsrätten i september inte meddelat prövningstillstånd i
frågan om Betssons shop kunde hållas öppen med stöd av EU-rätten, har
shoppen hållits stängd. Nu öppnar Betsson shoppen igen men den här
gången har Betsson tvingats följa Lotteriinspektionens föreläggande från
2008 vilket innebär att inga av Betssons kännetecken eller logotyper
längre finns i butiken.
Efter EU-domstolens domar i september i år anser Betsson att det finns
stöd för att öppna shoppen.
”Eftersom det är lagligt att erbjuda speltjänster till betssons kunder
kommer vi att fortsätta kämpa för att ge kunderna den valfrihet som
borde vara en självklarhet” säger Betssons VD Pontus Lindwall i en
kommentar.
För ytterligare information, kontakta:
Pontus Lindwall, VD och koncernchef, tfn +46 (0)8 506 403 10 eller +46
(0)708 27
51 55, pontus@betsson.com
------------------------------------------------------------

description.hltext_display: Travel Photographer of the Year
description.author: Monica
description.content:
Le più belle fotografie
Le più belle fotografie di viaggio sono state premiate in occasione dei , concorso internazionale giunto alle settima edizione che premia fotografi amatoriali e non che hanno catturato i momenti più suggestivi e salienti dei loro viaggi in giro per il mondo.
La giuria composta da un gruppo di esperti, ha giudicato partecipanti provenienti da 80 Paesi diversi con un’età compresa tra i 5 e gli 88 anni.
Il vincitore assoluto dell’edizione 2010 è il canadese Larry Louie , con una serie di scatti in bianco e nero che ritraggono il Mali e la Cina ; nella gallery la moschea di Djenne , nel Mali .
Il premio “Young Photographer of the Year 2010” è stato assegnato alla 17enne britannica Kat Waters , che ha ritratto uno scorcio del quartiere Farringdon nel quel di Londra .
Anche il 18enne norvegese Ivar August Bull ha colpito per la sua foto che ritrae una tempesta di neve a Skarvheimen , in Norvegia
Nella categoria “Big World Small World”, dedicata ai fotografi alle prime armi under 14, ha vinto l’americano Chase Guttman di soli 13 anni, con una serie di scatti sul Guatemala ; fino all’ultimo anche il quattordicenne inglese Sam Bayliss è stato in gara per questo riconoscimento grazie alla sua serie di fotografie della Tanzania .
Haoqing Cheng , quindicenne cinese ha conquistato il titolo “Big World Small World” nella categoria “Enviroment” grazie a una splendida foto raffigurante il villaggio di Wengu nel Sichuan .
Il “Miglior Portfolio”, nella categoria “Incontri”, va all’inglese James Morgan per la serie realizzata a Sulawesi , in Indonesia , mentre la “Miglior immagine singola in un portfolio” nella categoria “ persone dal mondo” è andata all’italiano Alex Masi per un’ immagine scattata con una Canon 5D MkII a Bamiyan , in Afghanistan .
L’inglese Quintin Lake si è aggiudicato nella categoria “Posti straordinari” il premio come “Miglior Portfolio”, per alcuni scatti suggestivi della sua spedizione a Knud Rasmussens Land , in Groenlandia ; sempre nella stessa sezione, la “Miglior immagine singola in un portfolio” è andata allo sloveno Matjaz Krivic per la foto scattata nello Yemen , in particolare a Shugruf . Il “Miglior Portfolio”, nella categoria “Mondo in movimento”, è stato giudicato il lavoro dell’americano Richard Murai per la serie di fotografie scattate nel Bhutan ; stessa location per la foto della svedese Maja Flink vincitrice del premio “One Shot Avventura” che immortala due monaci che si preparano a seguire un’eclissi solare sulla montagna di Bemri .
Il “Nuovo talento del 2010” è l’americano Eric Kruszewski , riconoscimento acquisito per la serie di scatti realizzati durante una spedizione in Alaska .
www.tpoty.com

description.hltext_display: Manhattan Movers: Always at Your Service
description.content: RAt times it is necessary that they relocate because of some personal situations or may be due to official reasons. Packing all the fragile and valuable things and moving them to another city or state or even sometimes other country can never be done by a single person himself and he sure needs expert professional guides such as the Manhattan movers to help him through this process. If you want to move with much comfort it is necessary to choose Manhattan movers who render the service of quality packing and who are trustworthy. Therefore it is essential that you first browse the internet or check with your friends who have recently relocated and choose the best among the huge numbers of Manhattan movers companies available. The first thing which you should check while selecting your moving company is to see for a moving company in your local are, because this helps in visiting their office easily to check the conditions with the authorities. Analyze if that Manhattan movers has a good reputation among its customers. And once you are satisfied about the good name and performances of the company; ask them if they are properly insured and have all the documents needed for the shifting. This is essential as you are entrusting them with all your valuables. The next step involved is to write down an approximate number of things you want to be packed and shifted by the Manhattan Movers. Then you should choose three qualified moving companies and ask their quotations. Then it would be easy for you to compare the price quoted between these companies. Then select the best moving company that suits all your needs and most importantly that suits your budget as well. Also see if that particular company packs the things in boxes of good quality. Thus relax and enjoy your move with the professional help from the Manhattan movers!

description.hltext_display: Stonehenge ready to mark solstice
description.content:
Hundreds of people are expected at Stonehenge to see the sun rise on the winter solstice.
The solstice annually attracts an eclectic mix - Druids, hippies, sun worshippers and those who are curious to experience the ancient festival.
Members of the public will also visit the site, near Salisbury Plain, Wiltshire, hoping to see the sun rise through the ancient stones.
The shortest day of the year often falls on December 21, but this year the druid and pagan community will mark the first day of winter today because the modern calendar of 365 days a year - with an extra day every four years - does not correspond exactly to the solar year of 365.2422 days.
Peter Carson of English Heritage said: "We are delighted to offer people a warm welcome to Stonehenge this Winter Solstice.
"Over the years, the event has grown from a handful of people to a celebration enjoyed by a couple of thousand of people.
"We work very closely with the Druid and Pagan community to ensure that the event is a success."
The word solstice comes from the Latin phrase for "sun stands still". During the winter solstice the sun is closer to the horizon than at any other time during the year, meaning shorter days and longer nights.
The day after the winter solstice marks the beginning of lengthening days leading up to the summer solstice in June.

event_or_fact.property: We work very closely with the Druid and Pagan community to ensure that the event is a success.
We are delighted to offer people a warm welcome to Stonehenge this Winter Solstice.

description.hltext_display: PML-Q offers help to JUI-F in ousting Balochistan government
description.content:
The Pakistan Muslim League-Q (PML-Q) has offered help to the Jamiat Ulema-e-Islam (JUI-F) in ousting the Balochistan government.
Talking in a TV programme, PML-Q President Chaudhry Shujaat Hussain said that if the JUI-F decided in favour of the in-House change in Balochistan, his party would support the bid.
Shujaat also said that his party would not allow amendment in Pakistan's Blasphemy Law, The Nation reported.
He, however, underlined the need for formulating a new law to ensure ending misuses of the Act, and suggesting strict punishment for those who wrongly blame and involve others in legal proceedings.
Meanwhile, Maulana Fazlur Rehman said that his party had submitted applications to the Speaker National Assembly and the Chairman Senate to sit on the opposite benches.
Talking to newsmen in the federal capital, Fazl said that the JUI-F's parliamentary secretaries in National Assembly and Senate had also tendered their resignations. (ANI)

description.hltext_display: 南沙工作小組會議 昆明召開 (中央社)
description.content:
（中央社記者林行健馬尼拉22日專電）南沙群島各主權聲索國的代表，今起在中國昆明召開3天的工作小組會議，希望為南沙群島主權爭議帶來長遠的解決辦法。
中國駐菲律賓大使劉建超今天在記者會表示，工作小組會議將討論如何共同推出更具法律約束力的「南海行為準則」，確保區域的和平與穩定。
劉建超強調，中國與東南亞鄰國有足夠的智慧解決南沙群島主權爭議，不需要第3者介入。他說，第3者的介入只會使問題複雜化。
美國高層官員曾表示，南海島嶼領土爭議攸關美國利益，也願意協助東南亞國家與中國啟動多邊談判。
劉建超說，昆明的工作小組會議沒有美國官員參加。991222

description.hltext_display: Zapatero promete determinación porque el peligro no está conjurado" en la zona euro
description.content:
El jefe del Ejecutivo, José Luis Rodríguez Zapatero, se ha comprometido hoy a asumir con "plena determinación" sus compromisos con la UE, continuando en el camino de la austeridad, las reformas y la transparencia, porque, ha advertido, "aún el peligro no está conjurado" en la zona euro.
El presidente del Gobierno, José Luis Rodríguez Zapatero, durante una comparecencia ante un Pleno extraordinario del Congreso de los Diputados. EFE/Archivo
Zapatero ha comparecido ante el pleno del Congreso para presentar las conclusiones del último Consejo Europeo celebrado en Bruselas y ha destacado el compromiso "claro y rotundo" de la UE con la estabilidad de la moneda única, lo que implica que se impulsarán cuantas acciones sean necesarias para garantizarla.
La "crucial" situación actual, ha añadido, exige responsabilidad y el Gobierno va a asumirla, convencido de que los últimos ataques de los mercados financieros, que están afectando de nuevo a España, "no responden a los fundamentos de nuestra economía".
Frente a ellos, ha subrayado que la respuesta del Gobierno es "clara": seguirá cumpliendo con la estabilidad presupuestaria, corrigiendo el déficit en los plazos convenidos; y no abdicará de las reformas que juzga "imprescindibles" para que la economía alcance su crecimiento potencial, superior al del conjunto de la UE.
Entre las reformas ha destacado la del sistema de pensiones y ha avanzado que el proyecto que el Gobierno aprobará el 28 de enero tendrá la misma "ambición" que la propuesta inicial que defendió a principios de este año -que incluía el retraso de la edad de jubilación- y recogerá las recomendaciones del Pacto de Toledo.

description.hltext_display: Divided FCC adopts Internet rules (Reuters)
South Africa Promises Drink Drivers Will Be Raped In Jail
description.author: Anorak
description.content:
IF you are caught drink driving in South Africa you will be raped in jail. If you are not raped, then you might be able to sue the makers of this TV advert for making a false claim.
Brandhouse Beverages, who made the ad, say:
“We wanted to create a campaign which didn’t simply create awareness but changed consumer behaviour so that they never drink and drive again.”
Unless they are drinking to forget, or ease the pain…

description.hltext_display: Four killed in Iran quake (Lead)
description.content:
At least four people were killed in the strong earthquake which shook the Kerman province in southeastern Iran, state media reported Tuesday.
The local governor's office initially reported seven killed after the 6.5-magnitude quake struck late Monday, but gradually reduced that figure to four, the Mehr news agency reported.
Scientists were quoted as saying that the quake could have caused a "national catastrophe" if it had hit more densely populated areas.
According to Kerman governor Ismael Najar, the casualties were mainly in the villages of Chah Qanbar, Tak Seyfeldini and Sarze Rigan where the population is rather low.
State television said that due to the timely dispatch of relief and Red Crescent teams to the quake-hit sites, many people could be rescued from the debris overnight.
Kerman province was hit in December 2003 by a devastating earthquake which killed more than 30,000 people in the city of Bam and nearby villages.
--DPA
kv/vt
( 163 Words)
2010-12-21-18:10:00 (IANS)

event_or_fact.property: killed more than 30,000 people in the city of Bam and nearby villages
Four killed; At least four people were killed

description.hltext_display: 資訊科技趨勢 低碳平板智慧 (中央社)
description.content:
（中央社記者韋樞台北22日電）資策會產業情報研究所勾勒出明年資訊電子業將朝低碳風、智慧風、平板風等十大趨勢邁進。資策會表示，新興國家成長動能雖大，但台商應提防貨幣升值、通膨、資產泡沫化等危機。
資策會產業情報研究所 (MIC)今天舉行「前瞻2011高科技產業十大趨勢記者會」；研究所所長詹文男勾勒出全球資訊電子產業的十大趨勢，包括低碳風、智慧風、平板風、平台風、APP風、3D風、體感風、雲端風、社群風、4G風等。
詹文男表示，全球講究低碳風，資訊電子業應先從自身做起，採取節能對策降低對環境的危害，接著再應用資通訊技術達到更有效率的節能減碳成效，最後才是和環境生態共存。
詹文男舉例，正在發展中的明顯範例就是智慧電網。2009年全球智慧電網市場規模近700億美元，預期2015年將成長至1900億美元，年複合成長率約18%。
此外，從智慧手機、智慧行動平台、智慧電視到智慧城市都是未來智慧風的必走潮流。詹文男指出，全球智慧手機2010年出貨量2億8600萬支，滲透率21.6%，2012年將飛躍成長到5億800萬支，滲透率達35.1%。
新一代的智慧電視盒方面，2010年台廠出貨量占全球的4成，在消費者對線上影音、網路租片等服務需求持續增加，以及Google、Apple加入市場的情況下，可望提升台廠出貨比重，預估2011年全球市場規模達2000萬台。
平板風更是在蘋果的iPad問市後，各家對平板裝置趨之若鶩，而伴隨Android新平台的推出，兩者結合後更加大成長動能。
詹文男說，明年全球平板裝置出貨3831萬台，年增率高達212%，2012年更達5232萬台，年增率達36.6%，但到了2015年出貨量約達7116萬台，但年增率趨緩至7.8% 。
3D顯示技術方面，未來將由電視朝向可攜式產品延伸。他強調，包括3D電視、監視器、筆記型電腦等，到2014年均處於高成長階段，其中3D電視2014年市占達21%。
詹文男強調，從全球經濟成長趨勢來看，復甦力道放緩，主要是先進國家政府債台高築，金融市場脆弱；新興國家成長動能雖大，但會面臨熱錢流入、貨幣升值和通膨、資產泡沫化等問題，台商宜提高警覺。991222

description.hltext_display: Failed Apprentice facing court
description.content:
A former contestant in Lord Sugar's hit Apprentice show is due to appearing in court charged with fraud.
Mortgage broker Christopher Farrell will appear before magistrates in Plymouth charged with four counts of fraud by false representation.
Farrell, 29, from The Wirral, Merseyside, was originally arrested in August, shortly before the current series of the BBC 1 show - which finished on Sunday - aired.
The former Royal Marine, who heard "You're Fired" from Lord Sugar in week eight of the show, made a guest appearance on Sunday night's final when he was part of winner Stella English's team creating, marketing and selling an alcoholic drink.
His Apprentice profile said he claims to show no emotion, likes to be pushed and as a former Royal Marine is not afraid to give people a "kick up the backside".
A keen golfer and health and fitness fanatic, he also claims to be "focused and driven".
He told BBC executives: "I've been to the other side of things where friends lose legs, lose limbs, so I know I'm lucky to be where I am.
"I was a sniper in the Royal Marines and I take that killer instinct across into business."

event_or_fact.property: "I've been to the other side of things where friends lose legs, lose limbs, so I know I'm lucky to be where I am. "I was a sniper in the Royal Marines and I take that killer instinct across into business.

description.hltext_display: Rapper confesses to 1993 murder
description.content:
New York - The 1993 killing of a man outside a housing complex was a cold case for years until a suspect appeared on detectives' doorstep last week.
Apparently haunted by his secret, once-promising rapper G Dep walked into a police station to confess to the shooting, authorities said. The rapper is being held without bail after surprised investigators matched the details he provided to the unsolved slaying of John Henkel. Initially charged with murder, he was indicted on Tuesday on a charge that won't be disclosed until a court date in January.
For the 36-year-old G Dep, the case marks a nadir in his long fall from rapper on the rise. After scoring a couple of hits in the early 2000?s, he has been mired in drug and legal problems in recent years, though he was attempting a comeback with an album released online in 2010.
But his lawyer said on Tuesday the shooting case also represented his determination to turn a troubled life around. ?He's trying to remake his life,? attorney Michael Alperstein said. Guided by a substance-treatment programme, ?he was making amends.? The bearded rapper said nothing during a brief appearance on Tuesday in a Manhattan court, looking back at about a dozen relatives and supporters as he was led away. They declined to comment afterward.
Henkel was shot in the chest three times outside an East Harlem apartment complex early on October 19, 1993, well before G Dep's brief heyday. The rapper told a detective last week he pulled a .40-calibre handgun to rob the victim and fired when he resisted.
At the time of the shooting, ?I didn't think about it? - or even realise the man had died until investigators told him so last week, the rapper said in a jail interview published on Sunday.
But, he said, the shooting ate away at him over the years. ?I started to wonder if all the bad things that happened to me in my life were karma for what I did. You start to think, 'My happiness is because of someone else's sadness,? ? he said. ?I thought that if I turned myself in, it might give me closure.? G Dep, born Trevell Coleman, was one of the rising stars of hip-hop impresario Sean ?Diddy? Combs' Bad Boy Records label in the late 1990?s and early 2000?s. G Dep had hits with ?Special Delivery? and ?Let's Get It?, the second of which featured Diddy and Black Rob. G Dep's videos helped popularise a loose-limbed dance called the Harlem shake, which made the rounds among clubgoers in the early 2000?s. But the Harlem-based rapper's career slumped after his 2001 debut album, ?Child of the Ghetto?. He ran through his money and got entangled with drugs, he said in 2007, fresh from three weeks in jail after an arrest on charges stemming from a dispute with a cellphone salesman.
It was one of at least a dozen arrests on drug, disorderly conduct and other charges since the 1990?s. Records show he pleaded guilty to trespassing as recently as November 2010 and was sentenced to 20 days in jail.
Still, G Dep has been trying to revive his career. He digitally released a new album, ?Ghetto Legend?, in 2010 with a new label, Famous Records. Based in Florida, it focuses on releasing music online.
CEO Jeffrey Collins said the rapper never mentioned the shooting but was frank about his other problems when they began working together about six months ago. ?He told me he was now clean,? Collins said. ?He wants a clean start.? - Sapa-AP

event_or_fact.property: the shooting ate away at him over the years
the rapper never mentioned the shooting but was frank about his other problems when they began working together about six months ago
in 2007, fresh from three weeks in jail after an arrest on charges stemming from a dispute with a cellphone salesman

description.hltext_display: Volkswagen Personbilar: Dakar-rallyt 2011: Volkswagen siktar på tredje raka segern
description.content:
Dakar-rallyt 2011: Volkswagen siktar på tredje raka segern
Extrema ökenpassager, svindlande höjder i Anderna och snabba
specialsträckor på grus – Dakar-rallyt är motorsportens längsta och
tuffaste test. Volkswagen-teamet är fast besluten om att vinna titeln
för tredje året i rad.
långt. För tredje gången körs det legendariska rallyt i Sydamerika, från
kust till kust genom Argentina och Chile. Start och mål sker i den
argentinska huvudstaden Buenos Aires.
Rallyts centrum är Atacamaöknen – den mest ofruktbara regionen på
jorden. 6 av de 14 specialsträckorna kommer att köras i dessa
ogästvänliga områden. Höga sanddyner med djup sand, två vändor i Anderna
på höjder över 4 700 meter över havsytan och hårda grusvägar ingår i de
dagliga utmaningarna.
Volkswagen har stått som segrare de senaste två åren och man siktar nu
på ett ”hattrick”.
– De två tidigare segrarna är de största framgångarna som Volkswagen
hittills har uppnått inom motorsporten. Men detta gör ingalunda
uppgiften lättare. Våra rivaler kommer att göra allt som står i deras
makt för att besegra oss. Vi ger oss in i rallyt med tillförsikt och
vårt mål är att vinna för tredje gången i rad, säger Kris Nissen, chef
Volkswagen Motorsport.
Volkswagen är den enda biltillverkaren som vunnit världens tuffaste
rally med dieselteknologi. I kommande rallyt ställer man upp med fyra
bilar som bygger på den nyutvecklade tredje generationen av Race
Touareg. Den dieseldrivna bilen utvecklar 310 hästkrafter.
– Vi har systematiskt optimerat Race Touareg samtidigt som mekaniker,
ingenjörer, förare och kartläsare har arbetat med detaljer för att vara
bättre förberedda än någonsin, fortsätter Kris Nissen.
De fyra teamen med förare och kartläsare har tidigare skördat stora
framgångar för Volkswagen i Dakar-rallyt:
· Carlos Sainz / Lucas Cruz (båda från Spanien): Segrare 2010
· Giniel de Villiers / Dirk von Zitzewitz (Sydafrika / Tyskland):
Segrare 2009
· Nasser Al-Attiyah / Timo Gottschalk (Qatar / Tyskland): Tvåa 2010
· Mark Miller / Ralph Pitchford (USA / Sydafrika): Tvåa 2009
Volkswagen erbjuder en möjlighet att följa rallyt via iPhone och iPod
touch. Via applikationen "Volkswagen Rally mobile" får man nyheter,
resultat, videos och bakgrundsinformation direkt i sin display före,
under och efter rallyt. Applikationen kan från och med nu hämtas
kostnadsfritt hos Apples App Store via
www.volkswagen-motorsport.com/dakar_iPhone (http://www.volkswagen-motors
port.com/dakar_iPhone).

Thomasfolk, Informationschef, 08-553 867 97 eller 070-35 896 57,

description.hltext_display: Custom Shoes and a Unique Shoe Experience
description.author: My Shoe Cafe
description.content: --(PR.com)-- A new concept in designer womens shoes was launched this week by Bethesda native Nina Kimmel, making it the first of its kind on the Eastern Seaboard. My Shoe Cafe, a unique build-it-yourself custom design shoe store, opened this week in the Westfield Montgomery Mall, Bethesda, Maryland. Sporting the slogan, Where sole mates are made, it provides a new and creative experience for woman looking for the ultimate in personalized shoes. My Shoe Cafe is a combination of Kimmels love of designer shoes and a passion she developed for cafes while traveling in Europe. For me and so other women, shoes are not just something you wear on your feet, they are a statement and reflect ones personality, said Kimmel. In My Shoe Cafe you become your own personal shoe designer!Born and raised in Bethesda, 26-year-old Kimmels s love affair with shoes and fashion started with her strutting around in her mothers shoes and clothes as a youngster but developed quickly when as early as 8 years old she had the opportunity to accompany her parents to the fashion centers of Milan, Paris, Madrid and London. Ninas favorite activity when in these cities was to look at, try on and buy shoes.At 16 Ninas personal shoe collection had grown to 200 pairs. While on a summer vacation in Paris with her family that same year, Nina purchased clothes and a fun pair of heels on des Champs-Elysees and then decided to show them off as she hung out at a local cafe. She concluded at this point that fashion and cafes made a perfect fit.My Shoe Cafe offers a broad array of colors, fabrics and shoe accessories for customers to select from when building their own customerized shoe. One of the unique elements of the store is a full time cobbler, with 20 years experience in the shoe-making and repair business. While customers relax and sip complimentary coffee, their personalized shoescustom made to fit each footare created while they wait. An additional service allows customers to bring in their existing shoes and select and add My Shoe Cafe accessories to give their shoes a new and refreshing lift. My Shoe Cafes spacious premises are ideal for a girls night out or for birthday parties, bridal showers, bachelorette parties and similar fun shoe events.For further information contact: Leisa Collins703-598-7360info@myshoecafe.comwww.myshoecafe.comwww.myshoecafe.com###A new show store that allows one to create their own designer shoes has opened in Bethesda Maryland. It is the first of its kind on the Eastern Seaboard.

event_or_fact.property: For me and so other women, shoes are not just something you wear on your feet, they are a statement and reflect ones personality

description.hltext_display: Neuner: Garmisch statt auf Schalke
description.content: Neuner und Gössner: Garmisch statt auf Schalke Winterwunderland statt Hallenspektakel: Doppel-Olympiasiegerin Magdalena Neuner und Miriam Gössner verzichten auf „Biathlon auf Schalke” und gehen stattdessen einen Tag vor Silvester beim City-Rennen in Garmisch-Partenkirchen an den Start. „Magdalena hat im Frühjahr zugesagt, und sie steht zu ihrem Wort. Das zeichnet sie aus”, sagte Organisator Peter Fischer. Gössner wird als Lokalmatador vom Skiclub Garmisch ins Rennen gehen. Die 20-Jährige, bei der WM in Liberec und Olympia in Vancouver mit Staffel-Silber im Langlauf dekoriert, feierte in Östersund als zweimalige Zweite einen starken Saison-Einstand im Weltcup. Sie wird in dem Mixed-Rennen mit ihrem Lebensgefährten Simon Schempp (Uhingen) ein Team bilden. Mit welchem Partner Neuner (Wallgau) zur Titelverteidigung antritt, steht noch nicht fest.

description.hltext_display: Sturm gibt Debüt, Kings glänzen
description.content: Für Marco Sturm hat das neue Kapitel seiner langjährigen NHL-Karriere mit einem Erfolg begonnen. Der deutsche Nationalspieler feierte in der nordamerikanischen Eishockey-Profiliga mit den Los Angeles Kings beim ersten Einsatz nach seinem Wechsel einen 5:0-Sieg über die Colorado Avalanche. Sturm, der nach fast siebenmonatiger Verletzungspause zurückkehrte, spielte in der vierten Sturmreihe und erhielt 11:42 Minuten Eiszeit. Ebenfalls einen gelungenen Abend hatte Jochen Hecht, der mit den Buffalo Sabres 5:2 gegen die Anaheim Ducks gewann. Sturm war am 11. Dezember von den Boston Bruins an L.A. abgegeben worden und hatte fünf Jahre nach seinem Abschied aus Kalifornien wieder bei einem Team aus der Pacific Division angeheuert. Der Stürmer, dessen NHL-Karriere 1997 bei den San Jose Sharks begonnen hatte, absolvierte sein erstes Spiel seit dem 1. Mai. Damals hatte sich der 32-Jährige zum Auftakt des Play-off-Viertelfinales gegen die Philadelphia Flyers einen Kreuz- und Innenbandriss im rechten Knie zugezogen.

description.hltext_display: Coi trọng dạy chữ hơn dạy người?
description.content:
Bạo lực học đường - nỗi lo không của riêng ai:
Coi trọng dạy chữ hơn dạy người?
> Minh định trách nhiệm để quản lý tốt hơn
TP - Các vụ học sinh đánh nhau phần lớn là những học sinh sống trong các gia đình có hoàn cảnh tương đối đặc biệt. Đó là những trường hợp gia đình không trọn vẹn như cha mẹ li dị. Gia đình chiều chuộng con, con được tự do thái quá sinh cái tôi quá lớn, ích kỷ, dễ mâu thuẫn với bạn bè.
Có gia đình kinh tế khó khăn, bố mẹ đi làm ăn xa, gửi tiền về cho con ăn học, còn việc ăn học như thế nào không nắm được. Học sinh trong độ tuổi vị thành niên dễ sa đà vào cái mới lạ, chểnh mảng học hành nên dễ hư.
Có gia đình giàu có, đáp ứng yêu cầu của con vô điều kiện (nhất là về tiền bạc) nên con có điều kiện hưởng thụ chơi bời nhiều hơn là học tập rèn luyện, dẫn đến kéo bè kéo cánh đánh nhau. Cũng có em học sinh sống trong một gia đình thiếu gương mẫu như bạo lực gia đình, người lớn rượu chè bê tha... tạo cho con họ tâm lí nặng nề tiêu cực.
Những hoàn cảnh như trên thường không tạo ra chất “đề kháng” để các em “miễn dịch” trước những cám dỗ không lành mạnh ngoài xã hội.
Đối với nhà trường, trong mục tiêu giáo dục toàn diện, yếu tố đạo đức được các trường hết sức quan tâm. Song, trong quá trình đổi mới giáo dục của chúng ta hiện nay, vẫn còn những khoảng trống do giá trị cũ đã lỗi thời, giá trị mới đang hình thành chưa được khẳng định nên bộc lộ một số tiêu cực dẫn tới nạn bạo lực học đường.
Chẳng hạn chương trình học còn nặng nề, áp đặt dẫn đến căng thẳng ức chế cho người học. Nhà trường còn nặng về dạy kiến thức, nhất là dạy kiến thức văn hóa để thi ở các giáo viên bộ môn. Nghĩa là còn coi trọng dạy chữ hơn dạy người.
Hơn nữa, trước tác động của cơ chế thị trường, tình cảm thầy trò cũng kém phần sâu nặng, tạo khoảng cách (về tình cảm) giữa thầy trò nên có nhiều điều bức xúc, tế nhị, nhạy cảm, học trò cũng ngại chia sẻ, hỏi han thầy, thầy cũng không biết để tư vấn, để gỡ rối, để hòa giải cho học sinh, dẫn tới nhiều hành động mù quáng, sai lầm của học sinh, trong đó có chuyện đánh nhau giữa các học sinh khi mâu thuẫn xuất hiện.
Bên cạnh đó, hoạt động của Đoàn thanh niên trong nhà trường nhiều nơi mang tính hành chính, hình thức khô khan, nội dung không phong phú, nhất là nhiều chương trình hoạt động còn xa lạ với thanh niên chưa thực sự là sân chơi lành mạnh lôi cuốn các em.
Công tác giáo dục các kỹ năng sống còn hạn chế... Như vậy, nhà trường là nơi giáo dục một cách hệ thống, toàn diện cho học sinh nhưng chính tồn tại trên cũng phần nào tạo ra nạn bạo lực học đường.
Hồ Đình Kiếm
Mời các bạn tiếp tục gửi bài tham gia diễn đàn theo địa chỉ: Ban Bạn đọc Báo Tiền Phong 15- Hồ Xuân Hương- Hà NộiHộp thư: bandoc@ tienphong.vn

description.hltext_display: Inter dementiert Trennung von Benitez
description.content: Inter-Chef dementiert Trennung von Benitez Inter Mailands Präsident Massimo Moratti hat Spekulationen über eine Entlassung von Trainer Rafael Benitez zurückgewiesen. „Benitez ist in diesem Moment immer noch Inter-Trainer”, betonte der Chef des italienischen Fußball-Meisters am späten Dienstagabend in Mailand. Meldungen, wonach Inter bereits mit Luciano Spalletti (Zenit St. Petersburg) und dem ehemaligen AC Mailand-Coach Leonardo verhandle, dementierte Moratti. „Ich habe zu keinem Trainer Kontakt aufgenommen”, sagte der Öl-Magnat.

description.hltext_display: The Reason to Use a Business Name Generator
description.content: The main objective when establishing a new business has to be creating a name. Creating a name that can be recalled very easily while still being imaginative and catchy is one area that willbring excellent results to the business itself. Using the help of a business name generator to come up with tips for naming your business could possibly be an important tool in achieving a namethat will give your company the marketing it needs to achieve success. Whether it's a local business you are trying to set up or a business that may remain competitive nationally, or even around the globe, a name that people could connect with and will easily beacknowledged will more than likely generate more business than one that's difficult to understand or isn't certainly descriptive of the products and services given. A business name generatorwill help allowing a number of alternatives based on your business goals to create the very best name easy for people to identify your business when they are trying to find a company that givesthe products or services you are known for. Even if you provide the exact same products or services as a rival, it'll be your business name that could set you apart. An excellent business name can assist you set up a reputation in yourindustry. At some point, your business name will likely be connected with a particular portion of that sector, which is what your business usually, as well as the name of your business, can berecognized for. Everybody knows that Kentucky Fried Chicken offers not only chicken, however when you hear the name, their particular recipe chicken is going to be the first thing that popsinto your mind. Goodyear provides many different types of automobile maintenance services, yet somehow the first thing people think of when they hear their name is tires. Even though these are just one or two examples of just how a decent business name can be used to brand itself to a particular product, they show the success that can be accomplished bydeveloping a business name that could be immediately identified and related to a specific merchandise. Having a business name generator can present you with selections that you might not have seriously considered on your own, along with options which might be able to brand your company name to specific merchandise, making sure you have an edge over your rivals in aextremely competitive business market.

description.hltext_display: Người Việt và căng thẳng tại Triều Tiên
description.content:
Quân đội Nam Hàn được đặt trong tình trạng sẵn sàng chiến đấu.
Sau những ngày lo lắng khi Bắc Hàn bắn đạn pháo vào đảo Yeonpyeong, đa số người nước ngoài, trong đó có người Việt, vẫn duy trì cuộc sống thường ngày tại Hàn Quốc.
Anh Nguyễn Đình Quân, tiến sĩ, giảng viên thực tập tại đại học Kyung Hee cho BBC Việt Ngữ biết, trong cuộc phỏng vấn ngày 22/12.
Mấy ngày qua căng thẳng giữa hai miền Nam và Bắc Hàn như bị đẩy lên cao trước cuộc thao diễn đạn thật của Nam Hàn.
Thứ Năm (23/12) Nam Hàn sẽ thực hiện thao diễn quân sự quy mô lớn, với chiến đấu cơ và pháo phòng không bắn đạn thật.
Máy bay tiêm kích, nhiều khẩu đội pháo cùng 800 binh lính tham dự tập trận. Không quân và hải quân Nam Hàn sẽ nhắm đến các miêu tiêu giả, trong cuộc biểu dương sức mạnh lớn nhất từ trước đến nay.
Căng thẳng như dâng cao mỗi ngày tại bán đảo Triều Tiên kể từ khi Bắc Hàn nã pháo vào đảo Yeonpyeong hồi tháng trước, giết chết bốn người.
Bắc Hàn từng đe dọa trả đũa Nam Hàn nếu miền Nam diễn tập quân sự bằng đạn thật. Tuy vậy nguy giao chiến giữa hai miền chưa xảy ra, ít nhất trong mấy ngày qua.
Thản nhiên
Theo tiến sĩ, giảng viên thực tập tại đại học Kyung Hee Nguyễn Đình Quân, giáo viên và sinh viên ít nói chuyện đến điểm nóng vùng biên giới.
Giới doanh nhân, một số người lớn tuổi khá quan tâm tới tình hình. Đặc biệt nó liên quan tới chứng khoán, giá thu đổi ngoại tệ
Nguyễn Đình Quân
“Tại môi trường đại học, sinh viên hoặc giáo sư rất ít nói chuyện về chính trị. Hay nói đến cuộc xung đột giữa Nam và Bắc Hàn.
“Họ không tỏ ra lo lắng lắm.”
Tuy vậy, một số người khác tỏ ra quan tâm.
“Giới doanh nhân hoặc một số người lớn tuổi khá quan tâm tới tình hình. Đặc biệt nó liên quan tới chứng khoán hoặc giá thu đổi ngoại tệ tại đây,” anh Quân nói.
Seoul chỉ cách biên giới miền Bắc 120 cây số, tên lửa từ Bắc Hàn hoàn toàn có thể nhắm tới mục tiêu tại thủ đô Hàn Quốc. Người Seoul, theo anh Quân vẫn rất bình tĩnh, cuộc sống vẫn thản nhiên trôi qua, không có dấu hiệu lo ngại.
“Tháng trước khi Bắc Hàn bắn đạn pháo vào đảo Yeonpyeong, người dân có hoảng hốt một chút. Gần đây thì cuộc sống bình thường trở lại, người ta không đặt kế hoạch phải chạy loạn hay dời nhà xuống các tỉnh miền Nam. Không có chuyện ấy.
“Họ xem đó là chuyện bình thường. Thậm chí tôi còn thấy dân tình ít hoảng hốt hơn cả giai đoạn Bắc Hàn thử bom hạt nhân.”
Tình trạng đối đầu chỉ tác động phần nào đến kinh doanh tại Nam Hàn. Điều làm cho người dân quan tâm nhiều, theo anh Quân, giá đôla tăng, nhất là sau vụ pháo kích.
“Ảnh hưởng rõ nhất là giá ngoại tệ. Chẳng hạn hôm Bắc Hàn bắn pháo vào đảo Yeonpyeong, buổi sáng giá đôla Mỹ là 1130 won. Buổi chiều tăng thành 1160 won.
"Tăng mấy phần trăm trong vòng mấy tiếng đồng hồ.
“Người Việt Nam và người nước ngoài ở Seoul cảm thấy lo lắng không biết có nên mua thêm đôla, hoặc euro để tích trữ.
“Người Hàn tôi thấy họ chỉ quan tâm thôi chứ không có động thái gì ứng phó cả.”
Thái độ của người Hàn, theo giảng viên, nghiên cứu sinh tiến sĩ Nguyễn Đình Quân, là ngửng cao đầu trước khó khăn.
“Nếu có chiến tranh họ phải làm gì đây? Bỏ nhà cửa ra đi, bỏ công ăn việc làm? Không bao giờ họ nghĩ đến chuyện đó. Đối với người nước ngoài, trong đó có người Việt mình thì khác. Trong khoảng thời gian đó có hoảng hốt thật.”
