description.hltext_display: Nowitzki dépasse Bird
description.content: A l'occasion de la victoire des Dallas Mavericks sur Orlando la nuit dernière (105-99), Dirk Nowitzki est devenu le 25e meilleur marqueur de tous les temps en NBA. Ses 17 unités lui permettent d'atteindre le total de 21 798 points et ainsi de dépasser Larry Bird et ses 21 791 unités. L'Allemand devrait rapidement gagner encore une place puisque Gary Payton, le prochain sur la liste, ne compte "que" 21 813 points inscrits en carrière.

description.hltext_display: Kar yüzünden işe geç kalırsam kovulur muyum?
description.author: Hürriyet Avrupa
description.content:
22 Aralık 2010
İŞ hukuku uzmanı avukat Abdullah Emili, olumsuz hava koşullarından etkilenen çalışanlara önemli bilgiler verdi. Emili "Çalışanlar yoğun kar nedeniyle iş yerlerine gidemezlerse çalışmadıkları süre için işverenden para alamazlar. Ancak beklenmedik, olağan dışı bir engel olduğu için işveren bu kişilerin işlerine son veremez, yasal bağlayıcılığı bulunan ikaz yazısı (Abmahnung) da gönderemez" dedi. ERKEN YOLA ÇIKIN
İşyerine ulaşımda çalışanların sorumlu olduğunu vurgulayan Emili, "Hava durumu dikkate alınıp vaktinde yola çıkılmalı. Olağanüstü durumlarda işveren yasal yaptırım uygulayamıyor. Ama olumsuzluğun uzun sürmesi durumunda sürekli geç giden çalışanların başı ağrıyabilir" uyarısında bulundu.
UÇAĞIM İPTAL OLURSA NE OLUR?
Uçuşların iptal edilmesi üzerine işyerine vaktinde gidemeyen çalışanların uçak şirketlerinden durumu belirten bir yazı almasını öneren Emili, "Bu belgeyi iş yerinize verdiğinizde sorun çözülmüş olur" dedi.
OKULLAR KAPALI, ÇOCUKLAR NE OLACAK?
Çocuklu ailelere de yasal hakları konusunda hatırlatmalarda bulunan Emili şöyle konuştu: "Eğer kar nedeniyle okul ya da kreşler tatil edilirse, çalışanlar durumu işyerine bildirip evde kalabilir. Bu süre için de paralarını da alırlar."
KAZA YAPARSAM NE OLACAK?
Otomobille işe giderken kaza meydana geldiğinde yasal sigortaların yanında mutlaka meslek örgütlerinin de (Berufsgenossenschaft) devreye sokulmasını tavsiye eden Abdullah Emili, "Bu örgütler tüm sağlık masraflarını karşılar. Ayrıca malulen emeklilik hakkı da tanır. Üstelik yasal sigortalardan daha yüksek aylık bağlanır" diye konuştu.
UÇUŞU İPTAL OLANLARIN HAKLARI NELER?
Uçak şirketi ve sehayat şirketi, kötü hava şartları nedeniyle havaalanında mahsur kalan yolcuyla ilgilenmek zorunda. İki saatlik bir gecikmeden itibaren yolculara yiyecek ve içecek verilmeli. Bunun yanı sıra yolcuya telefon etme imkanı sunulmalı.
UÇAK ŞİRKETİ YOLCUYA NE SUNMAK ZORUNDA?
Evet, yolcuya gecikmeli kalkacak olan uçakta veya konulan ek seferde bir yer sunulmalı. 5 saati geçen uçuşlarda ise yolcu biletini iptal ettirip parasının tamamını alma hakkına sahip.
UÇUŞUN İPTALİ HALİNDE TAZMİNAT ALABİLİR MİYİM?
Eğer uçuş kötü hava şartları nedeniyle iptal olmuş veya gecikmişse bir hakkınız yok. Yani uçak şirketi size herhangi bir ücret ödemek zorunda değil. Sadece şirketin neden olduğu gecikmelerde bu sözkonusu. Örneğin uçağın buzunun çözülmesi ve zamanında uçuşa hazırlanmaması gibi. Uzmanlar, iki saati aşan gecikme durumunda yolcunun geri talep edebileceği miktarın 125 ile 600 Euro arasında değiştiğini söylüyorlar.
TREN YOLCULARI BİLETLERİNİ İADE EDEBİLİR Mİ?
Alman Demiryolları (DB), yolcuların olumsuz hava şartları nedeniyle biletlerini ücretsiz olarak geri iade edebileceklerini veya daha ileriki bir tarihe alabileceklerini açıkladı.
Dikkat: Sitede yer alan haberlerin izinsiz kullanılması durumunda yasal işlem ba

description.hltext_display: 13个物联网项目近日佛山达成 集中签约
description.content:
慧聪安防网讯在21日召开的“四化融合，智慧佛山”物联网技术与产业发展研讨会暨项目推介会上，包括物联网智能浴缸、3G物联网社区合作等13个物联网项目成功签约。佛山市副市长李子甫承诺，佛山将推动物联网技术的广泛应用，并争取在佛山形成物联网相关产业的产业集聚。
智能生活：卫浴家电都能远程控制
推介会上，除了一批物联网项目成功签约外，移动、电信等通讯运营商以及部分来自佛山的高新技术企业也纷纷在会上展示了自己研发的一个又一个新奇的物联网项目，仿佛让人看到了未来几年甚至几十年之后的城市生活。
在办公室轻点鼠标，家中情况一目了然；轻按遥控器，智能家电开启，并根据家庭用电负荷自动错峰用电，还可以按照不同时段的电价为您提供最佳的用电策略；如果您累了，开车的路上便可以遥控浴缸自动放水……不过，这些展现未来城市生活的物联网技术，究竟什么时候能够飞入寻常百姓家呢？对此，记者采访发现，绝大多数项目目前仍然处于研发或者试点阶段，至于何时能够进行产业化或者规模量产，企业的负责人并不敢打包票。
业内人士：依托现有产品搞功能拓展
笔者了解到，目前全国主要地区正积极响应，掀起物联网发展热潮，江苏、北京、上海、广东等十几个省市也都推出了自己的发展规划。在这样的背景下，以传统制造业为主的佛山，如何发展自身的物联网产业？
对此，广东工业大学自动化学院教授谢胜利表示，尽管此前广东省第一批物联网基地的创建中，佛山未能名列其中。但他建议佛山力争进入省内第二批物联网基地的创建，他同时透露，目前中国物联网研究所正筹划在广东省设立基地，具体在哪个位置仍在商榷中，他建议佛山可以考虑把该基地争取到佛山，以达到资源最大的整合。
而对于企业来说，在轰轰烈烈的物联网热潮中首先要做得到的就是生存。
佛山三俊电子股份有限公司副总经理林少彬告诉笔者，对于中小企业来说，盲目去研发物联网技术并不靠谱，而一些成熟产品本身具有一定的市场需求，再通过物联网技术对其进行功能拓展，一方面成本不会增加太多市场风险较低，另一方面也能够让物联网的概念逐渐深入人心，从而逐渐赢得消费者的认同。
部分签约物联网项目
1.联通―金地3G物联网社区合作项目
2.物联网智能浴缸
3.面向制衣业的RFID物联网技术应用
4.佛山城北商贸物流信息服务平台
5.基于RFID技术的服装业物联网公共服务平台建设
6.基于RFID的家具生产及物流的监控系统研发与应用
7.基于RFID技术的各种读写器芯片的设计与应用

description.hltext_display: O.C. Airport Commission votes to keep current concessionaire
description.author: Mike Reicher, Los Angeles Times
description.content:
10-year contract with HMSHost is expected to bring in $15 million more than rival Delaware North. County supervisors must approve the decision. The Orange County Airport Commission has voted 4 to 0 to recommend keeping the current concessionaire at John Wayne Airport but with some new locally owned restaurants.
The panel also approved a new discount airline with service to Canada and signed off on the airport's capacity plan for the coming year.
The same concessionaire has been operating at the airport since the Thomas F. Riley Terminal opened in 1990. With its contract expiring and a new terminal under construction, the airport sought proposals to fill restaurants, cocktail lounges and snack bars.
If last week's Airport Commission vote is approved by the county Board of Supervisors, HMSHost Corp. of Maryland would win the 10-year contract and the county-owned airport could take in $39.4 million. That's $15 million more than projected by its competitor, Delaware North Cos. of New York.
"Fifteen million dollars is a lot of money not to pursue," said Commissioner Chris Welsh. "The rent difference was very significant, and hard to overlook in a public environment. You're not playing with your own money."
The company's selection of local and national restaurants, how it plans to renovate aging facilities in the existing terminals and its concepts for the under-construction Terminal C also were factors in the vote.
HMSHost proposed locally owned restaurants such as Zov's Bistro and Ruby's Diner, as well as a Hobie Hut, a surf-themed bar and grill run by Hobie Alter, the local water sports pioneer.
"We're really pleased with the vote," said HMSHost spokeswoman Susan Goyette. "We believe our offer of authentic Orange County restaurants and superior rent and investment in the airport is really the best proposal."
Delaware North had recruited a John Wayne-themed restaurant run by Wayne's son Ethan. Wahoo's Fish Taco, the Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf and a different surf bar, run by local surfing legend Corky Carroll, had signed on with Delaware.
Ethan Wayne said he had agreed to build the first John Wayne-branded restaurant, True Grit Grill and Rooster Cogburn Ft. Smith Saloon, because the current concession concepts were lacking.
"We all know the service that HMSHost has provided for the last 20 years," he said. "We would like to see the Board of Supervisors rethink this decision and bring the John Wayne name and brand to the airport."
Comparing the restaurants with local ties, Welsh said there wasn't much difference. "The reality is that a Hobie-themed bar and a Corky Carroll-themed bar is pretty similar," he said.
An airport staff committee had recommended Delaware North because of its proposed renovations to the commercial spaces and its array of restaurants, even though the HMSHost proposal would bring in more revenue.
"We're disappointed that the Airport Commission disagreed with its own independent, thorough evaluation process," Nick Schaefer, director of business development for Delaware North, said in a statement. "We gave the airport everything they asked for and more."
The Delaware North proposal was projected to generate $23.9 million for the county over the 10-year contract period, according to a staff report; HMSHost would generate $39.4 million.
The Airport Commission also approved a new airline, WestJet, a Canada-based discount carrier. It plans to resume service abandoned when Air Canada pulled out of the airport in October.
WestJet applied for two daily departures. They were approved along with the airport's annual capacity plan; the airport is limited to 10.8 million passengers a year. As of November, fewer than 8 million passengers had passed through its gates in 2010.
The Board of Supervisors will also review the capacity plan Jan. 11.
Airport officials released November passenger statistics last week. The airport served 690,859 passengers, a decrease of 1.3% compared with November 2009. So far this year, it has had 0.3% fewer passengers compared with the same time in 2009.

event_or_fact.property: Fifteen million dollars is a lot of money not to pursue; The rent difference was very significant, and hard to overlook in a public environment. You're not playing with your own money.
The reality is that a Hobie-themed bar and a Corky Carroll-themed bar is pretty similar
he had agreed to build the first John Wayne-branded restaurant, True Grit Grill and Rooster Cogburn Ft. Smith Saloon, because the current concession concepts were lacking
We're disappointed that the Airport Commission disagreed with its own independent, thorough evaluation process; We gave the airport everything they asked for and more.
director of business development, Delaware North Cos.

We're really pleased with the vote; We believe our offer of authentic Orange County restaurants and superior rent and investment in the airport is really the best proposal.

description.hltext_display: Rumah Rapper 50 Cent Dibobol Maling
description.content:
Liputan6.com, Connecticut: Tempat tinggal rapper 50 cent dibobol maling. Pemilik rumah dengan 52 kamar ini lantas memanggil polisi ketika dirinya melihat sebuah mobil parkir mencurigakan di depan pintu masuk rumahnya.
Seperti dilansir Contact music, Selasa (21/12), Polisi akhirnya menangkap 2 tersangka yang diketahui menerobos masuk melalui pintu yang tak dikunci. Keduanya ditangkap, tengah dalam keadaan setengah sadar akibat mengkonsumi ganja. Salah satunya bahkan mabuk dan menenggak sebotol anggur yang dia curi dari lemari tempat 50 cent menyimpan koleksi minumannya.
Menurut polisi yang bertugas, kedua tersangka akan dikenai denda sebesar 50 ribu dolar AS atau setara dengan Rp 452 juta. (Vin)

description.hltext_display: 海富通QDII掘金台湾
description.content:
----本文导读：---- 被誉为大陆与台湾1949年以来最重要协议两岸经济合作框架协议自今年6月29日签署后，ECFA后台湾投资机遇得到了业内人士认可。社科院台湾经济研究室主任朱磊直言，中国台湾地区经济有望借助ECFA逐步落实，开创黄金十年。 展望2011年台湾地区宏观经济，北京大学国家发展研究院霍德明教授认为，中国台湾地区是一个相当成熟经济体。从资产占比看，消费占GDP60%，政府占12%，对外差不多8%，跟发达国家大部分符合，ECFA可以解决中国台湾地区投资低迷短板，目前中国台湾地区股市估值处于历史较低水平。
来自中国台湾元大证券科技行业研究主管陈?丰分析，中国台湾市场中55.2%市值为电子板块类股票，ECFA签了以后两岸经贸更加便利，两岸市场可以容易往来交流，高科技行业将进入新一轮循环周期，投资氛围整体向好。此外，中国台湾地区石化、观光旅游、商用不动产等领域也被看好。
不过，需要引起投资者注意是，由于中国台湾股市也存在受国际因素波动较大等问题，国内投资者最好借道专业资产管理公司QDII产品曲线投资。据悉，海富通基金旗下第二只QDII产品，即期望借此抢先布局包括台湾在内大中华地区资本市场，为广大投资者铺设通往台湾市场新途径。 全球二次探底风险消除之后，大中华区域经济会维持比较高增速。海富通大中华精选QDII基金拟任基金经理杨铭表示，在经济上升周期中间，我们继续看好水泥、钢铁等周期股票，积极关注六大新兴产业：绿色能源、生物科技、观光旅游、健康照护、精致农业及文化创意产业等。 截至12月14日，海富通基金第一只QDII产品以成立以来83.97%净值增长率成为最赚钱QDII基金，每10份累计派现2.7元，也是累计分红最多QDII基金。
海富通第二只QDII----大中华精选股票型基金将于2010年12月20日至2011年1月21日公开发售，投资者可通过中行、建行、交行、招行等代销机构以及海富通基金直销中心进行认购。资料显示，该基金将主要通过积极主动投资，精选投资境外大中华概念股票，分享大中华区域经济发展增长成果，股票投资比例范围为基金资产60%-95%。
业内人士分析，不同于香港、大陆股市主打金融地产股，台湾股市中走俏多是电子类、面板类、科技类股票，这对于当前QDII投资可以起到一个很好补充效果。
此外，杨铭表示，在全球量化宽松背景下，出口占经济重要成分大中华区域经济，将有望再度获得较快经济增长速度，中国概念类股票仍将是市场关注焦点，具有较大投资潜力。 --股市360股票频道讯

description.hltext_display: Neue Trainer, neue Musik, neues Outfit
description.author: Kai Löscher
description.content:
Einen Erfolg durften die Hanseaten bereits vor der Saison verbuchen: Auf Grund einer Neuregelung für die Turniervergabe konnten sich die TSC-Verantwortlichen nicht sicher sein, ob erneut ein Formationswochenende vor heimischem Publikum stattfinden würde.
Nun: Diese Zitterpartie fand ein glückliches Ende. Mit der entsprechenden Portion Glück wurde den Sykern ein Landesliga- und ein Oberligaturnier (14. und 15. Mai 2011) zugesprochen, so dass das A- und B-Team des TSC wieder auf die tatkräftige Unterstützung der eigenen Fans und allen Tanzsportbegeisterten in der Region zählen kann. "Für unsere Aktiven ist es sehr wichtig, wenigstens ein Mal in der Saison zu Hause tanzen zu können. Die Stimmung bei unseren bislang zehn Formationswochenenden war einfach immer wieder sensationell", erklärte der TSC-Vorsitzende Udo Bendkowsky.
Neue Musik, neues Outfit
Das A-Team mit seinem neuen Trainergespann Alexander Schwaderer und Valentina Ohrmann möchte sich mit einer neuen Musik, neuen Choreographie und einem neuem Outfit einen der ersten drei Plätze in der Oberliga Nord, Gruppe A ertanzen, um dadurch das Ticket für die Aufstiegsrelegation zu lösen.
Ob gar der Wiederaufstieg in die Regionalliga möglich ist, kann man zu jetzigen Zeitpunkt noch nicht sagen. So erklärte Alexander Schwaderer: "Wir sind mit Sicherheit in der stärkeren Oberligagruppe, die Teilnahme an der Relegation wäre ein wirklich toller Erfolg. Wir als Trainer müssen dafür momentan eine neue Mannschaft formen, die dieses Ziel auch erreichen kann. Aktuell befinden wir uns auf einem sehr guten Weg." Auf welche Musik sich die Fans der Hanseaten freuen dürfen, wollte der Trainer derweil noch nicht verraten.
Bei den Paaren des B-Teams würde in der Liga schon der vierte Platz reichen, um zum Aufstiegsturnier zu fahren und damit die Chance zu erhalten, von der Landes- in die Oberliga aufzusteigen.
Chef-Coach Ändy Hövemann ist sich jedoch bewusst, dass es bis dorthin noch ein langer und schwieriger Weg ist: "Auch in dieser Saison haben wir Tänzer an unser A-Team abgegeben, um es personell zu unterstützen. Wir als Trainer der B-Mannschaft bringen die Paare auf den richtigen Weg, damit sie später auch in unserer ersten Mannschaft bestehen können."
Wer nun glaubt, dass sich das Trainergespann Hövemann, Sandra Pagels, Friederike Evers und Pascal Küttner durch dieses Prozedere ausbremsen lassen würde, der irrt. In der vergangenen Saison verpasste das auch damals neuformierte Team nur ganz knapp den Aufstieg.
Entscheiden wird sich der Aufstieg in Ober- und Regionalliga am 28. Mai 2011 bei den Nachbarn des SC Weyhe. An diesem Tag werden insgesamt 14 Teams um die begehrten Plätze tanzen.
Die Feuertaufe für beide Mannschaften des TSC erfolgte bereits bei der traditionellen Generalprobe, die diesmal jedoch nicht öffentlich, sondern in einem ganz intimen, familiären Rahmen erfolgte.
Übrigens: Über die Internetseite: www.tsc-hansa-syke.de kann Kontakt mit den Trainern aufgenommen werden.Syke. Die neue Saison für die Lateinformationen des TSC Hansa Syke steht vor Tür. Nach einem insgesamt nicht so erfolgreichen Jahr 2010 soll jetzt für die zwei Mannschaften wieder besser laufen. Die Saison startet am 15. (Hansa A) beziehungsweise 29. Januar.

description.hltext_display: El Ibex consolida los 10.200 puntos
description.author: La Opinión de Granada
description.content:
El selectivo abre sesión con una subida del 0,31% en una jornada con pocos valores en negativo
VOTE ESTA NOTICIA
EP El parqué madrileño ha abierto la sesión con una subida del 0,31%, que ha situado al Ibex 35 en el nivel de los 10.235,5 puntos, en una jornada con pocos valores en negativo en los primeros minutos de cotización.
En concreto, Banesto cedía un 0,64%, seguido de Acciona (-0,47%), Iberia y Bankinter (-0,09%) y Gas Natural, Técnicas Reunidas y ACS (-0,04%). Por el contrario, el mayor ascenso era par BME (+1,4%), por delante de Sacyr Vallehermoso (+1,2%), Abengoa (+1,09%) y Abertis (+1,08%).
En el sector financiero, BBVA subía un 0,45%, Banco Santander, un 0,23%, Banco Popular, un 0,12% y Banco Sabadell, un 0,09%. Repsol YPF, Iberdrola y Telefónica, por su parte, subían un 0,74%, un 0,34% y un 0,23%, respectivamente.
En Europa, los principales indicadores mostraban signo dispar, ya que París cedía un 0,10%, mientras Francfort avanzaba un 0,03%. En el mercado de divisas, el euro mantiene posiciones frente al dólar y al inicio de la sesión bursátil el cambio entre las dos monedas quedaba fijado en 1,3144 unidades.

description.hltext_display: Zuckerberg ‘interested in Chinese Inte...
description.content:
Facebook founder Mark Zuckerberg - on holiday in China where his social networking site is officially blocked - met Wednesday with top executives from the country's popular web portal Sina.com.
Zuckerberg's meeting with Sina.com chief executive Charles Chao and vice president Peng Shaobin comes two days after the 26-year-old had lunch with the head of search engine giant Baidu to discuss the world's biggest web market. ?Mr Zuckerberg came to get a better understanding of Sina and China?s Weibo market,? Sina said in a statement sent to AFP. ?It?s more of a casual than a formal visit.? Sina's Weibo is a Twitter-like microblogging service. Foreign social networking sites such as Facebook and Twitter are blocked by China's government but many users on the mainland access them via virtual proxy networks.
Beijing has set up a huge online censorship system sometimes dubbed the ?Great Firewall of China? that aggressively blocks sites or snuffs out Internet content on topics considered sensitive.
Zuckerberg, clearly keen to see his company crack the Chinese market of at least 420 million Internet users, told an audience at Stanford University recently that he was ?spending a lot of time? studying Chinese. ?It's kind of a personal challenge this year, I'm taking an hour a day and I'm learning Chinese. I'm trying to understand the language, the culture, the mindset - it's just such an important part of the world,? he said. ?How can you connect the whole world if you leave out a billion-six people?? Zuckerberg, who is on holiday with his Chinese-American girlfriend, met with Baidu's chief executive Robin Li on Monday, a spokesman for the Chinese company, Kaiser Kuo, told AFP. ?It makes sense - he is interested in the Chinese Internet, he's made that very plain. Obviously this is one of the big dark spots for Facebook because it is blocked here in China,? Kuo said. ?He has had a long-standing interest in China. I'm sure he wants to get the advice of someone who knows the Internet landscape well here.? Facebook told AFP ahead of the trip that the 26-year-old - recently named Time's ?Person of the Year? - was ?not doing any press or any meetings? during his vacation in China. - Sapa-AFP

event_or_fact.property: he was ?spending a lot of time? studying Chinese.

entity.property: Weibo is a Twitter-like microblogging service

description.hltext_display: MTV3: Veripalvelun konsulttisotkussa kolmaskin epäilty
description.content:
Veripalveluun liittyvässä rikostutkinnassa on kolmaskin epäilty, kertoo MTV3. Poliisi on aiemmin kertonut, että se epäilee Suomen Punaisen Ristin Veripalvelun entistä johtajaa Jukka Rautosta luottamusaseman väärinkäytöstä.
Rautosen on epäilty ostaneen yli kolmen miljoonan euron arvosta konsulttipalveluja ilman kilpailutusta. Hän jätti tehtävänsä marraskuussa sotkusta nousseen kohun vuoksi, mutta on kiistänyt laiminlyönnit.
Kahta muuta henkilöä epäillään avunannosta luottamusaseman väärinkäyttöön. MTV3:n mukaan toinen heistä olisi Veripalvelun käyttämä konsultti.
Poliisi on saanut Veripalvelua koskevan rikostutkintansa pääosin valmiiksi.

description.hltext_display: Drop in the bucket
Longest Night service at Westminster a chance to reflect
description.content:
AUBURN — The long warm days of spring and summer are still a ways off, but today, as small and incremental as it may be, the days are starting to get longer, even if only by a few fleeting seconds.
Tuesday night, the first day of winter, was the longest night of the year.
At Westminster Presbyterian Church, this night has long served as a time to stop and reflect during the holiday season.
It was the sixth annual Service of the Longest Night at the church. The Rev. Philip Windsor, pointed out that even though this is a season of joy, there are still those who for many reasons, do not feel this joy.
Windsor said this can be for any number of reasons, for some it is financial worries and struggles, while for others, it is the loss and memories of loved ones, but whatever the reason for this feeling of darkness during the holiday season, there was one message Windsor hoped to convey.
“It is OK,” Windsor said. “It is ok to feel this way.”
The service was simple and somber.
Instead of traditional carols of the season, pieces that reflected a darker feeling were chosen for the service.
Songs such as “In the Bleak Midwinter” and “O Little Town of Bethlehem” set to the sounds of the choir and organ accompaniment displayed a mood that reflected the feelings of the cold and darkness of the longest night.
But even through the long nights and short cold days, there is a ray of hope.
Jill Fandrich read from the books of Isaiah and the Romans, both passages reflecting the promise of God to bring light from the darkness and comfort through the hard times and chaos.
It was a sentiment Windsor further elaborated on. Windsor said recently he was at a choir performance and it was when he heard the song “It Came Upon a Midnight Clearing” that he was struck by its meaning, particularly the third verse.
In this verse, the writer, Edmund Hamilton Sears, evokes images of those that are bending under life’s crushing load and who toil along the climbing way, but he goes on to encourage these people to rest along the road and hear the angels sing.
This sentiment summed up the feeling Windsor strived to convey.
“There is darkness in the world,” Windsor said. “And it is OK and it is OK to feel that way. But even though there is darkness in the world the light did prevail.”

description.hltext_display: 科比21分遭驱逐 湖人主场惨败雄鹿连胜遭终结
description.content:
【长江网讯】 （新浪体育）北京时间12月22日，湖人主场以79-98惨败雄鹿。
湖人(21-8)五连胜终止。科比-布莱恩特得21分，保罗-加索尔15分11个篮板，拉玛尔-奥多姆12分、10个篮板和6次助攻。
雄鹿(11-16)结束三连败。布兰顿-詹宁斯因伤缺阵，约翰-萨尔蒙斯拿下了20分6次助攻，厄尔森-伊尔亚索瓦17分11个篮板，安德鲁-博格特15分8个篮板。“小矮人”厄尔-博伊金斯立功，在第四节拿下了13分，全场贡献22分。
首席后卫詹宁斯多缺阵4-6周，雄鹿才迎来博格特不久，又少了大将，信心受挫。不过面对湖人，他们仍打得非常顽强，卫冕冠军就算是在主场作战，没占到太大的便宜。
博格特开场后就连续两次篮下强攻得手，此后他又助攻队友，雄鹿以11-8开局。加索尔和奥多姆也不示弱，从篮下开始反击，双方一开场就打得非常激烈。雄鹿一度以23-16领先，但在本节最后3分钟只投中一球，湖人将比分追成22-25。
科比首节有6分进账，但他进攻并不积极，第二节不算中场附近的远投，他只出手一次。湖人主要火力集中在奥多姆和加索尔身上。本节还有7分11秒时，沃顿上篮后，湖人连得6分，以36-33领先。此后湖人近2分钟未能得分，雄鹿又将比分超出。双方仍是势均力敌的局面，谁也无法甩开对手。半场结束时，雄鹿以50-46略占优势。
第三节双方仍是势均力敌的局面。本节还有41.3秒时，巴恩斯三分命中后，湖人只以66-68落后， 不过萨尔蒙斯此后连得4分，在他投中压哨球后，雄鹿以72-66进入最后一节。
第四节还有7分47秒时，加索尔补篮后，湖人只以72-77落后，不过此后3分48秒湖人一分未得，雄鹿打出一波12-0，一举以85-72拉开差距。科比还以一球，但已经止不住雄鹿的攻势。
替补上场的博伊金斯成为奇兵，本节他三度三分命中，在比赛还有2分16秒时，他三分得手，一人连得5分，雄鹿又打出一波9-0，在比赛还有1分29秒时以98-77拉开差距，就此锁定胜局。
湖人首发阵容：科比-布莱恩特、德雷克-费舍尔、保罗-加索尔、拉玛尔-奥多姆和罗恩-阿泰斯特。
雄鹿首发阵容：约翰-萨尔蒙斯、肯扬-杜林、安德鲁-拜纳姆、厄尔森-伊尔亚索瓦和克里斯-道格拉斯-罗伯茨。

description.hltext_display: Homeless warning over benefit cut
description.content:
Government cutbacks on housing benefit are likely to leave many people struggling to pay their rent and forced to move to cheaper areas, a cross-party parliamentary committee has warned.
The House of Commons Work and Pensions Committee urged the Government to monitor the impact of the changes and be prepared to increase the £190 million fund it has set aside to smooth the transition to the new system and help local authorities deal with possible increases in homelessness.
The committee said it was not possible to predict how many landlords would respond to the benefit reductions by cutting rents, as ministers hope. While some would do so, their response will vary in different parts of the country depending on local market conditions.
The MPs also expressed unease at plans to cut Housing Benefit by 10% after a year out of work.
They urged ministers to come forward with "a more nuanced approach", recognising the difference between disabled people and single parents who find it difficult to get into work and those who are simply not trying to find a job.
Changes to Housing Benefit were announced in Chancellor George Osborne's emergency budget in June in a bid to cut the £17 billion annual cost of the payout, claimed by 4.75 million households.
Maximum weekly rates are to be capped at £400 a week and payments will be reduced by linking them to the cheapest 30% of properties in a neighbourhood, rather than the average rent.
In an inquiry into the changes, some witnesses told the committee that an increase in evictions and homelessness was "inevitable".
In its report, the committee said it supported the Government in its goal of managing the costs of Housing Benefit and agreed that support for the housing costs of low-income families should provide value for taxpayers' money.
Committee chair Anne Begg said: "It is difficult to judge at the moment to what extent Housing Benefit claimants will change their behaviour as a result of these proposals. The Government hopes that people will be able to find cheaper accommodation in cheaper areas and that private landlords will be willing to reduce their rents to Local Housing Allowance claimants, so that the new levels will not result in an increase in homelessness."

description.hltext_display: E6 stängdes på grund av halkan
description.content:
Vägen E6 i Bohuslän stängdes på tisdagen
på grund av snö och halka.
En sträcka på tre mil vid Tanum stängdes i flera timmar. Det var så halt att det var omöjligt
att köra på vägen. Flera lastbilar fastnade i snön
och kunde inte köra vidare.
Vid halv tolv på kvällen öppnades vägen.
Men den fick stänga igen då en buss
fått sladd och ställt sig tvärs över vägbanan.
8 SIDOR/TT

description.hltext_display: 青岛夫妻频抓牛股年赚超亿 私募渐成资本大鳄
description.content:
----本文导读：----
中国证券市场已经20岁了，在这20年里，岛城投资者，从无到有发展到目前百万之众。私募基金是证券市场衍生品，大浪淘沙，优胜劣汰，适者生存 ，在弱小私募基金不断被淘汰出局同时，一部分私募基金却在股市发展大风大浪中不断壮大。近年随着股证投资普及，私募发展变得十分凶猛。 岛城私募基金尽管还不是很成熟，离上海深圳已经成规模私募基金虽然有着不小差距，但经过多年进化 ，已由小泥鳅变身翻江龙却是不争事实。 有知情人透露，岛城比较成功私募基金规模已经过亿，身家最高已经接近10亿元。千万级别私募基金更是比比皆是，不下三五十家。这些私募基金 ，已经比较成熟投资理念和投资制度，并且通过灵活策略，在二级市场和PE市场都取得了很好成绩。在2010年翻倍大牛股路翔股份、翻了三倍中色股份甚至一些公司PE，背后都有岛城私募神秘背影。神话每天都在上演，其中有看似很远，实际上却发生在我们身边。
短线王 频抓牛股一年赚5倍 2010年虽然指数走是V形，但我账户资金曲线却是一根大阳线，一年涨了大约5倍，岛城私募基金经理李先生2010年战果相当辉煌。李先生只是一个小私募，目前操盘资金在1200万元左右，而年初只有200多万元。回顾2010年整个操作过程，李先生年初主要操作股票是海南板块*ST罗顿，当时还在本报上公开推荐过，通过该股，短短一个多月资金就翻了一番有余。在顺利出局后，他马上在8元附近杀入了青岛本地股青岛金王，这个股是一只标准慢牛，一路小阴小阳一直走到9月份12元顺利出局，又获利50%。这时候市值已经增长到 600多万元。然后当10月份蓝筹股行情启动后，他又一下抓住了银行股领头羊光大银行，一周多时间再次获利3成。其后两个月又在创业板股票乐视网中又掘了一桶金。就这样累计收益率达到了惊人500%，成为岛城投资者中翘楚。 我不是股神，但今年运气特别好，选股票都很给力。李先生说，他选股思路一般考虑两方面，成长性和是否在底部，成长性好和已经处于底部股票，他选起来比较放心。操盘如同比赛，状态加上机遇，可能打败平时不敢想对手。
中线牛 实地调研坚定持股信心
青岛著名私募金佰利在去年牛市当中，操作比较成功，但进入2010年震荡市之初 ，却连连损兵折将，前几个月亏损近2000万元。随后私募管理人金玉浩选定一只牛股，靠它顺利翻身，并且赚取了一倍收益。这只股票就是路翔股份。
路翔股份是一家生产沥青企业，因为涉足锂矿开采而声名鹊起。青岛金佰利基金经理人金玉浩在分析了多家券商对路翔股份研究报告后果断出手，在今年4月份分多个账户在 23元以下重仓买入，先后投入资金在5000万元左右，到9月份冲高到44元附近卖出，一股盈利20多元，市值盈利在5000万元左右。 私募要对自己负责，也要对客户资金负责 ，而为了做这只股，我花了将近一周时间，亲自去了四川康定锂矿进行了深入调研，获得了非常重要第一手资料。金玉浩说，公司项目地处相当偏僻，他几次在悬崖峭壁上差点掉下去。当时情形现在想起来都害怕，这辈子我再也不想去那么危险地方了。不过靠着实地调研获得资料，我坚定了对这只股票信心，在4月到7月份大跌中也坚定持股信心，最后获得了满意回报。 玩潜伏 雌雄双煞年赚超亿元 徐鹏和钱钰两人名字经常出现在上市公司大股东之中，很多人不知道他俩是夫妻。实际上，这对资本市场上雌雄双煞是土生土长青岛人。徐鹏最早炒股在申银万国青岛营业部，全部身家只有几十万元，后凭借炒作新华传媒一举获利20倍而起家，在去年炒作伊利股份后，一举成名，被市场所认知。
在 2010年粤传媒公布半年报后，显示，徐鹏持有粤传媒约1421.5万股，钱钰持有 272.9万股，两人分别位列粤传媒第一和第四大流通股股东。事实上，早在今年一季度，徐鹏和钱钰就已潜入粤传媒前十大流通股东之中。持股成本为10元左右 ，动用资金约1.8亿元。该股重组复牌后连续4个交易日涨停，其后再次冲高。徐鹏夫妇截至三季度已经不在前10股东之列，估计最后仅在粤传媒这一只股票上他们就可以获利1亿元以上投资收益。 游深海 进军PE市场捉大鱼 如果说二级市场是浅海话，一级市场如同深海，机遇更大，风险也更大。岛城有私募机构已不甘在二级市场翻江倒海，在一级市场也有所斩获。
煤炭行业次新股郑煤机上市以后表现不俗，定位颇高。就在这个股票背后，活跃着好几家PE机构，其中青岛私募康大投资就凭借这只股票，在三年时间里获得了10倍账面回报。PE股权投资由于投资时间比较长，对投资标和目标要求往往更加严格，因为如果一旦投资目标选择不当，可能就会造成重大投资损失。而康大投资郑煤机一战，可以说赚得盆满钵满。同样通过PE获得惊人回报还有青岛威尔资本，他们在数码视讯上投资也有10倍以上回报。
新人出 后起之秀欲三分天下
蓬博投资是岛城今年刚刚成立私募公司，其负责人年初从深圳归来，不仅带来了资金，更带来先进操作理念，追寻其操作轨迹，堪称 左侧交易典范。自大盘 2319点见底以来，该私募操作一直很激进，很好地把握住了这轮逼空行情。在大盘持续逼空11月份转弱之后，蓬博投资又在市场普遍看好后市之际果断将仓位降至2成以下，这波调整最低不会破2800点，前期跳空缺口不会回补。该公司负责人在 11月肯定地说，之后在很长一段时间里，这个被称作岛城最为激进观点遭到了很多机构反对，认为蓬博如此大胆恐将错判大势带来市值损失。但事实却正相反，蓬博以其出色判断力再次精准把握了调整底部，该私募在底部买入并公开操作大族激光、柳工等逆市飘红牛股，吸引了岛城投资者目光。 市场多数个股下跌了20% ，我们逆市获利20%蓬博投资负责人轻松地说，我们现在仍是满仓操作，如果有人认为我们在 3000点下方满仓操作是激进，那么我说在 4000点上方满仓机构才是真正大胆。 留遗憾 抢庄世纪鼎利未成功
随着私募基金壮大，私募机构本身也成了资本大鳄猎物和对手，一有不慎，就面临着机构围攻甚至搏杀。岛城私募势力越来越大， 引起了主力猜疑和排斥。今年8月26日本报曾报道了一家民间私募基金通过两家营业部席位一日狂卖世纪鼎利27万股，市值超过4300 万元，为当天卖出席位前两位，这只股票当天一度跌停。
据记者了解，在世纪鼎利上，这家民间私募基金获利并不多，当时为啥急着卖出呢？主要是因为其持仓过大，威胁到了主力意图，主力故意压制股价，反复洗盘，直到这家私募基金杀跌出局后，才反手做多。在这家私募基金出局后不久，世纪鼎利公布了中期拟10转10派1.5元送股派息方案，股价连拉两个涨停，这家私募基金管理人空留悔恨。
讲传奇 赚够了钱玩游艇
有句话说得好：哥不在江湖，江湖依然有哥传说。岛城有少数成功私募如今已是功成名就，渐渐退居二线，但关于他们传说依然不少。记者采访了解到，有位身家过亿元私募如今一年多数时候都在外面游山玩水，拜访各地名山大川，他们一年或许只买一次股票，设定好一个日期去收获，平日涨跌则一点也不关心。
还有私募在烟台买了游艇，钓鱼、开小型PARTY成为生活主旋律，在成功后尽情享受着自己精彩人生。
相同是，这些私募都非常低调，不愿抛头露面，记者想要当面采访非常不易，就连名字都不愿意登在报纸上。
考上公务员再辞职
在2009年，大家可能关注过这样一个新闻：一出手获利八千万元，青岛籍股神公务员主动辞职。据报道，新闻事件主人公吴荣荃就是岛城一个私募。当时她持有600万股莫高股份，增发部分认购价格为10.07元，上市股价为24元，吴荣荃净赚8400万元左右。
而这位名噪一时吴女士，就是岛城著名私募青岛中金信投资发展有限公司副总经理和大股东，她另一个身份，当时还是上海一名试用期普通公务员。试用期满后，吴即提出了辞职，她公务员之旅仿佛仅仅是为了体验。
随着名声越来越大，青岛中金信开始逐渐从台前转向幕后，通过其控股其他子公司参与资本市场，并从以前二级市场为主，转入股权投资为主。
发警示 代客理财法律空白有风险 目前常说私募基金或地下基金，并不是指银监会批准私募基金，而是活跃在民间代客理财。这是一种非公开宣传，向特定投资人募集资金进行一种集合投资。其方式基本有两种，一是基于签订委托投资合同契约型集合投资基金，二是基于共同出资入股成立股份公司公司型集合投资基金。
青岛目前代客理财协议现在一般都分两种，一种是盈利三七开不包损失，一种是盈利五五开包损失，但这两种协议实际上都没法律效力。迄今，《证券法》、《信托法》都没对私募基金含义、资金来源、组织方式、运作模式等作出明确规定。掌控着这些基金机构和个人，也因此多游离于现有监督机构监督之外，自身运作风险和对市场造成风险都比较大。 --股市360股票频道讯

description.hltext_display: Hermes Shares Jump After LVMH Increases Stake to More Than 20%
description.author: Heather Harris and Paul Jarvis
description.content:
Hermes International SCA rose as much as 5 percent in Paris trading after larger luxury-goods rival LVMH Moet Hennessy Louis Vuitton SA said it increased its stake in the Birkin bag-maker to more than 20 percent.
Hermes gained as much as 7.80 euros to 164.45 euros, the highest price since Dec. 3. LVMH said late yesterday it has purchased more Hermes shares on the market, raising its holding from the 17.1 percent announced in October.
The increased stake may boost speculation that LVMH Chairman Bernard Arnault is gradually targeting a takeover of Hermes, even as the company said again it isnt seeking a board seat or control. Descendants of the Hermes founding family said Dec. 6 they are setting up a new holding company to allow family members to sell without making their shares available to LVMH. Its determination looks strong, Pierre Lamelin, an analyst at Cheuvreux in Paris, said of LVMH. The first tranche was secured through the use of equity swaps at a very compelling price. The last tranche paid at the spot price shows that LVMHs long-term intentions are clear beyond the financial coup. Lamelin has an outperform rating on LVMH. Hermes, the French maker of Kelly handbags that retail for about 7,000 euros ($9,200), has said that the three branches of its founding family are fully united in their desire to retain control of the 173-year-old company.
Hermes hired BNP Paribas SA and Bank of America Corp. as advisers last month to help fend off a possible LVMH takeover bid. LVMH cant make an offer for all of Hermes until at least April 23, according to French regulations.
Equity Swaps
Hermes shares were up 3.85 euros, or 2.5 percent, to 160.5 euros as of 9:13 a.m. in Paris, boosting the companys market value to 16.9 billion euros. LVMH fell 25 cents, or 0.2 percent, to 125.20 euros, valuing it at 61.4 billion euros.
LVMH bought the 17.1 percent stake via equity swaps. The French securities regulator is investigating whether that transaction complied with its rules. The increased stake will further reduce the percentage of Hermes stock that is publicly traded, already less than 10 percent. Hermess family shareholders own more than 70 percent of the company. Hermes cant be taken over, especially if the family sticks together, said Davide Vimercati, an analyst at UniCredit SpA in Milan. LMVH should be able to raise its stake to around 25 percent, but that wont be enough to take control. LVMH looks as though it is positioned in Hermes for the long term, but wont be able to do much in the medium term. A Hermes spokeswoman didnt return a call to her mobile phone seeking comment.

description.hltext_display: 17亿美元 主动安防吹响市场容量的号角
description.content:
慧聪安防网讯据相关资料显示，在2010年国内整个视频监控市场容量将达到17亿美元。面对如此庞大的市场，高清技术的发展成为了国内主流厂商的重要课题，这直接带动了智能识别技术在视频监控中的应用。可以预见的是高清智能监控的市场将会变大，视频监控也会实现从"被动防御"向"主动防御"的转型。
17亿美元！"主动安防"吹响市场容量的号角
据相关资料显示，在2010年国内整个视频监控市场容量将达到17亿美元。面对如此庞大的市场，高清技术的发展成为了国内主流厂商的重要课题，这直接带动了智能识别技术在视频监控中的应用。可以预见的是高清智能监控的市场将会变大，视频监控也会实现从"被动防御"向"主动防御"的转型。
由于近年来社会安全问题日益复杂，所以安全防范日显重要，视频监控是安全防范的利剑之一，是众多领域中不可或缺的技防措施。在此便对安防防范也提出了更高的要求。安防监控几经变迁，现已经快速进入各行各业的应用中，从金融、平安城市等传统应用领域快速向各行业应用延伸，在电讯、军队、能源、交通、教育、市政、连锁等众多行业，来越多地被"委以重任".被越来越多的普通老百姓所认知，并与人们的生活息息相关。也是安防企业不断努力的方向所在。随着2010年"我要看得更清楚"的呼声越来越高，这直接促进了高清智能监控逐步成为市场主流，其关键意义在于，视频监控将实现从"被动安防"向"主动安防"的转型。
高清智能监控系统的应用促使主动防范成为现实
视频监控的威慑力和事后还原力，在各行业的实际应用中，已经得到了很好的见证。但如何让监控更具威慑力，让监控起到防范于未然的作用，如何做到"道高一丈"呢？例如在车水马龙的闹市区如何看清一个人的面部特征；在繁忙的公路上如何看清楚车辆牌照的同时看清楚司乘人员的面部特征；在拥挤喧闹的地铁、停车库的出入口体育场馆等场合，如何能够迅速准确的找到目标；如何在监控区域智能识别不安全因素并启动防范预案？这些需求正激烈地敲打着安防行业的神经，促进了安防技术不断创新。
在监控网络化大潮的推动和市场需求的驱动下，高清和智能监控技术获得了重大突破，并进入到重大安保项目的实际应用中，这标志着视频监控已经进入高清时代，高清和智能成为视频监控新时代主题。高清技术和产品的不断涌现，高清智能监控系统的现实应用，将加速促进视频监控系统与安防其它子系统的无缝整合，再进一步促进安防系统与行业业务管理系统的无缝对接，这为视频监控带来更广阔的发展空间。
目前业内主流应用的分辨率为CIF（10万像素），最高为4CIF（40万像素）级别，导致现有的监控系统，主要功能是记录事件的经过，在更多关键细节上"看不清",造成监控效率和监控价值大打折扣。
而高清监控达到了720P及以上分辨率，即百万级像素分辨率，它带来了几个明显的优势：图像清晰度高，可以获取更多关键性的细节；单个监控点的监控幅度扩大，可以减少布点，可以同时关注多个细节；高清图像，可以大大提高智能视频分析的精度，为智能监控的实现奠定坚实的基础。

description.hltext_display: Juventudes Socialistas de Extremadura aprueba una resolución contra la violencia de género
description.author: EUROPA PRESS
description.content:
EUROPA PRESS La organización Juventudes Socialistas de Extremadura (JSEx) ha aprobado por unanimidad una resolución contra la "lacra" de la violencia de género, durante el comité regional del colectivo celebrado este pasado martes. La organización Juventudes Socialistas de Extremadura (JSEx) ha aprobado por unanimidad una resolución contra la "lacra" de la violencia de género, durante el comité regional del colectivo celebrado este pasado martes.
Además, ha criticado que "todavía nadie del Ayuntamiento de Badajoz, ni su alcalde, Miguel Celdrán, ha explicado por qué se ha rechazado la implantación de una oficina de la mujer en una ciudad de 150.000 habitantes que fue propuesta por el Instituto de la Mujer de Extremadura, IMEX, y que fue rechazada por el alcalde de Badajoz"
"En esta sociedad no nos podemos permitir actitudes machistas como la que representa la figura de Miguel Celdrán y más teniendo la responsabilidad de regir un ciudad tan importante como la que tiene él", recalca la organización juvenil en nota de prensa.
Por otra parte, la Comisión Ejecutiva Regional de JSEx ha hecho balance de su gestión al frente de la organización. Según el secretario general, Juan Ramón Ferreira "JSEx ha cumplido su calendario de actividades que se aprobaron en enero".
El secretario general de los jóvenes socialistas ha enumerado las diferentes actividades que la comisión ejecutiva regional ha puesto al servicio de los jóvenes este año, como son las jornadas de inmigración que se realizaron en Talayuela, la Escuela de Formación Margarita Nelken en Badajoz, el Comité Federal celebrado en Cáceres, o el trabajo interno que la asociación juvenil ha realizado durante meses para la Conferencia Política del PSOE ha sido "mucho más que positivo", para la cual JSEx presentó más de 150 enmiendas de las cuales "muchas fueron bien recibidas".
Para terminar, Ferreira no se olvida de los "tiempos difíciles" actuales, en los que ha recalcado "el compromiso de esta organización por y para los jóvenes".

description.hltext_display: Tips On How To Earn Online- Explained Simply
description.content:
Native American proverb states, "Tell me and I will forget, show me and I may not remember, involve me and I will understand". It was true then and it's also still applicable today.Chris Farrell approach has adopted the Native American proverb on his membership site. Through his videos he involves you in learning true basics of online marketing. He just isn't promoting "get rich quick" nor does he claim that you're going to be millionaire.I've truly learned many aspects of internet marketing but I felt I was missing something. But I did not know very well what I was missing. Then I recently came across reviews of Chris Farrell's membership site. I have been visiting his sites via promotional materials for over a while. I Then decided to join. As I started his training, I finally discovered what i was missing. Chris is not going to teach new fascinating tricks. He teaches fundamentals, basics and some advanced strategies. But what makes him unique is that he teaches it in a fashion that you can actually put all the pieces together so that it actually works. Through the information he provides, you will be able to construct a blueprint for your business which can grow with that firm base eventually.He advocates EUI- Education, Understanding, Implementation- concept requiring you to definitely have correct and adaptive mindset. It begins with teaching yourself with new skills. That means you must be willing to learn. By the way, learning itself is not enough. You really need to understand what you have learnt. Then understanding is insufficient. Your understanding ought to be elevated further. That is you must implement everything you understood. Implementation involves you taking actions. Ironically, Chris has provided few concepts within his site to launch your implementation. What Will I Learn?In a nutshell, you will learn basics of online marketing. You are probably wondering, who has got time for basics? Frankly, I learned about online marketing via acquiring concepts every now and then. That is how most miss the boat. Like Chris will say repeatedly, it is all about process. You will be taught details about creating websites. Having website(s) is not enough. It is mostly a start. You also will know about generating targeted traffic to websites. He will educate you on well over 20 different methods to generate traffic. That does not mean you will want to adopt all of the methods. You might want to select limited number of that will be easier for you to implement. Once again Chris will point out that you need not be a victim of information overload. Basically, you should know about various marketing tools. Select few tools and implement them as quickly as you are able to.Is Chris' System Easy?At the onset, you need to recognise that internet is very different universe. Personally i think it is totally radical. But even that radicalness has to have basic fundamentals. This is where Chris is very undoubtedly the best. He has adopted his system in ways that it happens to be strategically divided into various steps. If you follow him, you will learn the steps. But your understanding will be enhanced by taking actions he has asked you to take. As I said earlier, he is extremely serious about his EUI approach. He educates you. Then your understanding is ensured by implementing your learning.The uniqueness about his technique are that he starts at the beginning and teaches you how to remain focused in order to build your business quickly. He has that unique gift for explaining things in a way that is simple for beginners (and those who might have not succeeded in the past).By the way, he'll almost certainly assure you that you will not become rich quickly by his system. But you will get there by your actions you take from your learning through his system. So, his technique are easy because it serves as a guide. Eventually it is you who'll succeed only if you take actions.Is Chris's System Expensive?In all fairness, this question can only be answered by you. What I most certainly will say is that in totality his technique is definitely worth the cost. Chris does offer you a special deal. You can check out his membership site for 1 week at surprisingly low cost which includes full, unlimited access of absolutely everything on the inside of the membership site including over $15000 worth of downloadable training and promotions.In case you are newbie or if you were struggling to generate money online (like I have been) Chris' training will tie it all together for you so you can stop spinning your wheels. But I must warn you that you will have to take action on what Chris teaches you so that you will start generating income through your online ventures.
For additional information, click here:
http://eca.sh/emp0084

description.hltext_display: 揭冯仁亮改年龄背后揭秘 家丑或警醒申花亚� 行
description.content:
【长江网讯】 （搜狐体育）北京时间12月22日消息，昨天上海媒体曝光申花当红国脚冯仁亮涉嫌修改年龄，无缘新一期国奥，而冯仁亮的母队天津火车头队以及目前效力的上海申花队也可能遭到相关处罚，更严重的问题是申花明年将参加亚冠联赛，如果此次事件延伸到亚足联比赛范围，那很可能惹出更大的麻烦，所以不管是中国足协还是上海申花都应该慎重的做出决定。而在冯仁亮改年龄事件上，中国足协真是一点不知情么？这背后又藏着怎样的玄机呢？
冯仁亮的注册年龄是1989年1月8日，而他的身份证号码为12010519880512****，护照上显示的也是1988年出生，涉嫌修改年龄几乎是不争的事实。冯仁亮曾作为89年龄段的队员参加过全运会，加盟申花后真实年龄被曝光。
尽管中国足协官方表态将对此事进行调查，但试想一下，中国足协对于冯仁亮改年龄事情就真的一点不知情吗？冯仁亮是火车头青训体系培养的尖子生，他还代表火车头参加了2009年的全运会比赛，全运会也属于大型赛事，在球员资格审核方面应该是非常严格的，不过足协当时并没有发现冯仁亮参赛年龄有过改动。这背后自然有着玄机，答案就需要球迷自己悟了。
面对这样的一个情况，大家关注的都是足协如何处理这件事情。其实在冯仁亮之前，中国足协已经因为有队员修改年龄被亚足联处罚，来自天津的小将刘毅因为改年龄被禁赛一年。此次事件同样涉及到亚洲赛场，因为明年申花将代表中超球队参加亚冠联赛，如果冯仁亮的真实年龄没有被曝光，他顶着国奥适龄队员名号参加亚冠，随后再被发现改年龄，那么中国足协以及申花俱乐部很可能遭到更大的处罚，那时候中国足球名誉将受到更大损害。
纸是包不住火的，如今冯仁亮改年龄事件被媒体曝光，这看起来是一件不光彩的事情，其实对于申花对于中国足协来说又何尝不是一次机会。冯仁亮从来没有入选过国奥队，申花的亚冠报名也还没开始，完全可以将真实的情况扭转过来，别等到参加了亚冠联赛后再因为年龄门，让俱乐部和中国足协都遭到处罚，这样对于中国足球来说是莫大的羞辱和损失。

description.hltext_display: Mattias Flink fick straffet ändrat
description.content:
Militären Mattias Flink sköt ihjäl sju människor
i Falun år 1994. Han var väldigt full
och hade bråkat med sin flickvän.
Mattias Flink sköt 51 skott med sin AK4
och dödade sju personer.
Han dömdes till livstids fängelse för mord.
Sedan dess har han suttit i fängelse.
Nu har Mattias Flink fått straffet ändrat.
Han ska sitta i fängelse i åtta år till.
Sedan ska han släppas fri.
Det bestämde Göta hovrätt i tisdags.
Mattias Flinks försvarare Johan Eriksson
tycker att straffet är väl långt.
– Men det är skönt att han får straffet ändrat,
säger Johan Eriksson.
8 SIDOR/TT

description.hltext_display: Bessere Kinderbetreuung in Rapperswil
description.content:
Die Stadt Rapperswil-Jona bietet neu eine Kinderbetreuung zu Hause an. Damit sollen Krisensituationen präventiv angegangen werden. Die Stadt arbeitet mit dem Roten Kreuz zusammen.
Die Kinderbetreuung zu Hause ist für Eltern gedacht, welche in schwierigen Situationen kurzfristig entlastet werden müssen. Zum Beispiel bei Krankheit oder Unfall kommt eine Betreuungsperson nach Hause und kümmert sich um die Kinder. So haben die Eltern Zeit, um eine andere Betreuung zu organisieren. (gemp)
